Description: Burberry London for Men was launched in 2006, is a scent considered very masculine, clearly expressing strength and confidence. definition. Antoine Maisondieu is the perfume expert who brought Burberry London for Men to the perfume-loving community. Burberry London can be used every day, and is especially attractive in the evening, on bad weather days. pleasant and cool. With the combination of tobacco and Cinnamon scent, creating a personality and mature guy, Leather and Lavender flowers are effective assistants in turning this man into a man. attractive and stylish. Burberry London for Men has the very unique quality of men from the UK, elegant, youthful, the eyes of the romantic and gallant.

Forbidden Games is a new perfume line of the By Kilian brand, it was launched on the market in 2012, with an unconventional white bottle. Its scent is a treat. Spiritual gift for women with a fragrance belonging to the floral - fruit - food group. Passionate, rich fragrance with the blend and constant transformation of the perfume line belonging to the floral and fruit group - Food for both modern men and women. The fragrance of the perfume bottle is evaluated well. The bottle has a sophisticated and iconic design.

Musk Oud is a perfume line from Kilian with a long lasting scent - 7 hours to 12 hours and Fragrance radiance is close - fragrance radiates within an arm's length. Musk Oud is suitable for use both day and night in the fall and winter. Alberto Morillas is the creator of this perfume. Besides, Agarwood and Musk are the two notes you can easily feel when using this perfume.

CAROLINA HERRERA BAD BOY is the ninth men's fragrance in the Herrera perfume collection.BAD BOY embodies the duality of humanity in a bold symbol of new masculinity. Strong yet sensitive, heroic yet vulnerable, BAD BOY is confident in himself, embracing every aspect of his contrasting personality. BAD BOY Eau de Toilette captures the many aspects of the contemporary manhood in an explosive yet sophisticated modern scent. The new masculine version comes in an attractively sculpted bottle with a base of green bergamot. , sage, pepper, tonka bean, cacao, cedarwood and amberwood. The result is a handcrafted masculine scent with a prominent gourmand edge. The fragrance is packaged in a lightning bolt-shaped bottle – a sculptural alternative to Good Girl's high heels.

In 1996, the perfume house Azzaro launched launched the Chrome perfume line with the fragrant scent of citrus for men. Chrome is a perfume line suitable for all ages: from boys to young men or stylish, elegant middle-aged men. Chrome uses citrus and musk as the main scent to create. Fresh and vibrant fragrance. This scent revolves around freshness with ocean scent from the first notes to the last notes. In the base note, there is a delicate blend of wood and tea leaves, creating a masculine scent that is irresistibly attractive.
Discover The relaxing and bright fruity fragrance Arancia di Capri encapsulates Capri's signature scents of orange, tangerine and lemon.

Product_name: The Scent Private Accord for Him
Description: Excellent magnetic cocoa vibrations at the heart of BOSS The Scent Private Accord for Him while notes of ginger and exotic maninka fruit combine with sophisticated mocha. This masculine fragrance provides a long-lasting scent that captivates the senses.

In White Tea, you will feel the gentle scent of white tea, Relaxing, only slightly astringent, not bitter and astringent like black tea or green tea, combined with the scent of the sea creates a pleasant cool feeling, and in the drydown part will be musk that smells quite clean. Overall, White Tea is a gentle, polite and easy-to-use tea scent that can be used by both men and women on almost any occasion, suitable for those who just need a pleasant, special scent. is summer. The only minus point is that the scent lasts only about 4 hours, but as a cheap product, we cannot ask too much from this perfume bottle.

This fruity fragrance is combined with gourmand nuances making it the equivalent of the modern perfume scene. The trendy composition of Gourd Duc has touched many designer collections showing that the focus lies on refined sweetness. The latest perfume of the Hugo Boss collection opens with peachy and smooth peach tones combined with freesia in the high notes. The heart is based on osmanthus, famous for its scent of apricot, while the dry features roasted cocoa, deepening the composition and providing a darker note
undefined

A love potion created by perfumers Christophe Raynaud and Amandine Marie. It is said to depict the dark side of the rose and mixes notes of black rose with Tahitian vanilla orchid absolute. There are also notes of nature, papyrus, patchouli and lychee added to the mix.

Clive Christian Timeless is a commemorative Limited Edition 150 years ago, the company's predecessor, Crown Perfumery, was honored by the Queen of England to use the royal crown symbol as its bottle cap. The scent honors the art of perfumery, which Crown Perfumery has done so well that it received the above special favor from the Queen of England. At Clive Christian Timeless, we have a beautiful scent from design to appearance. Clive Christian Timeless is a combination of bitter orange, mint, lavender and ginger on a base of vetiver and leather, smells very Clive Christian, not complicated but extremely luxurious in simplicity, everything It's seasoned just right, and the special thing is that the citrus flavor from bitter orange and lemon seems to stay there forever and not fade away. I can guarantee this is very difficult to do in perfume.

Product_name: Boss The Scent Absolute For Her
Description: Boss The Scent For Her Absolute by Hugo Boss is an Oriental Vanilla scent for women. This is a new fragrance. Boss The Scent For Her Absolute was launched in 2019. The author behind this scent is Louise Turner. Top notes are honey and peach; middle note is coffee; Basic notes are vanilla and vetiver.

When spraying Clive The opening of Clive X Masculine feels stimulating, complex and somewhat herbal. Cinnamon, combined with a slightly sticky syrupy amber, a little sweetness from pineapple mixed with a little spiciness from chili with a woody base. In fact, you have to smell it directly to see the complexity of the scent structure of this perfume. What I just described is probably only about 60,70%, but if you smell it closely you will see that There are materials that cannot be separated. I quite like this opening, it smells a bit strange and rarely seen in perfumes. And often people say: 'Good things take time', I find this is most true with perfume. The more Clive X Masculine changes later, the more masculine, flattering and mature it becomes. Cedar wood is the base for cinnamon and amber to blend together to exude masculinity, and perhaps to make the scent more complete and have a bit of a sartorial feeling, perfumer Geza Schoen added it. Oakmoss and vetiver complete this scent. Clive It's exactly the best look for Clive X Masculine that I can think of.|| Good Girl's fragrance belongs to the Oriental Floral group, aimed at people over 25 years old. Louise Turner is the creator of this perfume.

Good Girl has a long lasting scent - 6 hours to 12 hours and a long distance scent. Good Girl is suitable for use both day and night in the fall and winter. Besides, Tonka Bean and White Lily are the two scents you can easily feel when using this perfume.

Wood Sage & Sea Salt Cologne was created with the intention of evoking feelings of pleasure, freedom and escape into nature, inspired by the unique character and quality of the British beach. With the aim of reflecting the whole concept, the photos of the advertising campaign were taken in Northumberland by British fashion photographer Tim Walker. The ingredients of the new perfume, as its name suggests, include ambrette seeds, sea salt and sage, along with red algae and grapefruit. 'This fragrance is different for me' – Christine Nagel , composition expert. She added: 'The sea air is mixed with the salty and mineral texture of the sand and rocks. It has a natural and fresh flair. A complex combination of wood and sea is its essence. It provides a feeling of freedom and natural spirit.

Daisy is a sparkling, woody floral fragrance that is fresh and feminine at the same time. It is intended for a woman who is sophisticated, charming and brilliant, while at the same time trying to be simple. It comes in a pretty bottle decorated with daisies on the top. The creator of this scent is Alberto Morillas. The captivating Daisy fragrance caresses with fruity notes of strawberry, dark green notes of violet leaves and sparkling spicy pink grapefruit. Its heart beats to the rhythm of flowers, composed of silky and captivating gardens, delicate purples and jasmine petals.

This is the water Afnan Perfumes belongs to the Woody Floral Musk group. Supremacy Silver was launched in 2013. Besides, Pineapple and Black Currant are the two flavors you can easily feel when using this perfume.

Dior Homme Cologne has the main ingredients of just three notes: bergamote, grapefruit blossom and musk. As soon as you spray it, you will feel a cool, refreshing and pleasant feeling coming from the bright, sharp, succulent and slightly sour bergamote orange, along with a slightly effervescent feeling that is easy to make. It reminds me of a cup of ice-cold sprite, but it's very less sweet and goes mainly in the citrus direction. This opening literally cools the summer, the hotter it gets, the better it gets. After a while, about 10 minutes, the scent quickly dries on the skin and becomes linear, almost unchanged, next to the bergamote, grapefruit flowers and musk will clearly appear. The grapefruit flower here gives the scent combination a slightly sweet feeling, softening the sourness that comes from oranges, both sour and sweet are quite balanced, on a clean musk background. Overall, Dior Homme Cologne will bring you The person who sprays it feels fresh, comfortable, clean, the smell is simple but still exudes a feeling of elegance and neatness like a clean white shirt, always has a timeless appeal. Timeless but never out of fashion It represents the spirit that Dior described this scent on the homepage, 'Its enveloping trail has all thecasual charm of a timeless white shirt: Dior Homme eau de Cologne represents the elegance of simplicity .'

Product_name: BOSS The Scent Absolute For Him
Description: Spicy ginger draws the senses into an invigorating blend of maninka fruit and mondia root, wrapped in elegant vetiver for a eau de parfum is addictive. Spray this intense fragrance onto pulse points for a rich scent that will last all day.

It's no exaggeration to say Musk Therapy is really good , very beautiful, from the scent to the design. Opening with citrus is not really impressive, but just a few minutes later you will see a clean, musky vibe, with a creamy and rich touch of sandalwood, embellished and made special by the touch of sandalwood. The fruit is both sweet and slightly green and slightly sour like blackcurrant. Accord's scent of Musk Therapy gives us the feeling that it's not like any of the hot musky scents in the last few years like Another 13, Musk Kashmir, both clean, soft, creamy, and a little fruity. The smell is very unique, the blend is extremely smooth, one can easily use the word beautiful to describe the smell of Musk Therapy. In terms of staying power, Initio also did a great job with this perfume bottle, easily staying on the skin for about 8 hours, nothing to criticize.

My personal experience with this L'eau Papier is a clean musky smell, with a slightly sweet floral powdery touch from the mimosa flower on top. cedar wood background. Perhaps L'eau Papier has a large amount of ambroxan in its ingredients, because when you smell the scent, you can have a lot of thoughts about Le Labo's Another 13. However, if you spray the two scents side by side, you will find that L'eau Papier is warmer, somewhat sweeter and does not give off the obvious greasy taste like Another 13, not to mention the opening of this perfume bottle has a strong feeling. The resinous, powdery cupping is quite interesting from the rice scent note and in the dry part, the wood effect is a bit like a pencil sharpener but extremely clean which is quite interesting. However, the weak point of this scent is probably that it has only a moderate level of adhesion, because the company produces L'eau Papier at a concentration of only EDT, but that's why it will be suitable for those who like it. People like to use scents that are gentle, clean and not too noisy, just like the scent of their own skin, without affecting those around them.

Layton unisex perfume was launched in 2016. This is the Parfums de Marly perfume line of the Oriental Floral group aimed at age over 25 years old. Hamid Merati-Kashani is the creator of this perfume. Layton has a long lasting scent - 6 hours to 12 hours and a long distance scent - radiating scent within a radius of 2 meters. Layton is suitable for use both day and night in spring, autumn, and winter. Besides, Vanilla and Green Apple are the two flavors you can easily feel when using this perfume.

Mr.Burberry Eau de Parfum, released in April 2017, is designed to be stronger, more sensual and warmer than the Eau de Toilette version. The new versions are more suitable for evening occasions, enriched with notes of cinnamon, patchouli and amber.

Iconic of pure light from the Sun, the rays of light incorporated in HERMES 24 Faubourg Eau de Toilette shine and sparkle on the skin, revealing the femininity and sexiness of women. The top scent is a light scent. softly, like the morning light just revealed. The somewhat loving scent of Water Hyacinth and Ylang-Ylang, combined with the scent of Orange, creates a calm, bright and smooth space. When the top scent just settles, the mixture of iris and jasmine , orange flowers and gardenia flowers are blooming, dyeing the whole sky with a sweet and deep fragrance, so that our emotions are awakened and we are ready to feel the beauty of the petals fluttering in the wind. HERMES 24 Faubourg Eau de Toilette leaves a smooth mark on the skin with the scent of Sandalwood, intertwined with the warm scent of amber. Lingering in the space is the sweetness of Vanilla, engrossed in her movements.

Montblanc Signature is a scent worth buying For girls who like lightness but still attractiveness. At Montblanc Signature, we can easily feel that the main character is vanilla, but the vanilla is made in a very less sweet way, in a way that takes all the aspects of vanilla and then removes the sweetness to create a creamy state. creamy, soothing and soft. Vanilla wraps around sweet orange and the floral combination on a musk base gives us a clean, feminine, bright but still very attractive scent. Montblanc Signature paints the image of a muse with a gentle, gentle beauty, femininity and charisma enhanced by a discreet but delicate and elegant white dress.

Iris Porcelana opens gently and delicately with the smell of violet leaves, the flower here is bright and fresh like the petals are still there. drenched in morning dew, bringing a fresh, refreshing, and extremely comfortable feeling. After waiting a while, the main character of Iris Porcelana - iris - really appears and shines brightly. The powdery, light powdery iris is based on jasmine and rose, giving the fragrance a feeling that is not monotonous but complex and multi-dimensional. The softness and elegance of the iris are clearly highlighted, bringing luxury and elegance. I will give an overall but brief description of Iris Porcelana, it is an elegant, feminine and sophisticated scent but also extremely modern, you can smell it and know that Ex Nihilo has used the highest quality ingredients for the bottle. This perfume is a very luxurious, sweet powder scent that women can wear all year round on any occasion.

Right from the moment it is sprayed then we can easily see that the main scent tone of Clive Christian 1872 Masculine is citrus, and the citrus that accounts for the most in this combination is petigrain, which can be roughly translated as lemon leaf essential oil. This type of essential oil is special in that most common citrus oils are extracted from orange or lemon peels, but petitgrain, in addition to the peel of the bitter orange tree, is also extracted from young branches and leaves. Therefore, in addition to the typical citrus nuance, there will also be a slightly bitter, clean, pleasant, green bitterness and in addition, there will be a bit of woody nuance. A bit of sweet grapefruit mixed with a bit of ripe pineapple, sometimes it reminds me of the ripe pineapple in Creed Aventus. Besides that, there is a bit of a cool herbal green taste, perhaps from the slightly dry rosemary and lavender. This is when you spray it on your skin, then smell it closely, and try to figure out what's in it, trying to take it apart. However, when it is released, it no longer feels complicated, but it gives off a slightly floral, slightly woody citrus scent. And one of the things that pays me the most about Clive Christian 1872 Masculine is the scent journey. Readers can see that the citrus scents we often encounter, usually after 1 to 2 hours of spraying, the citrus scent disappears quite quickly, mainly wood or musk remaining. Clive Christian 1872 Masculine is not like that, it keeps a very stable scent structure, after about 2 hours you smell it again, it will still be the same, it feels like everything fades away very slowly, very gradually, the The most obvious difference from the opening is probably that the wood appears more clearly. And it's almost like the smell won't change anymore, it just stays that way and gradually gets lighter.

The key point of Vetyverio is to use two types of grass Different scents with extremely wonderful properties. The first type comes from Indonesia, has an earthy and somewhat rough sound, bringing a wild natural feeling. The second type is gentler and more delicate, imported from the Caribbean, and combines harmoniously with musk notes, helping to complete, balance and add something a little more special to the perfume. Finally, a little spice; Carrot seeds, nutmeg and cloves – create a delightful surprise. The dry cedar wood scent along with the powdery musk scent brings a sensual feeling to the user's skin. Overall, Vetyverio is a perfume with a very sensitive and delicate scent, it has succeeds in capturing a relaxed elegance for the wearer.

La Vie Est Belle is a new Lancome perfume, available on the market since autumn 2012. The concept of this perfume focuses on the idea of natural and simple beauty, freedom from conventions and the choice of a vision of happiness. Fragrance is a kind of outlook on life, inspired by joy and pleasure in small things.

The Hedonist opens with a feeling Brightness of citrus along with a slight spicy feeling from ginger, then gradually changes to a woody state. The special feature of The Hedonist's wood is Akigalawood, a type of wood that has both a slight peppery spiciness and a cool metallic feel. Overall, it will be a cool, slightly spicy wood-toned scent that smells both strange and luxurious and attractive in a very delicate way. The Hedonist is absolutely unisex, of course it will be a bit more masculine, but basically both men and women can use it, suitable for those who need a neutral, simple, polite, uncomplicated wood scent. strange but not easy to deal with.

Nasomatto Blamage is a scent dominated by wood and leather. It sounds masculine and strong, but in reality this scent is not too masculine. count like that. The opening of Nasomatto Blamagee is the smell of white flowers and Aldehydes. The white flowers here come from several flowers, but the most obvious one is jasmine, and the Aldehydes part is probably Aldehyde C14 because when you smell it, you immediately think of the smell of a ripe peach. Besides, we will smell a bit of wood, slightly smoky, and gentle with leather. It's actually a bit difficult to describe the scent of Blamage when first sprayed, but it really smells very impressive and flattering to the nose. When the scent softens on the skin, we will have a combination of floral scent, a bit of fruity like in the opening which has softened quite a lot and wood, a bit of smoke in the background. The wood of Nasomatto Blamage that I smell most clearly is probably sandalwood, there is certainly the presence of other types of wood as well, but it is difficult to separate what it is because Nasomatto has blended the wood here quite smoothly, creating depth for this perfume bottle. After using Blamge for a while, I felt something a bit like Black Afgano. When I first tried this scent, I thought this was a brighter, softer, slightly more floral version of Black Afgano. Perhaps if you love Black Afgano but are afraid it is too difficult to use, perhaps you should try Blamge, it will be more suitable.

Amouage Meander engraved depicts an image of a pristine land, where there are valleys filled with green trees and the sound of gurgling streams in the morning mist. The feeling of being sprayed, Amouage Meander wraps tangerine and caresses the skin with a clear, bright scent of sandalwood, a slightly green smell of frankincense and a slightly spicy scent of pepper. Maybe you don't know, frankincense in English is Frankincense, a word originating from French with the meaning of noble and pure. Opening is actually blended quite smoothly, suggesting a certain masculinity, and it can also be seen that the ingredients used to make Amouage Meander are quite high quality, smelling extremely real, luxurious and flattering. Gradually transitioning to drydown, the spicy pepper gradually subsides, the smell becomes smoother with the appearance of rose and iris, evoking a clean, pleasant powdery feeling as a background for sandalwood and flowers. The combination of daffodils creates a milky-sweet vibe, a little greasy but very satisfying. Smelling the slight sweet feeling on the tip of the nose makes us easily smile and feel comfortable and at ease.

Speaking of Dior Homme, any perfume bottle deserves to become a monument, and personally for me they are designer 'incense bottles' but the quality is very niche. Especially the first version Dior Homme Orginal produced in 2005, opened a new trend in the history of men's perfume by putting iris notes with a characteristic powdery feeling as the main theme, as a premise for creating The male scents are softer, not too 'hard' like before. Sadly, the new versions of this perfume line in the past few years have left the perfume community quite disappointed as the iris notes become increasingly faded and have no highlight. In 2022, after a long period of stopping production of Dior Homme Parfum, the company re-produced it in a new capacity of 100ml, and made me quite happy, because it applied powder very clearly, reminding me of the old versions extremely well. previous successes. At Dior Homme Parfum, we have a combo of iris and cocoa along with leather. Iris is clearly powdery with moderately sweet cocoa, the leather is not too thick, sharp but soft but still retains the characteristics of this note, overall giving us a masculine scent in a slightly groomed style. momentum, easy to spray and easy to get compliments.

From my perspective, Clive Christian No1 Masculine is an overpriced perfume, probably only for the upper class. Ordinary people, with a good income, and who love perfume, X or 1872 can try to own, but Clive Christian No1 Masculine is a different story. The main theme of this perfume is iris, adding a little sandalwood that smells sweet and creamy. The sweetness also comes not only from sandalwood but also from vanilla and tonka bean, along with that I notice a floral nuance. of jasmine and royal orchid. With a main scent of iris, of course we will have a scent that smells quite powdery, slightly powdery and has a soapy feeling. To make it easier to imagine, I will describe No1 as having the smell of a super high-end bath soap, which can only be found in super luxury hotels with rental prices up to a billion a night, like a room. President class penthouse in Las Vegas, for example. Of course, I have never had the opportunity to set foot in such places, but the feeling of super clean and luxurious soap from Clive Christian No1 Masculine probably matches that best. One person wants a real scent. clean, luxurious, then perhaps you will find Clive Christian No1 Masculine suitable. It could also be someone who collects perfume, likes Clive and wants the whole Orignal set. No. 1 is so beautiful that wherever it is displayed, it will be extremely bright and prominent. Or it could also be people who, every time they enter a place, will only want to buy the most expensive things. I'm not sure, the elders told you, don't teach rich people to spend money.

Gucci Bloom celebrates the authenticity, vitality and diversity of the women Alessandro Michele designs and those who identify themselves in his vision. True to who they are, these young women experience life and its fruits, blossoming into their true selves. They convey their personal views without the usual limitations. They live for memorable experiences, to create stories and connections and to be inspired by the objects, culture and art they choose to be surrounded by. The architect of every element of the scent, Alessandro Michele conveys Gucci's idea of lushness, vitality and vitality in every note, its dreamy campaign and its unique design.

Bleu de Chanel is Channel's new perfume line, designed by Jacques Polge. Chanel commented that the characteristic strong aromatic wood scent is what makes Bleu de Chanel product, hidden inside is the flavor of the sea, with a bold sporty style. In particular, the natural flavor of the sea will become more evident when perfume is used regularly.

In mid-2019, Dior continued its success of the Dior Joy perfume line, the company continues to launch a perfume line that is considered an extremely feminine, longer-lasting, novel scent with a concentration of ingredients that create a stronger and deeper scent of Dior Joy. The 2018 version is Dior Joy Intense. Dior Joy Intense Perfume has an ecstatic floral scent, still retaining the scent of Dior Joy, but this new line has a darker, more feminine scent and lasts longer. Design The perfume bottle named JOY Intense by Dior has a modern, sophisticated design with the main color being gentle pastel pink, dotted with a luxurious silver lid and sparkling silver lettering.

In French, 'Voulez-Vous Coucher Avec Moi' means 'Do you want to sleep with me? '. Voulez-Vous Coucher Avec Moi can be said to be the scent of a mature woman, not for teenage girls. The main theme of this perfume is white flowers and Royal Orchids mixed with Vanilla creating a scent scent that we can use the word 'inviting'. Initially, you will see tuberose and gardenia interspersed with a touch of makeup. Later, the royal jelly spreads and combines with vanilla. At the end, we feel the base with creamy sandalwood, slightly sweet powder, extremely refreshing. Voulez-Vous Coucher Avec Moi to me is beautiful from form to scent, a scent that should be had by women...

Women's perfume Woman in Gold By Kilian has a long lasting scent - 7 hours to 12 hours. and the fragrance radiance is close - the fragrance radiates within an arm's length. Woman in Gold is suitable for use both day and night in the fall and winter. This is the By Kilian perfume line of the Chypre Floral group. Woman in Gold was launched in 2017. Besides, Vanilla and Akigalawood extracts are the two scents you can easily feel when using this perfume.

New feminine passion is found in The Only One Eau de Parfum Intense, the latest edition in The Only One collection from Dolce&Gabbana Beauty. While previous scent lines such as The Only One Eau de Parfum honor the graceful beauty that attracts all eyes, The Only One 2 Eau de Parfum captures the moment of intensely attractive beauty, this time The Only One Eau de Parfum Intense celebrates a woman's most attractive qualities. A drop of the purest scent portrays a woman's irresistible hidden charm, a fragrance that makes men fall in love and lose their way.

Product_name: Boss The Scent Intense For Men
Description: In the spring of 2017, Hugo Boss launches Boss The Scent Intense, an amplified version of Boss The Scent from 2015. Boss The Scent Intense is announced as the new seductive Eau de Parfum for strong, masculine men. strong and memorable. The new version contains a higher concentration of aromatic oils and increased intensity of the main ingredients. Boss The Scent Intense opens with the fresh, energizing and spicy scent of ginger and green cardamom. The heart includes the Maninka fruit from South Africa, which is said to have aphrodisiac powers, with the dose increased in the new version.

Tardes has Probably Carner Barcelona's most popular women's scent. I received a very 'cute' feedback from a customer that her husband complimented her a lot when she used this scent, while he is someone who does not like perfume and almost never Comment on any scents you've used in the past. Clean, soft, feminine but still very attractive, and it should be felt directly on the skin then I think people can see the beauty of this scent. Fatty, creamy almonds have a warm, sweet, skin-like feeling when the almond note is blended with tonka bean, sandalwood and white musk. It has both a clean, powdery feeling and a sweet, inviting feeling, but of course it's a very delicate, meatless style. Tardes, for me personally, with what I have experienced with this scent as well as what I have heard from customers, it feels like Tardes, although not a very musky scent, is also It is not a skin scent that is different for each person, but is considered a skin scent, sparkling and shining on the owner's skin.

Tresor Midnight Rose is Lancome's latest perfume line, inheriting the successful version of the 2010 Tresor in Love perfume with a charming purple color design. Tresor Midnight Rose was first launched in September 2011. Tresor Midnight Rose fragrance is like a romantic potion that evokes the rich love flavor of roses and raspberries that captivates the splendor of Paris.

Ganymede is a scent with a concept inspired by the moon of the same name orbiting Jupiter, also the largest moon in the solar system. NASA scientists believe that Ganymade has a saltwater ocean under the surface of the ice, and under the ocean is an iron core. In addition, Ganymede is also a character in Greek mythology, the prince of Troy. Ganymede is known as 'the most beautiful teenager in the world', loved by Zeus, who made him the one to pour wine for him and bestow immortality. Returning to Ganymede by niche brand Marc Antoine Barrois, here is a rather strange scent with main notes of mineral and suede. The special point here is that the mineral note creates a feeling of extreme coolness and cleanliness, as if before our eyes is an architectural block from the future made of cold metal, without a single scratch, it makes the Suede notes become soft and flexible. I believe that Ganymede is one of the most unique, expressive and unique mineral/metallic note perfumes ever produced. The combination of aromatic notes creates a strange but extremely captivating accord, reminding me of the effect of Baccarat Rouge 540 but in a much more unique and interesting way.

Bergamote 22 by Le Labo is a Woody Aromatic scent for women and men. Bergamote 22 was launched in 2006. The fragrance has amber, musk, grapefruit, vetiver, petitgrain, bergamot, vanilla, orange blossom and cedar.
undefined

This is the Diptyque perfume line belonging to the Woody group (Woody scent). Volutes Eau de Parfum was launched in 2012. Besides, Tobacco and Iris are the two scents you can easily feel when using this perfume. Volutes Eau de Parfum unisex perfume is suitable Suitable for people over 25 years old, has a long lasting scent - 8 hours to 10 hours, long-distance scent - spreads scent within a radius of 2 meters.

Gucci Guilty Pour Homme Intense is a provocative and intense fragrance, introducing a combination of amalfi lemon, coriander and lavender in its top notes. A heart of orange blossom and neroli settles in a trace of patchouli, cedar and amber.

Chance in French means ' lucky'. Chanel and Chance sound so similar as if they were made for each other. Chance is the only Chanel perfume in a round bottle as opposed to the classic Chanel N°5 rectangular bottle. However, that is no coincidence, as it is an 'asset wheel'. A wave of extreme freshness meets floral notes and continues with a sensual spice composition. 'Chance is a tornado, a door open to adventure and the unknown, like lips ready for a kiss.'

I I don't watch too many European and American movies, but quite a few of the movies I watch have the image of a man in a wooden house, under the fireplace with a glass of whiskey as his confidant. But today is the middle of the week and we're talking about going to the bar, so some classical music and a glass of light hazelnut Frangelico Liqueur seems more appropriate. When chestnuts, burning wood and a little smoke blend together, adding a few drops of vanilla behind, a warm, thoughtful guy who always cares about the other person appears right on By the fire place. And how wonderful it would be if in the cold weather, when you appear with this fragrance, it doesn't matter whether you sit at the central bar or a small corner with only a candle burning, there will surely be many girls because of the scent. scent that makes you want to get acquainted.

Lancome's La Vie est Belle L'Éclat is an oriental perfume for women. La Vie est Belle L'Éclat was launched in 2017. La Vie est Belle L'Éclat was created by Anne Flipo and Dominique Ropion. Top notes are bergamot, mandarin orange and freesia; middle notes are orange blossom, white flower, jasmine sambac and iris; Base notes are sandalwood, vanilla and patchouli.

Carner Barcelona's Cuirs is centered on leather, agarwood and a little saffron. This scent makes us feel like we are entering a high-end leather workshop. The leather in this perfume bottle is smooth, it will not be as playful as Ombre Leather, not as luxurious as Tuscan leather, but it will be a leather that smells close, meticulous and has a bit of a rustic feel. It reminds me of something between suede and leather, not overly polished but not simple either. For those of you who are looking for a leather-based scent for daily use in the fall and winter weather, this can be said to be a quite interesting choice.

Maybe many people don't really pay attention to Encre Noire because of the label 'cheap perfume'. However, to mention the best perfume scents with vetiver as the main theme, the name of this perfume bottle from Lalique is certainly indispensable. Encre Noire is a scent that exhibits an extremely beautiful Vetiver note, taking advantage of the dry and dark scent of vetiver to create an extremely interesting black ink Accord. I can say with certainty that very few scents in the perfume world can recreate the smell of ink like Encre Noire does. The dry strokes of vetiver, mixed with a bit of thorns from cashmeran wood, give us the feeling of dry ink written on paper. Encre Noire presents a very neat, interesting yet extremely wearable vetiver nuance, and to me, this scent is completely worthy of a much more 'niche' price range.

My Burberry is inspired by the classic nude coat of the Burberry family, worn on a beautiful sunny day in spring, standing sideways, radiant and shining. with flowers in a model garden designed for typical London homes. Calvin's CK One Klein is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. CK One was launched in 1994. CK One was created by Alberto Morillas and Harry Fremont. An opening that feels cool and bright, quite flattering, and clean like newly washed clothes. However, to make it easier for you to imagine, it only makes us think a little, about 30%, and is not a smell made in a too classic direction. Kind of like a modern version of the legendary Chanel Egoiste Platinum. As time goes on, it feels like the woodiness of this perfume will increase even more, a woody base of cedar and sandalwood. The slightly creamy creamy sandalwood scent, combined with dry cedar, reminds us a bit of Santal 33, but it will be a safe and gentle feeling, not as loud and personal as Le Labo Santal 33. Performance The smell is at a good level, with EDP concentration, on the skin, Montblanc Explorer Platinum shines well for the first 3 to 4 hours, and becomes a skinscent with the main wood within the next 3 hours before it disappears. A masculine scent, clean and tidy, safe, suitable for office work. Writing here, I think of Prada L'homme. I would say they have quite a few similarities, also have purple flowers, wood, also create a pleasant and slightly powdery feeling, also not a wow smell at first sight, but the more I spray it, the more I like it because The clean, polite feeling is extremely suitable for an office scent. This is the Dolce&Gabbana perfume line belonging to the Oriental Vanilla group. Besides, Vanilla Huong and Duong Thang are the two scents you can easily feel when using this perfume. The new version of Dior Miss is Dior Blooming Bouquet launched at the beginning of the year 2014; It carries with it a mixture of floral and elegant scents like the beautiful days of early spring. Ambrosia is the origin of Greek gods, believed to give immortality to those who drank it. The name of this precious nectar and the magic it evokes are woven into the scent's dazzling bouquet. The blend begins with the original Gucci Bloom eau de parfum, a trio of Jasmine Bud, Tuberose and Rangoon Creeper extracts, combined with new ingredients that enhance the floral scent: Velvety Orris, a rare ingredient sourced from Iris resin. and the Romans as an essential oil, and Damascena Rose was harvested early in the morning to give the flower its strong beauty.

Basically , Russian Tea will be a scent with the main theme being black tea, leather mixed with smoke. The most recognizable is the leather with a bit of smoke, slightly bitter black tea giving off an animalic effect with a slightly smell like burning rubber and gasoline going straight into the nose. However, just like enjoying tea, at first it feels bitter but then the end is sweet on the tongue, Russian Tea is also thorny at first but the drydown is beautiful. After a while, we notice the slightly sweet smell of raspberries, at this time, with the characteristic coolness of mint, Russian Tea will become more pleasant and pleasing to the nose. Gradually, everything calms down, coming back to Drydown will be the smell of smoked black tea mixed with leather, a very peaceful and relaxing smell, but after smelling it I always have a sweet feeling in the back of my throat.

Created by leading perfumer Yann Vasnier, Moschino Toy Boy fully demonstrates his mischievousness in creating fragrances, as the top notes is a novel combination between the freshness of bergamot, pear and the warm taste of pink pepper. The most feminine design from Versace, that's what you say when you see it Bright Crystal perfume bottle. Atlas Fever is one of the scents that I personally think belongs to the sandalwood scents that help you end-game. Under The Lemon Tree by Maison Martin Margiela is a scent for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Under The Lemon Tree was launched in 2018. Top notes are lime, petitgrain and cardamom; middle notes are coriander, mate and green tea; Base notes are cedar, stone rose and white musk.

Crab Apple Blossom is an extremely famous scent and sold very well in the last years of the world. 19th century by Clive Christian, the founder of the company was inspired by the smell of an apple tree in front of his house in Kensington London, this apple variety is called Crab Apple. By 2021, Clive Christian, with the desire to restore the best-selling scents that made the company's name, launched Crown Collection, and Crab Apple Blossom is the first scent in this collection. Right from the opening, it is easy to feel a clear salty aquatic scent, however it does not give the person spraying the fishy feeling typical of an aquatic scent note, but feels very airy, like sitting down. long on a beach enjoying the wind blowing by. This alone makes me extremely impressed with Crab Apple Blossom. The scent begins to change after 10 minutes of spraying. It's quite strange, quite difficult to describe, and I've almost never encountered any perfume before. Both sweet and sour, mixed with a little salty, but overall gives a cool, pleasant feeling and in my mind I will think of an image of a certain street in Europe, with many trees planted along the roadside. On it are white flowers mixed with pink like cherry blossoms, then the wind blows, filling the whole street with fragrance. A balance created by contrasting aspects, sweet, sour, salty, blended very delicately to create a cool, rounded and interesting accord. After spraying on full clothes, the scent will radiate, extremely pleasant and enjoyable, luxurious and pleasing to the nose. It will be the answer for those who need unique, luxurious, unique scents. I must repeat and firmly affirm that it is almost impossible for you to find a second bottle of perfume. Both have the same vibe as this bottle.

Immediately after a years-long litigation scandal that cost countless press articles and a victory for Johnny Depp, Dior Sauvage returned into a trending perfume bottle and sold out on all fronts. Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue was launched at the end of July 2016, is the latest perfume bottle of the Versace Pour Homme line. For many people, they will pay attention to the very luxurious and sophisticated bottle design, but for me, I pay more attention to the dark blue color of Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue. It creates a strangely close feeling, the blue of the sea, the dark blue of the sky, and I was not wrong, Dylan Blue contains the scent of water, clear and pure blue. The first time I came into contact with this guy, I understood why this is one of the best sellers of Versace, a surprisingly cool, free and liberal flavor with Bergamot and fresh Grapefruit. . Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue also attracts anyone's sense of smell with the masculinity of Ambroxan and the thorny, personality of Black Pepper. This guy is elegant, trendy, youthful and sweet and considerate with musk and tonka bean, captivating all eyes with his innate elegance.

Basically, Ombre Noire will be a scent made in the direction of alcohol, tobacco, and spices on a wood background. My first impression when I first sprayed this scent was to raise my eyebrows and nod in excitement because of its strangeness. In the opening, you can easily feel the taste of cognac, the boozy feeling is not too strong but very clear. For some readers who don't know, 'boozy' refers to the feeling when you smell the smell of wine, especially Western wine, there will always be a feeling of stimulation in the brain and a slight dizziness. You will easily encounter this feeling in some popular scents such as Nasomato Baraonda or Kilian Angel Share. Besides the wine, you will also find a bit of dry wood, accompanied by a cool spicy taste from mint and a bit of green from fig leaves. It will be a winey opening but somewhat dry and green. Obviously it would be difficult to come across a similar opening in perfume. After about 10 minutes, the scent will soften a lot, cinnamon and tobacco will become clearer. The wine is still there, and it feels like as time goes on, the cognac flavor fades to the smell of dry oak. Unlike Nasomatto's Baraonda, where the oak is moist and full of wine flavor, the oak in Ombre Noire will be dry wood, like a newly made wine barrel preparing for aging. And after about 30 minutes, the scent will settle down and be almost linear, no longer changing, at this point there will be a little more warmth coming from the tonka beans. Ombre Noire when dry down will definitely have a smell of alcohol and tobacco with a bit of sweet, slightly spicy cinnamon, slightly smoky smelling smooth and pleasant. Quiet, mature and experienced, these are the words I want to describe the type of person who will wear this scent, like a signature scent...

Le Beau was first introduced by Jean Paul Gaultier in 2019 with La Belle, he is Adam, and she is Eva, the embodiment of these two new perfume couples. Le Beau brings a very impressive and unique scent experience that will surprise everyone who comes in contact with it, it is 'sweet and cool'. This Adam possesses the sweet warmth of Tonka beans, but is strangely fresh and pleasant with the presence of Bergamot and Coconut. A scent that gives the user a very aquatic, youthful feeling, but when it settles down it becomes a bit calm, masculine and mature. Le Beau not only attracts men with its unique and attractive appearance, its scent is an attractive weapon that every guy should equip. Le Beau is a smiling, gentle, manly man, and strong enough to be ready to eat the forbidden fruit when needed

Olene tells of the gardens of Venice. An evening under the pergolas, lulled by the floral notes of wisteria, jasmine and honeysuckle. To distinguish all the fragrances, you need only step back. Simply cross a bridge in the City of Water - and a thousand and one floral scents will emerge.

Product_name: Flower by Kenzo eau de lumière
Description: Feel the loveliness, softness and warmth with its simple design like a flower branch, its transparent body reaching out to the sun. Design that impresses or attracts viewers from the first time. With better scent retention than the 2000 version, Flower by Kenzo Eau De Lumiere is rated much higher than Kenzo's older versions.

Roses on Ice belongs to The Liquors collection or what people call Kilian's wine line launched in 2020. It is also the scent that I find the coolest and easiest to use in the summer of this line. In addition, a little rose will be added to the skin, but it almost only adds elegance and comfort to the scent. Roses on Ice's scent longevity is also considered quite good, average on average. about 5-6 hours. An extremely smooth, cool wine scent if you want to use it in the summer.

Referring to perfume bottles with heart-stopping scents Those who love Diptyque's perfume collection certainly cannot ignore Diptyque Fleur De Peau Eau De Parfum. Expert Olivier Cresp launched a perfume called Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue in 2001 and immediately, the product This has become very successful and is one of the world's most popular summer perfumes. Oud Palao – Perfume bottle with Oud as the first main ingredient of Diptyque. After many years, Oud is an ingredient that no perfume house has created without its own creation, Oud. Now, Diptyque has also decided to have its own Oud scent - Oud Palao.Oud Palao with the following scent ingredients : Oud from Laos, camphor leaf, sandalwood from Sri Lanka, frankincense from Somalia, tobacco, Madagascan Vanilla, Spanish rock rose, Bulgarian rose and patchouli from India.

Xerjoff Nio – The best citrus fragrance In 1947, a terrible meteor shower fell to earth in Eastern Siberia, at the foot of the Sikhote-Alin mountain. Inspired by this event, the Italian Niche house Xerjoff launched the Shooting Star collection, and not just talking, the company specially attached a real piece of meteorite to each perfume bottle to make it stand out. My perfume bottles are special. Nio is a perfume bottle belonging to this Shooting Star collection, with the main scent being fresh lemon. Until now, when talking about perfumers that have the ability to blend smooth citrus scents, Xerjoff is always one of the first names mentioned, and it's no surprise that Nio is always one of the water bottles. The flower is known as the best citrus. Nio opens with an extremely authentic, fresh lemon scent. Not only can you smell the smell of fresh lemon, you can also feel the smell of lemon stem, lemon peel, and mixed in there is a little coolness from mint. It gives us a really fresh, refreshing feeling, reminding me of the feeling I had in the past when I went to a cafe and ordered lemon snow, a drink where people often grate lemon peel into it, and occasionally there would be a few pieces. The lemon was grated too big and was a bit too harsh. About 10 minutes later, when this scent calms down, you will begin to feel the orange blossom scent quite clearly, feeling the lemon scent is slightly more floral, somewhat soapy, clean and pleasant. Coming to the drydown after about 2 hours, what really surprised me was that the lemon scent still lingered on the skin and did not disappear, something that few citrus-dominant perfumes can do, combined with the scent of orange blossom. Combined with vetiver and a little woody scent as a background. Nio makes you feel like you're standing in the middle of a lemon garden, with the smell of lemons, the smell of lemon stems like when you pluck them from the branches, the smell of flowers, soil and trees. Maybe if you're not too careful. If you're passionate, if you like citrus scents too much, you'll find it's not too special. However, for me, a good citrus scent is one that can be made as realistic as possible, and Nio recreates it in an extremely realistic way. Another big plus is that Nio's citrus scent stays on the skin for about 6-7 hours, perhaps only the Xerjoff family can do this with this scent.

Montblanc Explorer Ultra Blue was launched in early 2021 with the hope of continuing the success of its elder brother Explorer. Taking the main scent of the sea, Ultra Blue does not go in the Aquatic direction like Aqva Pour Homme or Light Blue Eau Intense for men bottles, but has a salty sea scent, the salty feeling of sea salt combined with the scent of Bergamote from the country. Sicilian base and Ambergris create a quite pleasant vibe and finish with a gentle woody base. A bottle of perfume that's not too good, not too outstanding, but fresh and easy to use. For those who have been into perfume for a while, this may not be a must-have product. But for those new to perfume, this is absolutely a product you can consider owning because it is easy to use and cool for the summer.

Un Jardin Sur La Lagune was released in March 2019. Contained inside the bottle design illustrated by famous Bosnian artist Safet Zec, is a lively, soft fragrance accompanied by nostalgic emotions. Un Jardin sur la Lagune takes anyone who smells it to Venice, feeling the beauty of the secret garden that English Lord built on the water, in artificial lagoons in Venice and hidden from the eyes of the crowd by the paintings. stone wall.Un Jardin Sur La Lagune leads us to a poetic place from Italy, Venice. Christine Nagel said that she created this perfume bottle based on the idea of a mysterious garden of an English king located behind the walls in Venice. The most brilliant thing that Christine did was to combine the smell of flowers blooming in the garden with the smell of the canals, mixed with the smell of wet rocks. Un Jardin sur la Lagune opens seemingly with the scent of many flowers.

Montblanc announced its latest men's perfume in February 2019. 2019, called Montblanc Explorer, is an inspiring story about adventure, the search for success, challenging conventions and the desire to explore all limits. Strong and masculine design, the fragrance opens with a sophisticated blend of bergamot and pink pepper, fresh and warm in the two scent groups creating a different feeling, but the orange ingredient is Pushing it higher intelligently turns the topnote into a liberal, youthful and extremely fresh look, suitable for any space and time

Tresor in Love joined the Lancome perfume brand at the end of March 2010. This fragrance line was co-created by perfumers Dominique Ropion and Veronique Nyberg. The appeal of Tresor in Love is hidden in the aroma composition with the perfect blend of fruits and flowers on a quiet cedar wood base.

Pure XS men's perfume is suitable for people over 25 years old. This is the Paco Rabanne perfume line belonging to the Aromatic Spicy group.
