Apple Brandy on the Rocks by By Kilian is an Aromatic Fruity fragrance for women and men. This fresh opening of Apple Brandy on the Rocks unfolds into the perfume's core personality: a distinctive apple brandy accord, in which a crisp fruity blend harmonizes with brandy—recreated using notes of rum for the liquor aspect, moss and vanilla. Upon a core structure of cedarwood and ambroxan, the scent carries sophistication into the night. It captures the constant reincarnation and incontestable elegance of the 'Big Apple'—most especially that of its legendary nightlife.

Eternity For Women is a very successful perfume line by the house of Calvin Klein, launched in 1988 and created by mixologist Sophia Grojsman. Eternity is a hymn to eternal values: love, family and peace. The opening of this perfume bottle is the scent of citrus combined with green leaves, followed by the appeal of purple flowers, lilies and a little spiciness of carnations. The base note is a harmonious combination of musk, amber, sandalwood and heliotrope.

Gin and Tonic is a timeless classic cocktail both famous, with quite simple ingredients, including Gin and Tonic water. Tonic is a sparkling water with a slightly bitter taste, and when combined with the herbal character of Gin, along with a bit of pungency from the lemon peel, creates an extremely cool drink. and refreshing, extremely suitable for hot summer days. Normally, every time I go to a cocktail bar, I always start with a glass of Gin Tonic, it gives me a pleasant feeling of comfort before ordering other heavier drinks. Art de Parfum has captured the spirit of this drink quite well in its scent of the same name, as Gin and Tonic has a light herbal touch, from the use of juniper notes, an herb used In preparing Gin, combined with a bit of lemon peel and a very authentic grapefruit scent note, bringing a refreshing sourness but still sweet from grapefruit, balanced, with a bit of bitterness hidden behind, making the scent Just like you are sipping a cold Gin Tonic at a bar, with friends, enjoying the fun of summer together. After the initial refreshing note, Gin and Tonic leaves on the skin a clean base of cedarwood and vetiver, mixed with a bit of ambergris, giving the scent a very rounded ending. Another strong point of this perfume is that although it has a quite cool and pleasant scent profile, it is made at an Extrait de Parfum concentration so it has a relatively stable scent performance.

Product_name: The Scent Hugo Boss For Men
Description: HUGO BOSS introduces BOSS The Scent, a new seductive perfume for men. Irresistible and unforgettable, like a flavorful seduction, the fragrance releases sensuous notes of ginger, exotic maninka fruit and leather over time, enticing the senses. Add this best-selling fragrance to your daily routine for sophisticated masculinity.

Bois d'hiver, with a woody base mixed with white nutmeg. Right from the first spray, it reminded me of Tom Ford Oud Wood, even the opening part of this perfume smells much stronger than the current Oud Wood. If you are someone who has learned about perfume, I believe that many people will know the legend of Oud Wood with a gold stamp. If I remember correctly, those are bottles of Oud Wood produced from 2017, the smell is thick and rich. Quite a bit better than the current gray stamp Oud Wood. And Bois d'hiver it gives me the impression of being something in between the other two versions of Oud wood. The opening with spicy pepper and thick wood, the wood feels drier than Oud Wood, but because it doesn't use agarwood notes but instead uses a combo of cedar, sandalwood and patchouli, it feels clean and fresh. Brighter, and also has a slightly creamy sandalwood scent, along with a firm structure and better scent thickness than the current gray Oud Wood. Regarding the drydown, it won't change much from the beginning other than a slight sweetness of cardamom on a woody base. Basically, it gives us a very luxurious, elegant and sophisticated wood scent, which can be considered a brighter, more versatile and easier to spray version of Tom Ford Oud Wood, with better performance. If you like the luxurious, masculine, powerful vibe of Tom Ford Oud Wood, but find it not really versatile in the way that you can spray it every day, or find Tom Ford Oud Wood a bit 'dumb', then I believe it's for you. Bois d'hiver would be a reasonable choice.

The first thing I noticed when I sprayed Dior Sauvage Elixir on my hand was a citrus scent from citrus, but it's not as fresh as Dior. The original Sauvage, which is more compact and less intense and cools down quite quickly. Besides, we will clearly feel a warm and spicy feeling, slightly sweet from the spices of pepper, cinnamon and cardamom. If you are observant, you can also see the appearance of lavender in this opening. Everything seems to blend very smoothly, no one ingredient stands out too much but blends together perfectly. Perhaps Dior Sauvage Elixir is a more mature version, not as noisy and youthful as Sauvage EDT. Later, when the scent begins to really change, the lavender becomes more and more obvious. At this time, the smell of spices from cardamom and cinnamon is still there, still warm and slightly sweet. It seems a bit strange, but the sweetness here I think it reminds us a bit of licorice, but only a little. a little. At this stage I noticed more of a woody smell. I guess this is sandalwood because of the creamy, slightly powdery feel typical of this wood. In addition, the presence of amber in the background seems to support the above ingredients, evoking a pleasant warm and sweet feeling. About 2 hours later, Dior Sauvage Elixir softens on the skin, becoming a combo of amber and wood. The wood here is not only sandalwood, but also patchouli and vetiver, making the scent even more mature. and more masculine. A base that is warm, deep, luxurious and smells truly 'rich' as Dior describes the product on its homepage.

'Memories of Asia. In the depths of the jungle, ancient trees intertwine. The splendor of precious sandalwood and the crisp dryness of cedar, blend with the sparkle of exotic spices and the warmth of amber.' – a note from the brand.

Diaghilev by Roja Dove is a Chypre Fruity fragrance for women and men. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Cumin, Bergamot, Tarragon, Lemon, Orange and Lime; middle notes are Peach, Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine, Rose, Heliotrope, Violet, Black Currant and Tuberose; base notes are oak moss, Civet, Leather, Musk, Cloves, Labdanum, Patchouli, Peru Balsam, Benzoin, Ambrette (Musk Mallow), Vetyver, Guaiac Wood, Styrax, Nutmeg, Vanille, Cedar and Sandalwood.

Spices, wine and leather are the things we will smell most clearly in this water bottle. Talking about spices, it feels like a combination of many different spices, there is the mild but smooth spiciness of cinnamon, a little spicy black pepper, and the sweetness of tonka beans, wrapped and combined. Connected by rum, sometimes there is a hint of tobacco, it smells quite masculine. Overall, the smell of Man in Black reminds me a lot of Spice Bomb EDT version. However, if Spice Bomb EDT is, as its name suggests, a spice bomb, with a somewhat thorny and dusty muscular smell, then Man in Black will be a more balanced version, not biased towards one note. too much, it reminds me of an image of a gentleman who is courteous, neat and a little groomed, to the point of wearing all black like the name of this bottle is not but it is still a quite polite smell. A true designer perfume, to say whether it's special or not, I think not, it even feels like it doesn't have as strong a personality as Spice bomb EDT. But in terms of nose flattery, Man in Black probably doesn't mind any perfume bottles, every note is rounded, luxurious and polite like Bleu de Chanel.

Diptyque puts a modern twist on the fougere scent family through the use of a mint scent. The fresh mint scent of Eau De Minthé is combined with the depth of patchouli and enveloped by accents of rose and geranium.

Inheriting senior Allure Homme after 5 years of promotion is the famous younger brother Allure Homme Sport EDT of the Chanel brand. If you think that Allure Homme men's perfume still does not satisfy you, then Allure Homme Sport EDT will be the most convincing answer. You are a sports fan, you love the feeling of movement, the desire to conquer. Dressing at the peak, overcoming all challenges and immersing yourself in the spirit of victory, Chanel understood that and launched Allure Homme Sport. A fresh opening with citrus and marine scents brings refreshing comfort. Next is the masculine scent of pepper and cedar wood and ending with the scent of amber, musk, and vetiver, making the scent linger all day long.

The house of Prada launches La Femme Prada and L'Homme Prada in mid-2016. This new aromatic couple 'represents men and women meeting in an identical vision . She could be him, he could be her. She is an absolute woman, he is an absolute man. relationship between them. They can be lovers, friends or even strangers. Both have multiple identities. L'Homme Prada is a modern scent that combines classic Prada ingredients – amber and iris. There are also notes of neroli, geranium and patchouli. The characteristics of the perfume are described as airy, reserved and challenging.

Rose Of No Man's Land brings a very personal beauty with a rose that is neither sweet and feminine nor fresh and green with pink petals, but a thorny rose bush full of vitality. It opens with a pleasant, bright pink scent, with a hint of sweetness from pink pepper. Then the pink pepper develops further, pushing the coolness to a higher level, sparkling freshness with the appearance of sedge and amber adding dustiness and warmth to help balance the contrast. of this scent. As time goes on, Rose Of No Man's Land becomes more dusty and thorny, but hidden deep under the rough cover is still a bright rose intact as before.

L'Interdit Eau de Toilette by Givenchy is a Wood Woody scent for women. This is a new fragrance. L'Interdit Eau de Toilette was launched in 2019. L'Interdit Eau de Toilette was created by Dominique Ropion , Anne Flipo and Fanny Bal

Gentlemen Only is a modern homage to the classic scent of the house – Givenchy Gentlemen from 1974. This fragrance has been a revolution in strong masculine fragrance instead of the traditional and passionate scent of wood.

Good Girl Gone Bad by By Kilian is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Good Girl Gone Bad was launched in 2012. Top notes are Osmanthus, Jasmine and May Rose; middle notes are Indian Tuberose and Narcissus; base notes are Amber and Cedar.

Only The Brave is a scent for all men. he chose to be a hero. Its composition introduces a harmony of oriental wood notes that leaves a strong impression. The play of contrasts between fresh notes of lemon and mandarin with purple, cedar and coriander is leading us to warm amber tones along with skin tones (styrax and labdanum) and benzoin in one basis. The vibrancy of lemon introduces its glowing sparks above a romantic, floral heart and leaves a warm, resinous streak in the fragrance's base notes.

Product_name: Light Blue Pour Homme Eau Intense
Description: Light Blue Eau Intense Pour Homme men's perfume was launched in 2017. This is the Dolce&Gabbana perfume line belonging to the Woody Aquatic group (Sea wood scent). Alberto Morillas is the creator of this perfume. Light Blue Eau Intense Pour Homme has a long-lasting scent of over 6 hours and a very long distance scent - radiating fragrance within a radius of over 2 meters. This is a perfume bottle that is very suitable for summer and is quite popular with men.

This is the Diptyque perfume line belonging to the Floral Woody Musk group (Woody-Musk floral scent). Besides, Haitian Vetiver and Grapefruit are the two flavors you can easily feel when using this perfume. Unisex perfume Vetyverio Eau De Parfum is suitable for people over 25 years old, has a long lasting scent - 6 hours to 10 hours. Fragrance radiance is close - radiating fragrance within an arm's length.

Searching around the world of scent, to choose an easy woody scent note If you are the most tolerant, pleasant, flattering, and not too harsh, you can easily call the name Santal or Sandal or Sandalwood right away. Dry wood is smooth, clear, white, fatty, and smells truly unisex, these are things you can easily feel when you smell Sandalwood creations in the scent trend of recent years. In Santal Calling, although familiar notes such as sandalwood, milk and musk are used, the interesting thing here is the author's ingenious way of preparing scents along with the appearance of an ingredient used to make water bottles. This flower becomes strangely unique: Iris. According to common sense, irises often appear with a pale powdery appearance, giving a pleasant clean feeling, but at Santal Calling, irises come with a new look, succulent, lush purple petals. overflowing, so arrogant and inviting that I mistakenly thought it was a rose wet with morning dew. Iris plays the role of a beautiful young woman leaning against the warm but no less gentle sandalwood shoulder, and then at some point the actor returns to the true nature of the smooth, pure powder. That's when the sweet, sweet milk flows, carrying the musk and everything blends into one, giving us an extremely pleasant, soft, woody scent that is easy to sympathize with and absolutely beautiful on the skin. both men and women. Not noisy and hasty but very slow, skillful and sophisticated, that's how Santal Calling captivated me.

Delina just hearing her name makes us feel that this is truly a proud and extremely noble girl. Delina makes the first impression with Turkish Rose, like a dance that captivates the sense of smell, filled with the passion of peony and the sweetness of lychee. The mystery and arrogance hidden under the interaction of Musk and the scent of Cashmeran, makes all eyes stop just because they want to look at Delina a little longer. Parfums de Marly Delina is like that, nobility and luxury with the breath of royalty, arrogance but always retaining the essence and charisma of intelligent and experienced girls. To reach Parfums de Marly Delina is really difficult, when there is so much admiration for her, but to resist her attractive charm is impossible.

Flower is a perfume line for women, introduced in 2000. Kenzo Flower belongs to the oriental floral fragrance group. The creator of this perfume line is Alberto Morillas. This floral scent is built on three basic scents: rose, jasmine, and musk. Floral notes blend Parma violet with wild camellia and Bulgarian rose. As for the powdery scents, they include vanilla and musk with a slight woody scent hidden in there.

This fragrant aquatic scent carries gives men energy and refreshment with marine scent notes. Aqva Pour Homme begins with fresh aromas of petit grain and citrus. The heart of the perfume features Posidonia Oceanica seaweed. The base is extremely masculine due to amber minerals and woody notes.

1 Million EDT by Paco Rabanne belongs to the Woody Spicy group ) was launched in 2008. Men's perfume 1 Million EDT is most suitable for men over 25 years old. This is a perfume line with a very long lasting scent - over 8 hours. 1 Million EDT is suitable for use. day and night in the fall and winter. Besides, Cinnamon, Amber and Leather are the three scents you can easily feel when using this perfume.

Blackberry & Bay by Jo Malone London is a Fruity floral scent for women. Blackberry & Bay was launched in 2012. The nose behind this scent is Fabrice Pellegrin. Characteristic aromas of grapefruit, floral notes, vetiver, cedar, blackberry and bay leaf.
An overpowering for a delicate fragrance , based on a rose, violet scent, melted with sandalwood and coffee. An attractive and mysterious fragrance.

Paco Rabanne launches Invictus, the new fragrance for men, representing fresh creativity and sports. The fragrance appeared in July 2013. Invictus, Latin for 'invincible', represents strength, dynamism and energy, representing victory, freedom and desire The intensity of men who want to conquer their highest limits. Opening with the fresh scent of sea water and Grapefruit, strong as ocean waves, but still present the scent of an undefeated person in every arena, Bay Leaf is cleverly added with a masculine scent. of Guaiac Wood. If you are a confident, optimistic, open-minded guy who loves freedom and no constraints, Paco Rabanne Invictus is a wise choice and will never disappoint you.

Nawab of Oudh opens with a citrus feeling accompanied by green and aldehyde notes, smells bright and overall creates a pleasant, slightly effervescent herbal scent. However, the beauty of the scent lies in the latter part. The initial fresh green feeling quickly subsided after about 10 minutes, it was still there but was no longer thick, and began to smell of flowers and spices clearly. The flower here is rose, slightly green and dark, earthy, and the spices are cinnamon and pimento chili, the smell is slightly spicy and we vaguely notice the appearance of agarwood. The basswood has a feeling of not being dark but smooth, but also feels green and tinged with tree sap. Sprayed on the skin, it takes more than 1 hour for it to dry down into a scent of agarwood and roses, with a little spice for a slightly spicy and herbal feeling, smelling very luxurious, elegant and fragrant, really fragrant. Another interesting thing about this perfume bottle is the smell effect it brings, when you bring it close to your nose and smell it, you will find the smell is quite moderate, not thick but extremely suitable, without a strong feeling. into the nose when uncomfortable, it is quite surprising that even so, the smell radiates very far away, you stand about 2 meters away and can still clearly see a pink and deep accord, the light sweet smell is very natural and pleasant. Just imagine that you spray this scent and just sit in a space like a coffee shop or a company meeting, for example, and in just a moment, everyone around you will see a very luxurious, very pleasant scent. have to wonder where it comes from. Certainly not many scents can do this like the Nawab of Oudh. Nawab of Oudh is a quite complex scent but it changes smoothly, easy to smell and like but not easy to grasp. Sometimes we see rosewood seasoned with a little ambergris, evoking a feeling of luxury and elegance. Sometimes it's spicy, spiced with a bit of floral and woody, deeply sweet and inviting, easily surprising even those with a lot of experience with perfume. Its scent is really stimulating to the sense of smell, alluring, but sophisticated and mature, not sloppy. This will be a bottle for those who like luxury, class, and elegance, not in the direction of being loud and ostentatious, but rather sparing words but each word spoken is firm and decisive, making those around them always feel safe. .

Oud & Musk by Label is a fragrance for women and men. Oud & Musk was launched in 2021. The nose behind this fragrance is Angela Ciampagna. Top notes are Tagetes and Bitter Orange; middle notes are Raspberry, Cumin and Black Pepper; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Leather, Musk, Vetiver, Cedar and Amber.

Chance, the new fragrance from Chanel, is an unexpected combination , is the collision of endless waves of fresh floral scent, exuding a passionate charm. Chanel Chance perfume has a name that evokes a mythical feeling. If Chanel and Chance have similar pronunciations, it's not just because of luck, it's also because 'they were created for each other'. Like fresh waves, mixed with fragrant flowers and special scent ingredients, Chanel Chance becomes very sexy and sweet, surprisingly feminine, full of vitality, boldly mixed. A little sexy and naughty.

The scent of jasmine and Tulip is smooth, clear, clean, containing a love as pure and clear as a match. first love. Mixed in with the floral scent is a warm spice of pink pepper, mixed with a bit of smoke, an extremely attractive touch. But that doesn't mean the sweet floral scent is overwhelmed, jasmine and Tulip still appear clearly, giving Fox in the Flowerbed a gentle, colorless, but memorable enough look. Basically, when spraying Fox in the Flowerbed, I feel like the scent has a very unique freshness and sometimes feels a bit strange without understanding. The interesting thing is that it reminds me of fake scent notes. The idea of this perfume is Alpine Air. There appears the image of the majestic wild foothills of the Alps, where, still untouched by human impact, snow wolves with golden fur suddenly appear and appear like playing hide and seek... A floral scent helps diffuse great beauty in everything. Fox in the Flowerbed is a versatile perfume that lifts the mood during the day and brings elegance and luxury to nights out.

Winter Green from indie perfume house Dasein is probably a very special scent, to the point that I think it could become anyone's Signature Scent. Usually when mentioning mint notes, everyone will think of a cool, pleasant minty state that is only suitable for use on summer days. A few quick options can be mentioned such as Dame Minty. Man or Dirty by Lush. However, Winter Green offers a quite different mint shade, and is completely easy to use on cold days. This perfume bottle opens with the cool green mint feeling typical of mint, a bit like some kind of candy. And luckily, the mint in this perfume bottle does not have the lifeless mint effect like toothpaste or mouthwash that many mint-based perfume bottles have. Smells refreshing and very good. After a while, the mint begins to calm down, the pine wood becomes more and more evident, the wood and mint are balanced, complementary, not overwhelming each other. At the end, we see a sweet, sticky feeling of beeswax appearing, persistent and blooming on the skin, the more it spreads, the more pleasant it becomes and makes the person smelling it strangely warm. For me personally, Winter Green not only brings the coolness of snow and the wind that blows through the last days of the year, but also has an unmistakable shade of warm pine wood, bringing a warm feeling when looking at it. everyone happily walked around the streets on a sunny afternoon, and it seemed like it had a Christmas atmosphere.

Acqua Di Gio Profumo , elegant, airy and deep. The fragrance symbolizes the fusion of ocean waves with black stones. Acqua di Gio Profumo is an aquatic, aromatic, woody and spicy composition, like the original, signed by Alberto Morillas. It opens with fresh aquatic plants and bergamot. Its heart captures the aromatic tones of geranium, sage and rosemary, set against a base of patchouli and incense.

Product_name: Etat Libre D’orange You Or Someone Like You
Description: You or someone like you is a romantic name, similar to the lyrics of a certain song, or the title of a novel, perhaps evoking a loved one. But when I smelled 'You' for the first time, I realized that this scent is more like an old garden than an old person. Certainly You or some one like you is a soothing friend for summer, very easy Yes, this is the scent I would recommend for everyone to wear on crisp, sunny days. Spray lightly on the wrist, the scent touches the nose with a slightly sour, fresh and refreshing orange scent. Lifting your hand through the leaves, the mint scent exudes bright, high-pitched, cool, not too strong to make the scent remind of gum candies, but just enough to make the scent clear and cool. Flowers are also Fragrance notes are present in the corner of the garden of You or someone like you, flowers do not stand out, but only contribute scent with mint, leaves, and fragrant lemon, bright and harmonious. Sometimes it smells like early roses, sometimes it smells like gentle violet, quite soft. Smelling 'You' on a man gives a feeling of peace and tranquility, while on a woman's skin, the scent is innocent and pleasant.

There are many people Hacivat is considered a high-end 'clone' of Aventus with a not cheap price, but is mainly pineapple and has a concentration of Extrait de Parfums, an essential oil concentration that is considered almost the highest in the world. perfume world. So is Hacivat really like Aventus? For me the answer is no, if on the skin Aventus when drydown has quite a strong scent of ambergris, a bit of pineapple and wood, then Hacivat has a strong smell of pineapple and citrus fruits, you can still smell the wood scent but not clearly. . Perhaps if we say the same, Hacivat will only resemble Aventus in the opening part. Personally, I like Hacivat more, the strong fruity smell gives a really juicy feeling, on the skin it feels like dancing and playing, more liberal and youthful. I'm not criticizing Aventus here, to me Aventus is very good, but it feels luxurious and has something dignified, solid and experienced, and personally, I like the youthfulness and vitality of Hacivat.

The first time I sprayed Masculin Pluriel, I thought of the smell of an aftershave bottle that my father used to use. When I was a child, I sat on my father's lap and kept inhaling that gentle, cool scent. Europe is probably another reason why I love these classic scents. As soon as I sprayed it, I was a bit surprised because the lavender rushed straight into my nose, strong, thick, somewhat 'strong' and slightly powdery and cool. After a while, the change in scent caught my attention and was extremely enjoyable, the lavender slowly faded away and gradually revealed the cedar wood and a bit of vetiver, which was extremely gentle and masculine. As time goes on, the wood becomes thicker, with the presence of patchouli, which all makes me feel like I'm standing in front of a large old tree in the middle of a lavender field, each cool breeze blowing by bringing a little scent. The moist soil of vetiver grass. Like most other barbershop scents, in addition to the wood base and lavender, we will find a very delicate, slightly sweet scent that flatters the nose without being overwhelming. The scent is not overwhelming, but lingers on the skin very moderately, delicately, enough for a working day. Next to Prada Lhomme, this creation by Maison Francis Kurkdjian is the scent I use the most for writing. room. A scent of cleanliness, neatness, elegance, somewhat classic but not old. Surely you have heard the saying somewhere that every guy needs a pair of Oxford shoes and a suit, I would like to add to the politeness and grooming that is Masculin Pluriel. On days when I go to work and need something nice to smell to start the day, I always choose this elegant perfume.

Eternity For Men is a The masculine, fresh scent of the famous brand Calvin Klein was created by Carlos Benaim in 1990. A classic perfume with a cool opening of citrus and lavender. Later, the scent gradually changes to ingredients such as sage leaves, basil, jasmine and ends with a warm spicy touch of sandalwood, amber, vetiver and musk.

What is a fragrance experience worthy of class – Baccarat Rouge 540 Extrait de Parfum. Well, if anyone has ever tried the scent of this super luxurious perfume bottle, I dare to confirm that out of 100 people who smell it, 99.9 will like it. . Baccarat Rouge 540 Extrait de Parfum was launched in 2017 and received many compliments from a large community of perfume lovers. They think that this is a product line that is so attractive that it knows how to stimulate a sense of possession with a scent that can please both men and women. The scent of this perfume bottle is also extremely long lasting, with a good base it can last up to 12 hours on the skin according to user feedback and the special thing is that the level of scent retention is also very stable. Francis Kurkdjian with artistic hands and The creative talent has cleverly combined Almond, saffron, Cedarwood, musk and Ambergris in extremely harmonious harmony. He brought a valuable red crystal that made its owner fall in love at first sight. Perhaps the only concern when choosing Baccarat Rouge 540 Extrait de Parfum is that its price is quite high. But if you have the chance, I really recommend you to experience and feel it.

To talk about Le Male Elixir, maybe I will compare it with Other bottles in the Le Male set for readers to easily visualize. Compared to the Le Male Le Parfum version, it will be much sweeter, still vanilla, still lavender, but it will replace the cardamom spice with Tonka beans, darkly sweet and slightly with the greasy feeling of almonds. In addition, it is easy to see the presence of honey as well as myrrh, along with a bit of dried tobacco. So the overall smell is quite sweet, with a certain depth thanks to the notes of tonka bean and tobacco. It even reminds us a bit of Xerjoff's Naxos, which is understandable because the notes are quite similar, but if you compare Naxos with Le Male Elixir it will really be lame. It doesn't show me a real color or personality like the rest of the hits in Collection Le Male. The original Le Male can be used by anyone who likes a little sweetness in the classic style, like an entry for those who want to approach Jean Paul Gaultier. Ultra Male is sweet, outstandingly sweet and noisy for confident people who like to be the center of attention in the crowd, Le Male Le Parfum is a more mature and less noisy version of Ultra Male. As for Le Male Elixir, when placed next to the things just mentioned it feels vague, not really clear. It will still meet the basic needs of a scent, but if you can only choose one bottle, I recommend you consider 1 of the 4 bottles to see which version you are, and make the right choice. suitable.

So Blue opens with fresh fruit scents such as Lemon, Orange, and Tangerine, uniquely blended with the scent of Pepper and the sweetness of Fruit. The middle note opens with the main notes of flowers, including Bulgarian Rose and Purple flower, enhanced with the scent of the Sea and Patchouli. At the end of the fragrant walk are warm notes at the end such as Amber, Musk, Vanilla... So Blue is like a glass of juicy, cool fruit Soda next to the blue beach that everyone loves. want to enjoy

Olympea EDP women's perfume was born based on the idea of turning a woman into a goddess in modern, evocative Greek mythology. Increase the power of seduction, conquering all eyes around you. The fragrance was developed by Loc Dong and Anne Flipo. Asked Loc Dong what was special about his perfume, Loc said it was special because of the contrast between different shades and the unexpected combination of scents. It seems difficult to go together. A woman's sexy code is also a combination of opposing aspects within her: salty and sweet, floral and woody, arrogant so people want to explore but also warm and passionate so people want to hug. forever in my heart. Hugging forever to taste that skin like tasting vanilla ice cream and sea salt tonight.

At the time I am writing this article, it is the end of 2023, Another 13 was and still is one of the most famous and sought after contemporary scents. Another 13's main scent ingredients are Ambroxan (an artificial compound of Ambergris), Iso E super (an artificial substance with amber and cedarwood profiles), musk and a little fruity touch from pear, overall. Creates a musky scent that smells quite strange to your nose if you don't have much experience with perfume. A familiar sample essay that many people have never tired of talking about for many years about Another 13 is the vivid scent on the skin, sprayed on each person's skin differently, suddenly disappearing and suddenly appearing, the scent of bare flesh. bare, etc. and cloudy. I also used to be a big fan of this perfume about 3 or 4 years ago. But now I'm not so excited about it anymore. In fact, for me personally, Another 13 is not that divine, it is not a scent that is difficult to detect, it seems like it is being sprayed but it is not. I can confirm that those who are familiar with smelling perfume will immediately recognize it, because the Ambroxan in this perfume bottle smells extremely unique, greasy, slightly dry, it always exudes that characteristic. Even on test paper, not on the skin. However, because it contains a large amount of Iso E super, a substance that interacts with the skin, I always advise customers to spray this bottle on their body to get the best experience of the smell. At the present time, no matter if this bottle smells good or not, I will still say yes. However, now it's too uniform, you can find it anywhere, so my opinion is that if you don't care about that popularity, like the smell of Another 13 and If you're willing to spend about 6.7 million for a bottle of iconic perfume, take a photo and everyone will know what it is, then it's still worth buying. If you value uniqueness and difference, I can confirm that Another 13 will not really meet your needs, and there are many other, much better options that you can consider. .
This is the Tom Ford perfume line belonging to the Oriental Floral group. Besides, Gardenia and White Lily are the two scents you can easily feel when using this perfume.

Guilty is water Gucci flower orienal flower was introduced on the market in September 2010. It is designed for charming, bold, brave and very sexy girls who like to party and enjoy. The face of the advertising campaign is Evan Rachel Wood, singer and actress. Gucci Guilty contains notes of mandarin, pink pepper, peach, lilac, geranium, amber and patchouli.

Chanel Chance Perfume Eau Tendre Eau de Parfum belongs to the Floral Fruity scent group. The Grapefruit and Quince scent starts with lightness, simplicity but sophistication. Chance Eau Tendre Eau de Parfum is considered a beautiful girl with flowing hair, a gentle smile and a 'clean' scent. Jasmine and Rose make her sweet but not harsh, and all attention will be focused on the final scent note of Chance Eau Tendre Eau de Parfum, White Musk. If you are a fan of musk, and also love the freshness of floral scents, then never miss this gentle Chanel Chance Eau Tendre Eau de Parfum

Product_name: Light Blue Italian Love Pour Homme
Description: Launched in the summer of 2022, it can be said that Light Blue Italian Love Pour Homme has many similarities with its predecessor Light Blue Forever launched last summer. It's still the Citrus - Ozonic scent accord at the beginning and dries down to a gentle, clean, masculine wood base. So what is the difference between these two versions? Light Blue Italian Love Pour Homme has an opening that is quite similar to its predecessor, Light Blue Forever. The smell of grapefruit is very authentic, however, while in Forever it is pure grapefruit scent and only a little bit of citrus, then in Italian Love Pour Homme, we have grapefruit and bergamote blended together very evenly, neither one of them dominates. which. Bergamote seems to make the scent smoother and more flattering to the nose. As the scent calms down, we begin to feel the scent has a slightly green scent along with a light Ozonic feeling that makes us feel extremely comfortable, especially on hot summer days. After about 2 hours, the scent completely dries down, we see a gentle citrus scent, along with wood creating a masculine feeling, at the same time the scent also has a slightly soapy, clean, very versatile and almost can be used. Use for all occasions. Italian Love Pour Homme is also a perfume bottle with extremely good scent retention, it lasts on my skin for about 7 hours, it can be said to be very good with such a scent profile. If you don't like the strong, slightly bitter scent. Grapefruit features Light Blue Forever, then I think Italian Love Pour Homme would be a perfect choice. This scent along with Light Blue Forever released last year really makes D&G perfume fans like me happy to have such great new products released every year. However, there is one point you need to note, that Italian Love is a Limited Edition version, so it will soon be SOLD OUT, don't hesitate if you want to own this scent...

The EDP version is considered a different interpretation of the scent, with the main notes reinforced and fortified. This version shows more personality, is bolder, more passionate and tougher. Here, the French vanilla scent has been changed to the Madagascar bourbon vanilla scent, making the scent richer and deeper, combined with the scent of vanilla bean shells. And above all, the strong scent of agarwood and amber completes the vanilla scent with its wild and leathery character.

Jo Malone presents new fragrances, English Pear and Freesia, which combine the English landscapes and seasons connected with the soul of the British people. The inspiration for this scent is also the verses of one of the last great Romantic poets, John Keats (Ode to Autumn). Jo Malone's creative studio chose a perfumer for this collection. That Christine Nagel is known for many successful creations (Miss Dior Cherie, Narciso Rodriguez, Rose Absolue, Delices, etc.). The aroma is ripe, juicy and well designed. The nuances of freesia and pear are very complex, since ripe pear is necessary to achieve a certain note to sound unique in the composition of the perfume. Pears in the moment of perfect ripeness have a crisp texture of skin and juicy fruit. Pear combined with quince introduces the sweetness of honey and is surrounded with white freesia and wild climbing roses. A base of the composition is created from the green, fresh and sour nuances of rhubarb along with the warm and delicate aromas of patchouli, amber and white musk that linger in a trace.

If Roasted Coffee smells too mainstream and gentle, or Burning Ben is too strong and dusty, then for me SM Cafe would probably be the smell. It will be very suitable for people who like coffee at a 'moderate' level, without requiring a smell that is too gentle or too difficult to use. SM Cafe smells luxurious, dark and very authentic. The opening is like a cup of bitter black coffee, mixed with a little milk to make it easier to drink, not like 'Please give me a cup of coffee with lots of milk, I'll drink it so I don't get drunk'. Like Roasted Coffee, here I can also clearly see the characteristic gentle aroma of dark chocolate, in addition to the slightly woody scent of cedar wood, it feels like we are sitting and sipping a cup of beloved coffee. I like to stay at an old familiar restaurant, for me it's probably Xoan at Nga Tu So. Later, SM Cafe became dry and less sweet. At this time, we only see a taste of black coffee mixed with leather and wood, and the smoky smell of tobacco. Masculine, contemplative, reserved, perhaps those are the words that I find very suitable to talk about the drydown of this scent. If you're a 'serious' fan of Coffee and looking for it in perfume, you should try Strangers' coffee creations, especially SM Cafe.

In Lost Alice, we can clearly feel the milky scent accompanying the burst of bergamote right from the moment of spraying. After just a few minutes, the orange calms down, the milk becomes warm, sweet and creamy, along with the creamy sandalwood, creating a smell effect as if we were in front of a tray of cakes with all kinds of cakes from cream cakes to macaroons. to cupcakes. Not only that, if you smell carefully you will see the scent has a slightly powdery feeling typical of carrots, reminding us of carrot cake, which is also a very typical British cake, especially in the past. tea party. Along with that, the smell of earl gray tea is also quite clear, smelling astringent and slightly bitter, it makes the sweetness moderate and very delicate, giving us the feeling of enjoying an English afternoon tea. same friends. Lost Alice is a scent that is quite easy to smell, easy to like and flatter the nose, suitable for those who are looking for a sweet scent but not in the direction of the masses, still keeping their own luxurious and splendid features, with something that is typical of an English lady.

The bright pink transparent glass bottle with a silver bow neatly tied at the neck of the bottle has Probably nothing strange to those who love Dior fragrances. Miss dior edt 2019 too! This 2019 version is made quite similar to the old 2013 version but will tend to be fresher. Miss Dior 2019 is a special scent for spring and summer. Not too many ingredients in a quality perfume bottle but not inferior in scent. Girls who like elegance should definitely consider buying Miss Dior 2019 for themselves.

Nautica Voyage is a fresh and salty sea breeze, carrying the romantic scent of herbs and coastal forests, and awakening instincts of man to measure his strength against wild nature. This is a scent for an active and romantic man who lives by his own rules. The face of the scent is the TV presenter Caster Oosterhouse, a true romantic and a good person.

Back to Black is the bottle The perfume revolves around two main scent notes: tobacco and honey, and is made very seriously, each note is a note. The tobacco here smells quite raw, thick and clear, a bit harsh, especially when first sprayed. In fact, if you have ever experienced pipe tobacco, or self-rolled tobacco, you will immediately understand the smell of tobacco at Back to Black. Besides, the honey here is also thick, sweet and also contributes to the tobacco making this bottle feel dry when sprayed. This has two sides, for those who have been exposed to perfume for a long time, their noses are capable of smelling strong scents and will enjoy it, but on the contrary, it will be difficult for newbies to approach. After being on the skin for about 15 or 20 minutes, the smell will begin to soften and will no longer be as strong as at first. You will also feel that the tobacco is now supplemented by a fruity touch from cherry, the smell begins to be much gentler and flattering than at first. The honey will remain thick and syrupy, and it will soften quite slowly. If you pay close attention, you will see the appearance of a few other notes such as tonka beans and almonds, but they are quite difficult to notice, perhaps because the honey here is too dark and thick, so it overwhelms everything else. . The interesting point is that when you bring it close to your nose and smell it, it smells like that, but when you spray it on your skin and let the smell radiate, you also feel like a fine chocolate is melting, sweet and smells very warm, this will It's the type of scent that the colder it is, the more pleasant you will feel when you spray it. If you are a serious perfumer, and also seriously like tobacco notes, then Back to Black is definitely a scent not to be missed.

Angels's Share is probably the best and most notable perfume bottle in Kilian's The Liquors collection launched in 2020. Just sprayed, there is a warm, boozy feeling that easily makes people dizzy of Cognac combined with the slightly spicy scent of cinnamon, followed by sweet and attractive Vanilla. If you smell carefully, you will be able to feel the presence of oak, and this is also a point that makes me quite excited because people often store wine and age it in oak barrels, feeling like is that the perfumer is really very delicate and takes care of every detail of the scent to do so. Everything is blended extremely smoothly, very flattering and pleasant. When the scent gradually subsides, I still feel a slight cigarette smell on my skin, something a bit smoky. Cinnamon appears more and more clearly, combined with Vanilla, making us want to raise our hands and smell it forever. Regarding drydown, the sweetness fades away, gradually transforming into a woody, cinnamon base, now it is a moderately sweet accord, warm like being in a lover's arms.

The design of the Dior Homme 2020 version is still based on the old shape, however the Dior Homme brand has been made more prominent with an extremely luxurious clear bottle cap. Dior Sauvage Parfum is the latest version of Dior's perfume collection in the Sauvage line, continuing the success of the Sauvage EDT and Sauvage EDP versions. A new version is designed more boldly but still retains the core DNA that makes Dior Sauvage's famous 'Lady Killer' brand. Cape Heartache is the best-selling perfume bottle of the American perfume house Imaginary Authors. Many people say that smelling Cape Heartache makes them feel like they are traveling to Da Lat or some high mountain area, away from the hustle and bustle of the urban area to find peace, temporarily putting aside the hustle and bustle of the city. fatigue and anxiety in life. Cape Heartache seems to take us back to a romantic mountainside in the early morning, when the sunlight has not yet shined through the fog, close your eyes, enjoy the fresh morning air, the cool wind rustling. Bringing with it the scent of pine resin, wood, oak moss, ripe wild strawberry clusters, luxuriant green plants clinging to the slopes,... From the moment we spray it, we can clearly feel it. It has a very thick pine scent, mixed with a slight burning feeling from Pine Resin. The scent will later soften and become smoother, at this point we will have a strawberry scent on the wood, with a faint sweet smell of Vanilla leaves somewhere. We see the sophistication of Josh Meyers when making this scent, when the sweet, warm and mellow sweetness of Vanilla is expressed through Vanilla Leaf (A plant that smells like Vanilla), everything is perfect and perfect. The details are amazing as how can we find Vanilla in the middle of a mountainside? And so Perfumer was very clever when instead of using Vanilla in this perfume, he used a similar smelling plant. Smelling Cape Heartache, there is something very peaceful, quiet, and peaceful. An entire scene is recreated with just a bottle of perfume, so beautiful and fragrant...

Do Son perfume of Diptyque brand is a perfume bottle of the floral scent line for women and has been launched in 2005. Fabrice Pellegrin is the one who refined this fragrance. Do Son was inspired by Yves Coueslant's childhood when he lived in Vietnam, in Hai Phong, where he grew up. Not far from the city, is Do Son resort, where his father built a temple next to the beach so the family could retreat and enjoy the sea air at the end of the day. Do Son's scent evokes memories of the sea. The memory of this place, which was filled with the scent of flowers, especially the lilies that his mother loved so much. In the perfume, tuberose and Turkish rose exude a sweet taste that is made more refreshing with leafy notes of orange blossom and pepper. White musk and iris add a light powdery scent to the perfume.

Like a paper map clearly marked with ink and printer guiding principle, Dior Homme Original is a journey that leads us from the sense of smell, to the heart and then lands in the soul of anyone who accidentally hears this trendy scent. Sparking a little youthful excitement, Bergamot was quickly added, softening the square scent with its characteristic pleasant sweetness.

Ultra Male is known as the king of floor bars, with an opening of sweet, succulent pear accompanied by vanilla. Add a little freshness from mint and lavender, citrus and warm, spicy cinnamon. And of course, in crowded bars where everyone wears perfume, using scents like Ultra Male will make you extremely stand out, becoming a real 'hunter'. In 9PM, instead of taking the main fruit flavor of ripe, sweet and succulent pear like Ultra Male, Afnan used green apple. The effect of green apple, cinnamon, and vanilla together is as outstanding as Ultra Male, but I feel like the scent will be dark and not as fresh at first as the monument from Jean Paul Gaultier. Product_name: 8 Days a Week I love you
Description: Have you ever Have you ever heard the immortal song by the legendary group The Beatles called '8 days a week'? To me, most of this group's songs can be summed up in terms of the love I only give to you, 8 days a week is no exception. And Astrophil Stella was very clever in choosing the name '8 Days a Week I love you' for her scent creation, with the hope that in terms of a gift, you can express your gratitude. 8 Days a Week I love you opens with a very green scent accompanied by a slight sourness of citrus. I feel this scent is similar to some of the creations I have smelled. , but it's absolutely impossible to guess exactly which scent it is. A slight scent of soft white flowers, slightly creamy, smooth, clean and pleasant. Later on, the white flowers become clearer, the orange flowers are clear and full of vitality, the jasmine blossoms and the clean, powdery scent of iris makes the scent more feminine. Towards the end, we notice that the floral scent is still full of vitality in 8 Days a Week I love you, but at this time the wood appears quite gently, as a background for the flowers to bloom. Is it true that, with a pure love, intensely, is 8 days a week enough?

In this sunny weather, does anyone crave a glass of MANGO SPICES topped with fresh, sweet, pure COCONUT JUICE like this? ' The first smoothie has the green taste of leaves, the tangy taste of figs, and the gentle ripe sour taste of tropical fruits, specifically mango. It doesn't surprise me, nor can I imagine what the Moon in Heaven is really like, but the beginning of the scent really makes me smile. The fruit is clearly fragrant and blends well. After about 40 minutes, the green taste of the leaves fades away, the Moonlight becomes immense, gentle, soothing, comforting, and ecstatic. Moonlight does not make me admire with its novelty or surprise, but makes me continuously inhale the skin coated with the delicious scent of fruit mixed with colostrum, lovely and full of pampering. Moonlight in Heaven by By Kilian made me have a strange moonlit night. By Kilian is sometimes fierce, sometimes gentle, but this time he is delicate and delicate, always knowing how to please Women. From the elaborate shape of the perfume bottle, to the stylish way of naming the scents. Monlight In heaven sounds not sad but extremely romantic. Designed with a deep, eye-catching blue color. Moonlight in Heaven is suitable for use both day and night in spring and summer. Besides, Mango and Coconut are the two scents you can easily feel when using this perfume.

There are many memories of summer worth remembering such as family trips or In the afternoons, I invite a few friends to go swimming,... but I just want to forget the smell of sweat from people I come into contact with or from myself. DIOR HOMME SPORT is truly the savior of many people, including myself. After sweaty sports sessions, I am also sometimes the matchmaker for not-so-cool dates. What I like most is that it radiates very far even when I'm sweating profusely. What stands out most in this perfume bottle is the scent of red orange and yellow lemon. The first impression when taking in this bottle of Sport is grapefruit, red orange, lemon, and pear. Behind the freshness is the warmth of red pepper, nutmeg and the fragrance of geraniums. Speaking of Hermes, but also office perfumes, everyone usually only think of Terre D'Hermes. However, it would be a mistake to omit H24. To briefly describe this perfume, I think it is a modern scent but still has something very classic and sophisticated. That's probably enough to understand, it will be extremely suitable for men who work in the office, or those who pursue a minimalist style. Unlike Terre D'Hermes, which is a dusty masculine scent, a classic male image, modern H24 is much more youthful, feels a bit metallic on the skin, fresh and fruity, quite flattering. Nose, there's something clean and comfortable like you just took a shower, extremely suitable for use in the summer. It gives me a unique, interesting feeling, something out of the rut of modern perfume bottles that have been refilled for the past decade, something new and of course, rarely used. I believe H24 is definitely a scent that deserves to be better known from Hermes.

Replica Autumn vibes is the whole autumn wrapped in a bottle of water flower. ', Miss Dior is like a declaration of love dedicated to young and enthusiastic women. Dark Lord men's perfume is suitable for people of all ages. Dark Lord is suitable for use both day and night in the fall and winter. This is the By Kilian perfume line of the Leather group. Besides, Rum and Leather are the two scents you can easily feel when using this perfume.

Have you ever used Have you tried a bottle of perfume that has the same 'effervescent' effect as when you first open a bottle of carbonated water? That's exactly how L'Orchestre surprised me with Electro Limonade. Sprayed on the skin, Electro Limonade immediately reminds me of putting an effervescent C pill in a glass of cold water. In fact, it is not uncommon for scents to have the effervescent C effect I just described, however, most of the perfume bottles of that type that I have smelled will have a slightly... medicinal vibe, not real and smelly. something that makes us not 'have'. Electro Limonade is quite smooth, the citrus is real, there is a bit of cool mint that easily makes us feel refreshed. However, the scent develops in a rather safe and unrelated direction, with a wood base that is quite clean, gentle and sprinkled with a little incense, so it feels quite masculine. I don't understand the intention of the scent behind Electro Limonade as I can't see the connection between the ends of the scent, so there's not much to comment on. If anything, it's a safe, clean and easy-to-use scent, but with L'Orchestre's price, I think you should try it directly before buying, or consider Flamenco Neroli which would be better...

Basically, Delina Hair Mist will be a lighter version of Delina but still retains the same scent structure. Because it is a hairspray perfume product, there will be much less alcohol. June 2017, in cooperation with PUIG. Scandal is designed to break every mold so far, offering something new and modern, at the same time powerful and elegant. Readers can easily see that people often describe Black Phantom is described as a sweet, playful, attractive, seductive, luxurious scent and all kinds of other beautiful words. Maybe I'll excuse myself from repeating those anymore, and just want to talk about what I appreciate about this scent. Smell carefully, and experience enough Black Phantom, you will clearly see the feeling of a slightly burnt, bitter roasted coffee smell, that bitter feeling is amplified by the bitterness coming from the expensive bar of dark chocolate. For me, Black Phantom does an extremely good job, portraying them realistically, and the beauty of it is that they are covered with caramel notes along with sugar, mixed with a little rum, a type of wine made from molasses, So if you smell carefully, behind the sweetness of Black Phantom, you will clearly see the two notes mentioned above. It gives us a scent that seems sweet, vibrant, noisy, but in fact has a lot of depth, bringing a feeling of luxury, appeal, and a bit mysterious and magical, just like the scent. its name.

A wonderfully delicate, extremely powdery fragrance from the blacksmith Mancera. The scent drips on the skin and it feels like a silk scarf touching the skin very gently as you pass by. Powdery, elegant white with a gentle floral effect – a noble fragrance experience that will please fans of sophistication and at the same time experience intense fragrance.

If you are a fan of Gourmand scents (Food-scented perfumes), you definitely cannot miss Byzance, the perfume bottle in the La Route de la So Feelings collection. Inspired by the famous Silk Road in history. Although made in the direction of Gourmand, it stands out with a milky scent, but it would be unfair to think that this is a sweet scent in the style of 'headache'. Byzance is moderately sweet, on the skin it feels like blackcurrant, quite similar to cherry, creating a luxurious but also extremely pleasant feeling. When the scent settles on the skin, we will see the appearance of wood and vanilla. At this time, the milk scent softens quite a lot, playing the role of pushing the wood and vanilla combo to have a very pleasant, smooth, creamy feeling. Vanilla in Byzance smells very real, and it is also extremely special because this is Vanilla originating from Madagascar, which is considered to have the best Vanilla in the world. Gourmand but not too Gourmand but still polite, sophisticated, I think Byzance is a very 'delicious' scent that I think everyone should have in their collection.

Versace Pour Homme was born in 2008 by famous perfumer Alberto Morillas, now 13 years old, receiving an average score of 4.3 out of 5 with nearly 11,000 votes on Fragrantica. I think that's enough to understand the success of the perfume bottle from Versace. Now if someone is just starting out in the world of perfume, there are usually two scents I still recommend: white sausage and Versace Pour Homme. Basically, they are easy to use, easy to spray, and the scent is unlikely to cause discomfort to others. Versace Pour Homme opens with citrus from extremely fresh, bright and pleasant citrus mixed with a bit of musk. smell. This type of opening, in my opinion, is always a winning formula with fresh summer scents, it makes us feel really refreshed and comfortable whenever we encounter hot weather. When the scent calms down, it's easy to feel the gentle sweetness of tonka beans on the musk background, a bit aquatic but not fishy but quite pleasant. When Versace Pour Homme softens on the skin, I still feel a little sweetness from the tonka bean, mixed with the gentle sweetness from the amber, still musk but with a little more wood. On my skin, the scent lasts about 6 hours, and I personally think that's quite good for a fresh and pleasant scent.

Smell When Molecule 01 rises on the skin, it will emit different scents depending on the person's skin, but in most cases I have encountered, it emits a light, clear, slightly watery scent of sandalwood mixed with cedar. little. The sandalwood scent of this bottle is quite moderate, not thick and a bit dry, radiating strongly like the national perfume Le Labo Santal 33. One more thing, as far as I can see, the more people try to smell it, the more they try to smell it. You can't feel anything, but other people will smell it very clearly. I think it may be because it radiates according to body temperature, so as the body temperature gradually increases and the smell is released, you will gradually get used to it and no longer feel that smell on your body. There is a bottle that has the same effect, but the smell is clearer, which is Le Labo's Another 13. However, each scent will follow a different direction, Molecule 01 will be a clear, light and neutral, faint woody scent while Another 13 will be a woody scent, with a bit of a fatty smell of ambergris and ambergris. a slight powdery touch of musk.

Enjoy the delicate scent of Acqua di Parma's eau de cologne Colonia. The iconic fragrance embodies the gentle and sophisticated spirit of Italy, expressed through a harmonious blend of floral essences.

Water Chanel's COCO MADEMOISELLE Eau de Parfum Intense is inspired by women who like freedom, are confident and bold in expressing their emotions, but still always exude charm and appeal to the other person in a unique way. hard to guess. Luxury fashion brand Burberry has introduced My Burberry Blush at a large event held for the brand's loyal customers in 2017. Under the magical hands of Francis kurkdjian, My Burberry Blush is likened to the beauty of the changing seasons, a The strangely peaceful morning of a late summer day, with the scent of each newly budding Rose petal in the garden, along with the fresh taste of Pomegranate, covering the sky with a layer of brilliant colors of green Apples and yellow Lemons, to then shyly and fragilely welcome the first wind of autumn, bringing with it the fragility and purity of Wisteria. My Burberry Blush is like that, feminine, elegant, luxurious but no less sexy, like a gentle song, attracting the attention of everyone around with its own strange beauty.

The One EDP launched in 2015, has overcome some of the limitations of The One EDT. The One EDP makes the smell thicker, the feeling is sweeter, the tobacco feels clearer and sharper, stronger, and the smell spreads better. If Jazz Club is a cigarette scent with a combo of vanilla combined with rum on a base of tobacco and leather, it feels quite sweet but no less luxurious, then The One has a more youthful, more casual feeling. and easier to wear. Spraying it out, what I feel most clearly is the rather fresh citrus smell coming from grapefruit, cardamom combined with ginger creating a slightly dark and spicy feeling and not to mention tobacco. Basically, this is a flattering opening, younger and easier to use than Jazz Club. Many people will find the opening of Jazz and Vanilla a bit too sweet, while The One does not. Later, amber and cardamom appear more clearly on the wood and tobacco background. The combination of amber and cardamom is always my favorite combo in perfume, creating a warm and slightly spicy feeling but still pleasantly sweet. On a wood and tobacco background, it is a smooth blend that creates a slightly liberal and romantic masculine feeling that easily makes the other person pay attention to you. To me, The One EDP portrays the image of a strong young man. Strong, masculine but still exudes warmth and care in a sweet way. If you want a youthful, easy-to-use tobacco-flavored perfume, I would advise you to try The One rather than Jazz Club, because to me Jazz Club will be somewhat more experienced and colder, older...

Gucci launches the new fragrance Gucci Bamboo in spring 2015, named after the accessories collection already available. The fragrance clearly reflects confidence and femininity. If in the Encre Noire EDT version, we have a dry and quite woody accord is dark, sad, and introverted, the Extreme version feels more compact and smoky, but it's not as dark and sad as the original, and the vetiver's dullness in the EDT version is also less. At the opening of Spicebomb EDT, the feeling Exploding spices with pink pepper, cinnamon, ginger and a little bergamote added to soften the spice somewhat, smelling warm and slightly spicy. Description: It can be affirmed that Club de Nuit Limited is the best, most complete, and most worth buying Aventus clone version at the present time. From the first moment, the smell The fresh yet sharp scent of Danish spruce is enough to evoke a feeling of relaxation and comfort. The fresh breath of eucalyptus and vetiver mixed with the scent of clean sea breeze with light flowers from calone, gradually filling the chest. In the middle of the deep ocean, a dry scent suddenly sparkled, lightly dripping with salt like sweat, with a hint of skin sweetness from the delicate ambergris. Appears at the highest intensity of the BLEU DE perfume CHANEL, strong and sophisticated, BLEU DE CHANEL Parfum for men reveals a determined nature and strong masculinity. Chance Eau Tendre is the new perfume version of the Channel brand, bringing a breath of fresh air to the Chance perfume product line. The delicate scent is poetic, with a fruity scent mixed with a pure floral scent. Although gentle, it still exudes a lively look like gentle blue waves. The father of this perfume is Jacques Polge. Grapefruit scent creates a cool feeling, faintly with the passionate floral scent of night lily. The first scent is fragrant and impressive but will fade after a few minutes. At this time, the fruit scent will gradually subside, leaving behind only the fresh floral scent. Minty Man by Dame Perfumery is one of the best mint-themed perfumes I've ever tried. The mint in this bottle does a great job, it's hard to explain in words, but it feels like it does just enough. If you don't make mint, you will only feel a light, cool, empty smell. If you overdo it, it will smell like toothpaste. As for Dame Minty Man, as soon as you spray it, you will feel like you just peeled off a bar of Doublemint, put it in your mouth and enjoy the cool, refreshing feeling. If you smell Minty Man carefully, you will smell the faint scent of Bergamot here and there, but it's not clear because mint is almost the main thing. A green feeling makes us feel strangely fresh. After a period of time, mint gradually gives way and mate tea appears. Mate tea appears slightly sweet but also a bit bitter, with a creamy powdery feel, reminding us of a cup of matcha tea. Because the base notes contain tea, I feel that even though it is very fresh, this bottle still creates a certain depth, youthful and generous but still calm. Paying close attention, it seems like the mint gradually fades and then reappears strongly, vividly creating the background for other scents. The only thing that makes me dissatisfied is that this bottle doesn't last long, about 4 minutes. The sound on the skin means you can no longer feel anything. However, no matter what I say, I will still choose Minty Man for a sunny Sunday morning with clear blue sky, cycling around Hoan Kiem Lake, sipping a cup of mint Dilmah tea and watching people pass by.

Marie Jeanne Adele was one of my favorite scents last summer. One day while walking in Paris, I stopped by Marie Jeanne's perfume counter at Rue Vaneau, this is when I first had the opportunity to experience this young but quality perfume maker. It was even more surprising to learn that the company was founded by Georges Maubert, a member of the prestigious Robertet family, specializing in providing fragrances to the world's largest incense makers. Going back to Marie Jeanne Adele, as much as I like Vetiver Santal because of its elegant masculinity, I like Adele because of its simplicity but sophistication. Marie Jeanne Adele gives us a very special citrus touch, besides the ripe yellow bergamote, we also see green mixed with bitterness from the lemon peel, sprinkled with a little powder of iris. It gives me a feeling of maturity and depth, like every time I smell it I think of introverted people who like peace in life and don't like hustle and bustle. Adele does not radiate strongly, but stays on the skin for a long time, about 5-6 hours like a second layer of skin, gently and carelessly, giving you a gentle and discreet fragrance. For me, that's all summer needs. that's enough...

Beach Walk's fragrance is a combination of the fresh and radiant taste of notes of bergamot, coconut milk, lemon and pink pepper. In addition, the sensual musk scent helps evoke familiar emotions of a seemingly forgotten moment. In addition, the scent of coconut milk adds a bit of an alluring and magical tropical scent. Close your eyes and let the scent of Beach Walk take you back to the moment of a walk on the beach in the late afternoon. , as your feet sink into the wet dunes and the ocean waves gently brush your skin. With the sunlight gradually fading, a feeling of gentle warmth mixed with gentle breezes carrying the scent of the sea. Beach Walk succeeds in capturing the essence of the carefree bliss of a summer day.

Creed Aventus celebrates strength, vision and success, centered on Inspired by Napoleon's anecdotal life of war, peace and romance. When it comes to Aventus, those who love perfume must give it many beautiful words, and the word that describes it most honestly is 'king' of perfumes. The middle note is mixed with spicy spices and woody notes to soften the sweetness of the top note, the scent gradually changes to a more masculine scent. If I only gave a very short description of this scent, I would would describe Nasomatto Pardon as a premium Dark Chocolate Bar. The opening of Nasomatto Pardon is the deep, incense scent of Pardon that feels extremely thick, dark, thorny and strong, even if you are unfamiliar with the scent or are new to perfume, you will definitely feel dizzy. This can also be said to be one of the main notes of Pardon as it still appeared until drydown. After 10 to 15 minutes, the scent will begin to become softer and brighter. At this time we begin to see the appearance of Chocolate, sandalwood and tonka beans. Lightly sweet tonka bean combined with the fatty, creamy notes of sandalwood seems to soften the thorny features of agarwood, giving Nasomatto Pardon a balance and appeal. When it's completely dry on the skin, we will feel a smooth, bitter dark chocolate scent, with a bit of woody touch from sandalwood and agarwood combined with the slight spicy taste of cinnamon. It's extremely masculine, attractive, and has a difference that will definitely help you stand out in the crowd. And as usual, Pardon like most of Nasomatto's perfume bottles with Extrait de Parfum concentration completely confidently lasts for over 10 hours.

Leather and tobacco seem to be two of the scent notes that are difficult to use in the summer. But Montabaco Verano is probably an exception! This perfume bottle has a fresh and pleasant opening with the scent of grapefruit, mixed with a slightly green, sweet fresh tobacco flavor that is both familiar and extremely strange. Spray on your skin and observe carefully, you will see a very smooth, and 'beautiful' scent journey. As the opening fades away, the grapefruit is almost gone, giving way to a little flower that appears, soft and flexible, slightly powdery but I absolutely cannot recognize what flower it is. It feels like it's just an added aspect, bridging the drydown. There, the leather clearly shows up, a luxurious leather, stripped of all the thorny aspects, almost unable to feel animalic or smoky. Perhaps that is the point that makes even though Montabaco Verano has leather, contains tobacco, but is surprisingly suitable for summer. Luxurious, classic, unmatched smell, extremely good scent performance, perhaps there is no reason to refuse this creation from Ormonde Jayne.

For me, Astrophil & Stella is one of the The scent is young, but their way of making scents is full of experience, and Love is lost is a typical scent like that. In this perfume bottle, we will have a scent centered on vanilla and white flowers that is sweet, feminine, luxurious and very flattering. In fact, the combo of white flowers and vanilla is not new in perfume, it is a classic combination like the wood - spice or citrus - sea scent combos, but the beauty here is that every time I smell it, it smells right. gave me a feeling of both familiarity and strangeness. The first time I smelled it, I saw that it had something similar to Kilian's Love, don't be shy, but with a reduced sweetness, not a sweet caramel-like sweetness like Love, don't be shy. Another time I smelled it, I thought of Safanad - a scent that caused a huge craze when Parfums de Marly was released, but Love is Lost smells softer thanks to Sambac jasmine and Bulgarian rose. In general, I feel that Love is lost picks up a little bit of everything from the popular white flower - vanilla bottles, becoming a more improved version with a very unique quality. This scent will be for women who pursue modern style but do not follow instant fashion trends but know what really suits them, like luxury and charm, and are always unique. independent and it is that independence that makes them more attractive than ever.

Women's perfume Pure Pure XS For Her is suitable for use both day and night in the fall and winter. Popcorn and Vanilla are the two scents you can easily feel when using this perfume.
