The scent opens with citrus and tangerine, lightly sweet, clean and smells extremely loving and refreshing. When the scent calms down, we will clearly see the very feminine scent of roses, lavender, and orange blossom, with a slight sweetness of green apple and musk on a smooth, creamy cream. This is a youthful, polite scent but still attractive, not boring or popular among a forest of overly familiar perfume bottles. Not to mention, this bottle is also very versatile, can be sprayed on any occasion. okay. With an amount of less than 2 million for a 100ml bottle, I think this is really a bargain that women should not miss.

Dolce & Gabbanna K is a new scent, launched by the famous brand in 2019 with the representative face of Italian fashion designer and actor Mariano di Vaio. Dubbed the 'King of everyday life', Dolce & Gabbanna K brings together all the elements of a modern man such as strength, elegance and masculinity. Opening with characteristic notes of Sicilian lemon and red orange , hidden inside is the warmth of cedar wood scent. King perfume is added with a rather new ingredient: Pimento chili essence, a spice scent that is quite rare in other scents. Pimento chili helps balance the fresh notes of citrus, soften the passionate taste of wood, helping the main scent last longer and diffuse farther. In addition, the ingredients of sage, geranium and lavender also contribute to the personality of Dolce & Gabbanna K. The base notes are rich and warm with vetiver, cedar and patchouli. The bottle design is quite harmonious. between traditional and modern styles with minimalist square lines, in contrast to the bottle cap with many meticulous and complex sculpted details. Imitation marble details on the bottle cap, neatly placed in a crown covered with 24-carat gold particles like the symbol of the Italian Royal Family, increase the elegance of this Dolce & Gabbanna K perfume bottle.

One of the most successful scents from Calvin Klein is CK One, a citrus unisex fragrance from 1994. CK One Shock is a surprise for all its fans. CK One series. It is not one unisex version, but two separate oriental pieces: CK One Shock For Her and CK One Shock For Him. CK One Shock For Her is an oriental-floral fragrance with intense notes of fragrant flowers, pink peonies and poppies. Its heart is made of feminine jasmine, narcissus, blackberry and black cocoa. The base includes amber, vanilla, musk and patchouli.

Juniper Wood by Label is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. Juniper Wood was launched in 2020. The nose behind this fragrance is Angela Ciampagna. Top notes are Black Pepper, Lavender and Cardamom; middle notes are Juniper Berries and Coriander; base notes are Musk and Amber.

Water Unisex flower Straight to Heaven Extreme was launched in 2017. This is the By Kilian perfume line of the Woody Spicy group (Spicy woody scent) aimed at people over 25 years old. Sidonie Lancesseur is the creator of this perfume. Straight to Heaven Extreme has a very long lasting scent - over 12 hours and a very long distance scent - radiating scent within a radius of over 2 meters. Straight to Heaven Extreme is suitable for use day and night in spring, fall, and winter. Besides, Rum and Virginia Cedar Wood 2 are the two flavors you can easily feel when using this perfume.

A City On Fire by Imaginary Authors is inspired by the novel of the same name in the Dark Fiction Novel genre, a scent with a very unique woody-smoky theme. At the beginning of the scent, it is easy to clearly see the smoky, slightly burnt smell of wood and burning matches along with the feeling of increased spice. The spicy spices combined with the burning smell make it easier for us to think of the feeling of standing and witnessing a real fire, very interesting and special. The longer it stays on the skin, the more clearly the scent changes. After half an hour, the scent changes to a slightly burnt smoke smell on a sweet wood base, the typical sweetness of Dark Berries. Towards the end, we will feel that the scent now has a rather soft leather feeling coming from Labdanum. The scent of A City On Fire is deep and thick but does not radiate loudly and strongly but is very moderate and lasts on the skin for about 10 hours. With quite thick and strong scent notes with a smoky feeling from start to finish, A City On Fire will be suitable for those who follow a dusty, a bit individualistic style or are suitable for the times when we need peace, calmness, solitude….

Girls who like a floral scent but sweet and attractive definitely cannot miss it. via Explicite by Ex Nihilo. A scent for women that smells extremely luxurious, luxurious with notes of Chocolate combined with Vanilla, delicate floral elegance from peony and lily, they are bonded together through warm sweet amber. This is exactly what people say about a girl with a Parisian Chic vibe, both a very modern, stylish feeling and an attractive sweetness.

This Twilly d'Hermès women's perfume has a moderate longevity - 3 hours to 6 hours. and the fragrance radiance is close - the fragrance radiates within an arm's length. Twilly d'Hermès is suitable for use both day and night in spring and autumn. This is the Hermès perfume line belonging to the Floral group. Twilly d'Hermès was launched in 2017. Besides, Ginger and White Lily are the two flavors you can easily feel when using this perfume.

Are chocolates and roses a cliché way to express romance? We mean classic, and with the rich, delightful Rose & Chocolate, grounded in one of the most perfectly executed dark chocolate candy notes we've ever smelled, we're pretty sure we'll be back. love each other

In Italian, 'Dama' means Woman, and 'Bianca' means white, pure. Roughly translated into Vietnamese, it might be Holy Woman. A name is probably enough to make us curious about it. Xerioff has always been famous as a perfume house that makes extremely good citrus scents, and Dama Bianca is no exception, but it will be a bit different. The beginning of the scent is a feeling that is quite fresh, a bit boozy but in a positive way, not unpleasant at all. There is a citrus scent from the kumquat, a bit of powdery powder from the purple floral scent and the sweetness of vanilla. It reminds me of two things, sugar-soaked kumquat and that yellow bear-shaped gummy bear, which is definitely from Gummy Bears. I say that the opening of Dama Bianca has citrus but in a slightly different direction, because the citrus here comes from the scent of kumquat, giving the scent a certain uniqueness. About half an hour after spraying, the kumquat and floral scent gradually fades, the scent turns into a fairly strong Vanilla base, adding a little musk to create a warm, pleasant but also extremely attractive vibe. . If you've smelled many Xerjoff scents, you'll probably find that Dama Bianca has a slight resemblance to Lira, but if Lira makes vanilla and caramel a bit noisy, Dama Bianca seems more delicate and pleasant.

PACO RABANNE chose the EDP concentration to create the new product PURE XS NIGHT 2019, enough to know that this new perfume bottle will have a strong, long-lasting scent when used, And it won't be enough, even if you are an eye-catching guy with a toned body, you still need a scent like PURE So outstanding at night, the powerful mysterious Oriental scent comes from ingredients such as ginseng, spicy Caramel, Cinnamon and myrrh... once again PACO RABANNE brings a provocative and sensual scent experience. PACO RABANNE PURE the person voluntarily asked 'falls down'.

Narciso Rouge is announced as a seductive, mysterious, provocative and passionate perfume. 'I love very pure colors; it evokes deep emotions and it is very special. The red I chose for Narciso eau de parfum embodies passion and mystery. ' – Narciso Rodriguez . The signature musk heart of Narciso Rodriguez's perfume creations is enriched with a bouquet of Bulgarian rose and iris. The 'fiery sensuality' of the piece is embellished with an amber wood base that includes vetiver as well as white and black cedar.

2020 is a memorable year, or as we joke, the year of Covid. The pandemic has greatly affected everyone's life and every profession. However, this year there were also many interesting fragrant creations born. And as mentioned above, I have a lot of sympathy for the Gio line, so I'm very interested in Gio Profondo or Green Gio. Gio Green to me is a pretty cool bottle. It feels like a more mature, more masculine version of Gio Trang. Sprayed, the feeling is still the same, still the familiar DNA like White Pork with citrus and sea scent. However, if you smell carefully, you will see that green Pork compared to white Pork has a bit more of a marine scent, the feeling is quite cool and pleasant. In addition, if you are a person who is quite sensitive to marine scents, you will often feel that many smells have a slightly brackish and... fishy feeling. However, Green Pork makes a pretty good sea scent, it's unlikely to make others feel uncomfortable. Later, the clearest feeling is probably the very smooth scent of lavender, a slight sweetness of amber on the background of musk and patchouli. At this time the scent becomes quite masculine, and a bit strange but I feel evocative

In 2016 Dior continued to launch another perfume line in the brand's collection called Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming. This product line promises to bring a new, brighter breeze to the long-famous Miss Dior perfume line with a new, more sexy, passionate and modern style. The girls are fans of the perfume line. The legendary Miss Dior will certainly be extremely excited with the latest version of this perfume line. With fresh notes of fruits, Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming perfume is a gift dedicated to encouraging optimism and joy for girls who are immersed in the love of life.

Women's perfume Armaf Club de Nuit Woman EDP is the perfect dupe of Chanel Coco Mademoiselle. The scent is gentle but luxurious and seductive. You can smell it and know it can only appear on the bodies of elegant Chanel ladies. Top notes are bergamot, grapefruit, and peach. The middle note is a delicate blend of geranium, jasmine, rose and lychee. Base notes are patchouli, musk, vanilla and vertiver. This fragrance is considered by experts to be similar to the famous Chanel Coco Mademoiselle for a long time at a much cheaper price. Armaf Club De Nuit Women represents a delicate fragrance for women with the scent Characteristic of fruit and mint. It is an expression of elegance and irresistible charm.

Paris Cheri by Astrophil Stella is a quite special scent, when smelled every time , in my mind I thought of the image of female star Ana de Armas. If you are unfamiliar with this name, this is the Latin actress famous for her role as Bond Girl in 007 – No Time To Die, and most recently she has surpassed a series of other famous names. to play beauty icon Marilyn Monroe in Netflix's Blonde project. Ana de Armas has the beauty of sweetness with a seductive body mixed with the boldness of a Femme Fatale. Returning to Paris Cheri, we have a bottle of perfume with vanilla as the main theme, added with cocoa and coffee mixed with a light powder from iris. It smells sweet and thick but gentle and pleasant, not overpowering or luxurious, giving us An attractive, luxurious, seductive scent, and of course, not easy to find. In the midst of a forest of sweet female scents that are too popular and boring, I believe that Paris Cheri will really help you shine.
An eau de toilette celebrates the stunning landscapes of Tuscany, Cipresso di Toscana inspires a feeling of energy and regeneration.

The Soft Lawn perhaps is one of the scents that closely follows the story concept among Imaginary Authors' perfume bottles. Spraying this perfume bottle on, you will feel like there is a fiery and exciting tennis match in front of you. The scent of vetiver and oakmoss blends together to create a green, slightly earthy feeling like the smell of the lawn at Wimbledon matches. On the field, the athlete, with a professional and well-groomed demeanor, is preparing to serve the ball, the scent of the new ball-covered felt fabric slowly creeping into the olfactory sense of the lover. Even though it's just a fictional scent note, the combination of ingredients is so smooth that it really makes you feel like you're holding a hard new tennis ball in your hand. Besides, the lemon flower, lily of the valley and grapefruit scent are very gentle, slightly sweet, and pleasant, making us feel extremely comfortable, relaxed and want to take a deep breath to let the fragrance fill us. lungs. Actually, to me, The Soft Lawn is an extremely interesting scent. A scent that easily makes us feel excited and confident will probably be extremely suitable on occasions when you go out to play sports or on weekends when you want to leisurely cycle through small old alleys, looking at The sunlight shines through the leaves, the gentle breeze blows in extremely pleasant waves. Or simply spray The Soft Lawn every time you want to feel like it's the weekend!

Nomade is the latest fragrance introduced by Chloé in 2018, not only is it a new perfume line but it is also considered an era full of style. Rebellious and different from what Chloé has done before. The creator of this perfume wants to bring a spirit that is bold, impressive and still feminine to the user with an appeal to everyone. Girls, let's get rid of the things that limit ourselves to comfortably enjoy the vast space of life. This perfume bottle is designed in the shape of a travel bag with inspiring leather details. From scent to appearance, those who wear Chloé Nomade realize their own joy and aspirations, the desire to go beyond every journey to find a woman's own instincts.

Givenchy launches its latest men's perfume line in 2020, a scent that highlights the sexy side of gentlemen. Gentleman Givenchy was born from the duality between notes of burnt wood and noble hoha Iris. Strength goes hand in hand with gentleness. Gentleman Givenchy has just welcomed a new flanker Boisée concentrated Eau de Parfum, with woody scent as the main scent for the sexiest gentlemen. More precisely, Boisée is for enthusiastic, thoughtful gentlemen. Attractiveness comes from the balance of strength and gentleness and sophistication. A surprising contrast blended in the same individual.

Hermes launches a new perfume in the Un Jardin perfume line. This is a collection of perfumes inspired by fresh, fragrant green flower gardens. Called Un Jardin Sur Le Toit, also known as 'Rooftop Garden', this is the fourth product belongs to the Un Jardin collection, launched in 2011. Un Jardin Sur Le Toit is inspired by the splendid, luxurious garden located on the roof of Hermes's central building, at 24 Rue Faubourg Saint. -Honore, Paris, France. Perfume is the successful creation of Jean-Claude Ellena.

Roja Parfum is one of the most luxurious perfume brands in the world. With many fragrant creations with gold inside, priced up to a thousand dollars or more, perfumer Roja Dove has confirmed that in his perfume, gold is not the most expensive ingredient. In the versions Roja Enigma, the newest version released in 2019, Roja Enigma Parfum Cologne, will be the easiest to use. A luxurious, polite scent that still exudes youthfulness and dynamism, making it easy to impress those around you. The opening of Roja Enigma Parfum Cologne feels like smelling a cold bottle of Coca Cola, just opened the lid, poured into a cup and added a few slices of lemon, the cool Coca Cola smell added a few slices of lemon with a effervescent effect. extremely realistic. Every time I spray Roja Enigma Parfum Cologne, this opening always gives me a feeling of full of energy and vitality, easily making me feel cheerful, especially when I wake up one day and feel tired. tired. After spraying this version of Enigma, I find that it will radiate the strongest and clearest Coca Cola vibe after 2-3 hours. Later, the scent gradually changes into a clear tobacco scent with Cognac, besides Vanilla creates a certain sweetness to the scent, extremely flattering and pleasant. For me, the basic hobbies of men will revolve around cigars and alcohol, and coincidentally those are the things we can find at Enigma. So we will see a certain elegance, maturity, politeness and depth in this scent, but it exudes a somewhat playful 'playful' look. Overall, Roja Enigma Parfum Cologne is still an extremely easy-to-use perfume that doesn't get old at all. Although it has a profile of a sweet perfume, especially sweet Vanilla, Roja Enigma Parfum Cologne is quite versatile, it is definitely suitable for autumn and winter, but it can also be used. Use on summer days that are not too hot, or if you mainly work in an air-conditioned office, spray comfortably without fear of making anyone uncomfortable. If you find Elysium a bit too formal and want something more 'playful', much less clashing, then try Roja Elysium Parfum Cologne, I'm sure this perfume will not disappoint you.

Personally, Y EDP is probably the most multi-purpose, easy-to-use perfume bottle for men from YSL, but not because it's versatile, but This perfume bottle doesn't look dull or lack any highlights, but its performance is extremely good. Well-groomed and flattering are two words that I often use to describe this perfume bottle from Yves Saint Laurent. As soon as you spray it, you will clearly see the fresh and green feeling coming from citrus and green apples, with a sweet vibe that is quite flattering. The highlight here is green apples. If someone says this perfume has something similar to Versace Eros, I wouldn't be surprised because Eros also has green apples, but in Y EDP we will see a sweet apple vibe. Green is cleaner, more delicate, and doesn't radiate too strongly. After spraying for a while, the scent of sage leaves will become more and more clear, giving the scent a cool, mint-like feeling. When the scent dries down to the basenote, we will see that it is a combination of tonka bean, cedar wood and amber, extremely masculine and flattering. Over the past few years since Y EDP launched, we have seen it gradually usurp Sauvage and enter the list of best-selling men's perfumes. Y EDP is the simplest, most polite and thoughtful scent. So if you want to show off such an style, don't hesitate to choose Y EDP.

If you are a person who likes new things, different from the crowd but still an easy-to-use scent, then perhaps you should try Viride from the Italian perfume house - Orto Parisi. To describe Orto Parisi Viride, I will use the phrase 'green', because Viride is a scent with dominant green tones. The opening of Orto Parisi Viride is the feeling of freshness and coolness of silver. Mint and sage leaves give us a pleasant, cool feeling. Later, Viride changes extremely smoothly, vetiver smells slightly dry, patchouli smells slightly earthy like moss. In particular, what fascinates me the most about Viride is the pleasant herbal feeling, like you just stepped into a Spa. Regarding the base, everything softens, but in a gentle way, without disappearing, blending with the Cedar at the base, giving us a masculine feeling full of vitality. And as usual, Orto Parisi's perfume bottles give us outstanding performance, Viride lasts on my skin for over 10 hours and shines extremely well.
A powerful Lemon Line eau de parfum with an elegant and soft final note. High intensity and luck with the long lasting adhesion typical of Mancera.

Just sprayed Ormonde Jayne Tanger, you will feel a very clear citrus smell , citrus from bergamote and mandarin, tangerine will be more obvious and it is in the direction of ripe tangerine, sweet and thick but quite natural, a bit of a feeling that reminds us of the sweetness of honey. After about 10 minutes, the orange blossom now appears quite clearly, the sweetness is somewhat softer but clearer and more distinct, coming from vanilla and amber. At drydown, the scent will still be the same, still sweet and sweet orange blossom, but there will be a gentle woody feel with a bit of musk in the background from cashmeran, smelling very attractive and feminine. The special thing about Ormonde Jayne Tanger that makes it highly appreciated is the scent effect of this perfume. It's quite similar to what we often say about MFK's Baccarat 540 or Another 13: spraying it after just 30 minutes to 1 hour is very easy to get used to, very easy to ignore the smell, hard to feel its presence anymore. From my experience, Ormonde Jayne Tanger is the type that doesn't radiate strongly. Sometimes when you try to smell it, you won't be able to see it clearly, but as long as you move for a while, the smell will spread very well, clear and not thick. It's like a layer of gentle scent wafting around, extremely pleasant. If I were to say that this scent is so similar that it could be considered another version of MFK 540, I would say no, but if you like and are impressed with MFK 540 but find it too sweet, then there is a very high possibility that you will be disappointed. conquered by Ormonde Jayne Tanger. This perfume bottle is quite versatile, people can spray it comfortably every day, use it as a signature scent, and it would also be great to use on intimate dates.

Amber & Rosewood by Label is a Amber Spicy fragrance for women and men. Amber & Rosewood was launched in 2020. The nose behind this fragrance is Angela Ciampagna. Top notes are Nutmeg, Lemon and Bergamot; middle notes are Palisander Rosewood, Agarwood (Oud) and Cedar; base notes are Vanilla, Amber, Benzoin and Sandalwood.

Ani by Nishane is a Amber Floral fragrance for women and men. Ani was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Cécile Zarokian. Top notes are Ginger, Bergamot, Pink Pepper and Green Notes; middle notes are Cardamom, Black Currant and Turkish Rose; base notes are Vanilla, Benzoin, Sandalwood, Cedar, Patchouli, Ambergris and Musk.

Olivier Polge created Launching the new fragrance of the Chanel line for women, Chanel Gabrielle was launched in 2017, a radiant, sparkling floral fragrance, with an irresistible femininity. A collection of flowers interspersed between the scent layers: jasmine and fresh green notes of ylang-ylang mixed with attractive orange blossom catalyze a faint but not faint scent of white tuberose. captures the best. This new bottle body and packaging were designed by Sylvie Legastelois. The square bottle body is covered with a soft shiny golden color that transmits when light shines on it, enhancing the symbolic beauty of sunlight and sunshine in the fragrance.

Lost In Translation opens with a sweet, fruity feeling of juniper berries, with a slightly resinous feeling like turpentine mixed with a bit of white tea. Smell carefully and you'll notice there's a bit of a dry woody aspect in the background, it reminds me of some sweet vanilla-like scents but more open to the nose, with a slight powdery touch from the violets. Maison Matine is very clever in adding a little spicy pepper to the structure of this scent, making it more personal, just enough, neither too much nor too little. An interesting point about this perfume is that when it dries down, we feel a slight ozonic/aquatic touch. Normally, this aspect appears from the beginning, but in Lost in Translation it doesn't come until the end. easy to see. It adds a touch of wood that becomes less dry, overall making the scent journey of the perfume bottle very interesting. This is probably not Maison Matine's easiest to use, easiest to like perfume, but I believe it is one of the most interesting scents. It is suitable for young people who like a lot of colors and changes in a perfume bottle, not a linear style like Bain de Midi.

In the perfume line by Astrophil & Stella, I think Madame M will be the perfume that takes on Vedette's position. Madame M's scent is not easy to predict, easy to grasp, easy to separate into clear single notes. Very rarely do we encounter a female scent that is made in a woody and warm spicy direction, with the main characters being cedarwood, cardamom and patchouli. As I said, I personally find it difficult to grasp and interpret, so it will be difficult to review this scent in a conventional way. Basically, for me, Madame M is suitable for mature women with personality, pursuing something unique, something that stands out from the crowd. There is also an image of a woman that I find very suitable for Madame M spray, perhaps the singer Miley Cyrus, at the present time with a declaration of freedom, to be yourself...

YSL Libre smells extremely clean but not soapy, sweet but with the natural and appealing vibe of Vanilla without any chemical feeling , but has a bit of a powdery, makeup-like feel. Just sprayed on the skin, you will clearly feel a light green feeling, like newly cut grass, besides the lavender and orange scent create a pleasant fresh feeling, but nothing outstanding. But after only about 10 minutes, Libre transforms into a beautiful scent that makes it easy for everyone around you to give you compliments. At this time, the floral scent seems to bloom on the skin, not just pure lavender like in the opening, but we will see the appearance of orange blossom, jasmine and surrounded by Vanilla. Vanilla is seasoned in a very moderate way, not too sweet, exuding a luxurious and sophisticated feeling. This is also the reason why, at XXIV, if customers want to try Libre, we often advise customers to wait a while for the scent to subside, only then can we clearly feel the beauty of this scent. I believe that Libre is a scent that can easily conquer the most demanding customers. A polite and sophisticated scent, suitable for modern women, not too sweet and extremely easy to use for many occasions, going out, dating or going to work is all reasonable.

Royal Princess Oud is a seductive floral fragrance enhanced by rose, sweet violet and Sicilian bergamot, giving way to warm notes of vanilla and iris. Iconic notes of oud and benzoin bring a sensual dry woody finish to this classic and feminine eau de parfum. Royal Princess Oud women's perfume was launched in 2015. This is the Creed perfume line. belongs to the Oriental Floral group (Oriental floral scent) aimed at people over 25 years old. Olivier Creed is the creator of this perfume.

In the past few years, in Vietnam there has been a strong trend of searching for and using scents has the property of 'suddenly disappearing', 'natural scent of the body',... I read many articles and video reviews of Another 13 and similar scents with these phrases. However, in reality, in terms of scent, many people, including me, have commented that Another 13 is an extremely clear, thick scent, easy to grasp and recognize, even when applied to the skin by many people. The smell is also extremely strong to the point that it sometimes makes people around feel uncomfortable. So the descriptive phrases I just mentioned are probably not necessarily accurate, but they are more suitable for a Molecule 01-like scent, but Molecule 01 is a slightly unlucky scent in the sense that it has to match the skin to smell good. clear and beautiful. So if you like the style of Another 13, but much lighter and more pleasant, then maybe you should try Strangers Kira Kira. Having the same theme from Ambroxan, pear, green apple, but smelling Strangers Kira Kira, we will feel brighter, greener and much cleaner. This is probably thanks to the fact that Kira Kira uses less Ambroxan compared to Another 13, along with that the greening of the apples is also quite obvious, the unripe apples are slightly sour and mild. On the skin, we will also see the floral aspect quite clearly with the appearance of Linh Lan flower, the scent becomes noticeably softer and more feminine, and at the same time makes the musk feel extremely clean. Not as fiery and intense as Another 13, I like the way Stranger Kira Kira makes me sometimes try to look for it but can't find it, then it goes away for a while, forgets it, then suddenly appears again, gently. gentle and clear, easy to love and like very much.
nha

Yuzu or called Thanh Yen fruit, a citrus fruit originating from China but most popular in Japan. Yuzu has a gentle, sweet scent like a combination of grapefruit, orange and lemon. This is also the main scent note of Strangers Yuzu Soda. The scent opens with an explosion of Citrus notes, the most obvious being Yuzu which feels ripe and succulent, lightly effervescent and slightly bitter orange, just by smelling it you will see that it has a very special, real look. Very clean thanks to the Aldehydes note. Personally, when I first spray Strangers Yuzu Soda, I think of two things, one is Lifebouy soap, the other is a newly washed bed sheet and dried in the sun, dry and clean. Sounds both funny and interesting, right? When the scent softens on the skin, we will now feel more clearly the appearance of a few more herbal leaves. It is quite difficult to remove, but it will still be a scent that is both clean and easy to use. Can't wait to get more citrus from Yuzu. Drydown we have more musk, and once again I have to use the word 'clean'. Previously, I found the word clean extremely suitable when describing the scent of Prada Lhomme, now I can probably use it to accurately describe the scent of Strangers Yuzu Soda as well. If you are looking for a clean, pleasant scent, especially those who work in an office environment that requires a professional scent, you should try this scent from Strangers Perfumerie.
This is the Tom Ford perfume line belonging to the Floral group. Besides, Narcissus and Mimosa are the two scents you can easily feel when using this perfume.

Azzaro Chrome Extreme by Azzaro is a Citrus Aromatic scent for men. This is a new fragrance. Azzaro Chrome Extreme was released in 2020. Of top note is the green tangerine; middle notes are juniper berries and sea notes; Base notes are amber and cashmeran.

Details of the scent, the first moments of wearing Falling into the sea, the most obvious and true thing What I feel is a mild sour taste, with a clear green feeling of lemon. Just like when you cut a slice of green lemon or orange and put it right in your mouth, the slightly sharp sour taste makes my salivary glands also strongly stimulated by it. However, that sour scent quickly subsided, a few minutes later when the grapefruit and lychee were felt more clearly, the sweet and cool lychee scent shining on the floral background. The coolness of Falling into the sea carries a clear and prominent wave of fragrance, bringing a refreshing feeling that is both strange and familiar. In Falling into the sea, 'Warm Sand - Warm Sand' is added so that we can better feel the bustling and cheerful Holiday Summer image. Falling into the Sea sounds like the name but is not a main scent. sea which is centered around citrus, fruity and floral notes. The scent of this perfume is like bright and sparkling sunshine, a must-have on hot summer days, or simply on cloudy days, the scent will help us feel full. energy and joy.

After a great start and great fruit with juicy grapefruit and a bit of other fruit, a flower garden blooms in the heart of MUSK OF FLOWERS, in which roses, pansies, jasmine from Grasse and delicate orange blossoms sing floral chords. White musk appears as the conductor, supported in a base of noble sandalwood from India.

Read the name, there is Maybe you can somewhat imagine the scent of this perfume, Bergamot and Musk are the two main ingredients of Orto Parisi Bergamask. I have almost a hundred bottles of perfume in my collection, not to mention that a rough estimate is that I have smelled about 4-500 different scents and Bergamask is definitely one of the most impressive perfumes I have ever tried. smell it. Orto Parisi Bergamask caught my attention from the first time I tried spraying it. I felt like just spraying it made the hot atmosphere around me instantly cool down with a quite thick but extremely natural citrus scent. comfortable. I think you guys here have probably watched the famous movie Ratatouille at least once and will know the scene where critic Anton Ego eats Ratatouille and remembers the dish his mother used to cook in the past, is The kind of memory that you will never forget. And similarly, Bergamask reminds me of an image of a summer afternoon long ago, it was hot and I had to cycle 5 kilometers home from high school, entering the house was a cool breeze from the air conditioner and my mother. I was squeezing oranges so the scent spread throughout the room. The smell was only faint but enough to make me feel extremely relaxed and comfortable, forgetting all about the heat of summer. If you bring the perfume sprayed skin area close to your nose to smell it, you will not only smell the citrus scent but also feel the presence of other tropical fruits, creating an extremely pleasant sweet feeling. What fascinates me is that even though it feels so gentle and pleasant, the citrus scent in Bergamask sticks to the skin extremely well. After 4-5 hours it's still the same, maybe just a little lighter. a little and has the appearance of musk. The musk in Orto Parisi Bergamask feels as clean as a new cotton sheet, and there's something slightly creamy and smooth like sandalwood that makes you want to inhale it forever. I always appreciate the incense makers who make it. Citrus scent is good in terms of scent and longevity, because it's really not easy to make this scent smell both real and pleasant and last well. At Orto Parisi Bergamask, we have everything we need in a summer scent, and if you like a unique yet flattering scent for the hot days ahead then don't miss this creation from Orto Parisi.

Sorriso by Profumum Roma is a blend of vanilla, chocolate and wood, but this scent is not simply that. Sorriso's chocolate is blended with Vanilla very smoothly, giving it a slightly milky powdered milky feel and a slight bitterness, just like we are smelling a premium chocolate bar. Paying attention, you will notice that the bitter feeling of Chocolate is probably enhanced by the bitter orange note, which makes the sweetness of Sorriso more natural and delicate. In addition, after spraying on the skin for a while, we can still smell a faint floral tinge along with creamy coconut and fatty leopard, making the scent even more pleasing to the nose. I think this scent will be the best, if you spray it on cold days, when going out you have to wear a thick layer of coat to avoid the biting wind that blows through, both you and the people around you. Everything around you will feel extremely warm and comfortable.

Marc Jacobs presents a new fragrance for a new generation of young men after the franchise that started with Daisy in 2007. The new Daisy Love, published Dad is a seductive and addictive scent for millennials, appearing in April 2018, created by perfumer Alberto Morillas, who signed the original as well. Daisy Love is a fresh floral fragrance with a fruity note and a woody musk base. In the notes above there is a berry called Cloudberry (Rubus chamaemoru). The floral core of the perfume has calendula notes (Scalesia pedunculata) based on sandalwood and cashmere musk.

Fans of the chypre leather version with The shades of flowers and forests will be very impressive! The prestigious blend of bergamot, iris and patchouli go hand in hand in a statement of the love of roses and violets in the heart and are embedded in a base of white musk, amber and seductive leather. The luxurious bottle comes with a gold metal badge for an absolute premium perfume.

So far, I have always appreciated everything comes from Prada, and this scent is no exception. Luna Rossa Black opens with citrus and a bit of floral, but it's dark, not bright or cool, a bit amber-like, then it quickly changes to a dark, rich and sweet feeling that is very pleasing to the nose. . Sweet and spicy spices combined with amber on a musk base give this perfume a very attractive, mysterious and deep feeling. I think this will be the scent emanating from a very interesting, experienced man, appearing in a fairly basic dark suit, you can have feelings for that person right from the first time even though you haven't yet. know really a lot about him. To sum up, if you like a scent that feels dark and mysterious, sweet but sweet like spices and amber, not vanilla, like uniqueness that cannot be compared, and most importantly, at a reasonable price, then this is it. Definitely a scent that shouldn't be missed.

Prada L'Homme Intense promises 'a layered experience' and enhances the scent of iris and amber with notes of leather and patchouli , while the tonka bean gives it an oriental signature. The goal of the scent and its opaque bottle is to evoke 'the elusive essence of the multifaceted Prada man'.

Dancing On The Moon by Maison Martin Margiela is an Aldehyde floral scent for women and men. Dancing On The Moon was released in 2016. Top note is aldehydes; middle notes are jasmine sambac, frangipani and iris; Base notes are cashmeran, ambergris and musk.
Musk pure was launched in 2009 in Tom Ford's Musk Pure collection. This is a perfume bottle with The main scent tones are musk, ylang - ylang and honey

If Twilly is a fresh and romantic dreamy teenage girl, then The Eau Poivrée version is still the same girl, but in adulthood. A beauty that is still romantic, still fresh, but more mature, and somewhat rebellious of youth. The notes that made Twilly successful have been completely replaced by a new combination. : pink pepper, rose and patchouli have become the protagonists of the coming-of-age party. A party adorned with the spicy vibrations of pink pepper, tender roses, and an elegant touch of wood. 'Hermès girls swim happily against the tide, at their own pace, at their own rhythm. I created this scent to show my appreciation for them, with the spirit of youth. ' – Christine Nagel shared when talking about her new creation.

As soon as you spray it, you will immediately see the smell of Whiskey combined with a rather fruity scent. is a strong blow straight to the nose. Even though I'm quite used to Nasomatto's somewhat strong opening styles, Baraonda is still something that really impresses me. It feels like we are leaning close to our nose to smell a glass of Bourbon that has just been poured. The Fruity part here feels quite similar to white grapes used to make wine, slightly astringent, ripe and fermented, making the scent even more overwhelming. If you pay close attention, you will notice a bit of oak smell mixed with a bit of smoke lingering around here, it gives you a really enjoyable feeling like sitting in the middle of a wine cellar. A few minutes after spraying, we can clearly see that Nasomatto Baraonda has a slightly sticky sweetness, like the smell of honey or caramel. If you are not used to playing harcode, it is best that for the first 30 minutes you should not put the spray close to your nose to smell it, because the smell is still quite thick at this time and is not for newbies, just smelling the smell it comes out is enough. Dragging me into a 'drunk' state. The scent doesn't change too much, after about 1 hour it will completely settle on the skin. At this time, the wine and fruity are much lighter, the most obvious will be the smell of wood, smoke and light sweetness from amber and honey. Just smoldering on the skin, not radiating too strongly and aggressively like Black Afgano, Baraonda is gentle but delicate, not at all noisy. On my skin, Baraonda is more modest, 'only' lasting about 7 hours.

Reminiscent of smells and flavors from a far away land sticky, this perfume has top notes of Sicilian mandarin, nutmeg, black pepper and fig tree, giving it a rose-like yet earthy feel. Base notes include Madagascar vanilla, patchouli and white musk, imbuing this fragrance with a hint of sweetness and making it irresistible.

Personally, when it comes to tobacco-flavored perfumes for men, there is a legendary scent that cannot be ignored. To mention, that is Herod of the young but already famous French Niche perfume house - Perfums de Marly. Herod is not a pure, raw cigarette with an 'explosive' effect like Odori Tabacco, or a bland cigarette that is only suitable for teenage boys like CK One Shock, nor is it the type of vanilla cigarette mixed with alcohol that is polished and polished. Anyone's nose looks like Jazz Club. To me Herod is a grown-up cigarette, with a very unique charm, experience and depth. Herod's scent takes the main character as tobacco, along with that we have cinnamon along with spices to create a moderately warm spicy feeling. If you pay close attention to Herod, you will see a bit of both sweet and ripe fruit. Like a bunch of Cherry, Vanilla pushes the Cherry to ripen and become round, easily making others pay attention to you. It all blends very well with tobacco, the scent creates a bit of a smoky effect, making the man seem to have something deep and mysterious, without exaggeration, knowing who he is and what he wants...

Amber Oud is a perfume bottle with an extremely beautiful and luxurious design. The main metallic yellow color brings appeal to the user's eyes right from the first time they encounter it. The warm sweet scent of sandalwood, amber, musk and Resins will brighten your winter

Outcast Blue Extrait de Parfum version For me personally, it is a scent that brings together the notes that bring the most power, agarwood, saffron and tobacco. The agarwood in this perfume smells dark, dark, but not animalic but very clean, along with a sweet, warm, deep tobacco note, and the touch of saffron adds a leathery touch to this scent. Increase the elegance and regalness of this perfume bottle. If you have to choose a scent to stand out, to be the most prestigious for men from the Ex Nihilo house, Outcast Blue Extrait de Parfum would certainly be a more reasonable choice.

A lively cocktail of fresh notes and citrus combined in Sicily. Unlike an ear of corn, notes of bergamot, grapefruit, mandarin orange, peach, pineapple and apple open up at the top, with notes of jasmine, rose, violet and ylang-ylang in the heart. Cared for by woody notes and refined by warm and soft white musk.

At the beginning of Valentino Uomo EDT we will see quite clearly the appearance of Citrus scent, but it is not fresh and refreshing because it is mixed with a bit of chocolate and slightly nutty chestnut, it will be a smell that makes you feel comfortable when spraying on cool weather days. After just a few minutes, the smell begins to feel sweet and fatty, the citrus is almost overwhelming and difficult to detect, still nutty from the chestnut but now there seems to be an additional presence of vanilla, making the scent even stronger. More comfortable, take a deep breath and feel really refreshed. Drydown will add a little more coffee and wood, giving us a sweet wood accord that's a bit rich and nutty, a bit deep, quite flattering and definitely easy to make women fall in love with. Valentino Uomo EDT will have a quiet look, but will still be quite polished and polite, with slicked-back hair styles, not very suitable for those who like dusty styles. The longevity of Valentino Uomo EDT is also quite good, it lasts on my skin for about 6 to 7 hours, even once I sprayed it to bed and the next morning there was still a faint sweet woody scent on my skin that was quite pleasant.

Avant L'Orage can be simply described as a scent made in the direction of light sweet, slightly powdery vanilla. Right from the opening of Avant L'Orage, we feel like we are smelling a caramel, but slightly burnt with a thick sweetness, with a little spiciness coming from the pepper. However, smell carefully and you will see that burning caramel feeling comes from the scent of vanilla, sandalwood and tonka bean. This is the type of smell that I would describe as instantly warming. It makes us feel like in the cold weather, wearing an extra layer of blazer, then entering a bakery, really relaxing and comfortable, but nothing rushed and everything is very peaceful and slow. , humble. Although it smells sweet, Avant L'Orage does not have a strong scent, but only a fairly close scent, suitable for girls who like skinscent scents, which I call discreetly attractive but easy to leave a strong impression on the other person.

Club de Nuit Intense Man by Armaf is a Woody Spicy perfume for men. Club de Nuit Intense Man was launched in 2015. Top notes are lemon, black currant, apple, bergamot and pineapple; middle notes are rose, jasmine and birch; Base notes are vanilla, ambergris, musk and patchouli.

Gentleman Givenchy Cologne is announced as a fresh and unexpected scent that shocks with its boldness. its violence and vigilance. This version allegedly embodies the rebellious and free spirit of the Givenchy character Gentleman. The composition contains notes of citrus, rosemary, iris, vetiver and musk. The creation is signed by perfumers Nathalie Lorson and Olivier Cresp, just like previous editions.

Eau de cologne Colonia Pura by Acqua di Parma is a powerful and multifaceted men's scent, creating the perfect balance between traditional and contemporary sophistication. Enjoy the citrus notes of this masculine scent. Discover its sensual masculinity, combined with fresh energy and modern lightness, and take the fragrance with you wherever you go.
