Early at dawn, from the garden behind the house, the sweet-scented orange tree turns over, catching drops of sunlight. The sound of laughter echoed from the end of the street, signaling that summer is coming with new adventures. On both sides of the road, rose bushes and honeysuckle are also blooming, making the neighborhood seem like it is wearing a new, fresher, more brilliant dress. Sundrunk is the flavor of youth, the early adulthood, wanting to explore. The world is crazy, the age we only experience once, but it leaves a special, indelible mark. Much later, when we are older and more mature, it will probably be difficult for us to forget that moment - a moment of the summer of our youth, pure and clear as a midday dream. Sundrunk's youthfulness and generosity remind us of our first kiss, awkward but passionate, full of unforgettable emotions.

Welcome 2020. Tom Ford launched a bottle of Tom Ford Rose Prick EDP perfume that delighted the lovers. Not only do you fall in love with the sweet, luxurious pink design. But also ecstatic with the scent of elegance, femininity and, above all, luxury.

Bleu de Chanel is a sophisticated and modern perfume by Chanel launched in 2010. Chanel presents its enhanced version , Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum, in summer 2014. The fragrance is dedicated to endless, profound and boundless freedom.

Roja Oceania opens with a feeling of freshness, brightness, light sweetness and extremely Pleasant comes from the citrus scent of Mandarin orange, Bergamote orange, lemon, grapefruit. In fact, in this opening, there will be nothing too special with these familiar citrus notes, but what makes us feel truly wow about Roja Oceania is the extremely real, high-class feeling. and expensive, just like Roja's usual scent. Wait a bit, and you'll see a little floral scent begin to appear quite clearly. The flowers are blended extremely smoothly, making it extremely difficult to separate out what type of flower there is. If I were to say that I could feel the most and clearly, then for me it would probably be lavender and jasmine and iris. clean and pleasant and slightly powdery, helping the scent become more balanced and smoother. The most valuable part of Roja Oceania for me is the Drydown, we will see the citrus still appear there, lighter, The ambergris is quite thick, accompanied by sandalwood, cedar, a little vetiver, musk and vanilla. A little bit of everything, extremely balanced and overall creates a feeling of luxury, extreme sophistication, absolutely Unisex. With a scent profile like Oceania's, it is difficult to have a scent that can stick well, however, with the use of extremely high-quality ingredients, which is Roja Dove's trademark, Oceania easily sticks on. skin for about 10 hours.

Burlington 1819 was launched by Roja Parfums in 2020, to commemorate the 5-year milestone that Roja Dove opened its Flagship store at Burlington Arcade, in top of the oldest and most luxurious shopping centers in England, also honoring this shopping center on the occasion of its 200th anniversary. At the time of launch, this perfume was only displayed and sold exclusively at Burlington Arcade, and only later did Roja begin to sell it commercially and widely. Burlington has an extremely pleasant and refreshing opening with a citrus scent combined with mint. Citrus here is a combination of many things, grapefruit, orange, green lemon. When you smell it carefully, you feel it is more grapefruit-like, a little sweet like ripe grapefruit cloves, and a little bitter. It's light like I'm pressing my finger on the peel of a yellow orange. There are many ingredients but it's easy to see how the blend is very good. It smells simple but the structure is very solid and has depth, balance and very pleasing to the nose. The smell is also quite natural and not chemical, something we have seen very clearly at Elysium and now Burlington 1819. This state will last about 15, 20 minutes and then gradually have a clear change. . It will no longer be as fresh and cool as it was at first, instead rum, tobacco and spices appear a lot with a bit of wood. Rum, for those who don't know, is a type of alcohol distilled from sugar cane, so in addition to the usual boozy feeling of the alcohol note, it also has a sweet feeling. And in this base we can clearly see the sweetness coming from the rum, it feels like there is also a bit of vanilla here, mixed with tobacco and ambergris, it smells very luxurious and has a bit of a classic feel. Everything is made to fit, not too cool but not too sweet like it makes people around feel uncomfortable, easy to spray in the summer. After about 2 hours, the smell completely settles on the skin, no more changes.

In 2021, when Musc Noir was released, this scent did not leave too much of an impression, so it was not mentioned much, but by 2022 the version The birth of Musc Noir Rose is a different story. The opening of Musc Noir Rose is a plum scent, a bit of slightly spicy pepper and a bit of bergamote. The plums here smell a bit sour, sweet but also slightly sour, like the smell of wine. If you pay close attention, you'll see a hint of lily, but the smell is a bit pungent and doesn't please the nose too much. Through my personal experience and that of a few friends, this is not a very flattering opening, it's not bad, but it's hard to leave an impression that makes people want to continue smelling it later. However, it only takes about 5 minutes to soften to a state of sweet, creamy vanilla smelling with musk. The plum will still be there, but it will no longer be as sour as before, but will return to a sweet and fruity state that flatters the nose, and the appearance of this note also makes Narciso's newly launched perfume quite unique. Unique, interesting and hard to find since most popular Designer bottles rarely contain this scent note. Even though the name is Musk Noir Rose, in this perfume bottle there is quite a bit of rose, but more tuberose. In drydown, it is not as pungent as the first but maintains a sweet, creamy state, helping the scent to increase its femininity. Overall, in terms of scent, it can be said that Musc Noir Rose will be a feminine, attractive, unique and flattering bottle, but you have to wait a while to spray it, it's not an instant noodle type, it's good as soon as you spray it. Yes, and I'm pretty sure it's suitable for making a signature scent without fear of being sold in the next few years. In my opinion, perhaps those who like the combo of musk combined with vanilla but want a more strange and different scent should try it because here we have a quite prominent fruity taste of plum or those who are fans of it. Narciso's is definitely not to be missed.

Prada's L'homme Prada L'eau perfume is a perfume for men. L'homme Prada L'eau was launched in 2017. The author behind this scent is Daniela (Roche) Andrier. Top notes are ginger and neroli; middle notes are iris and amber; Base notes are sandalwood, cedarwood and powder.

Star Magnolia by Jo Malone London is a perfume for women. Star Magnolia was launched in 2017. Behind this scent is Anne Flipo. Top notes are lemon, ginger and perilla; middle notes are magnolia and neroli; Base notes are cedar and amber.

The new version of the iconic Acqua di Gio, a variation of the Absolu, is presented presented in 2018 as a woody-marine interpretation in which fruit, marine notes and a wood base create harmony in a new, expressive way. The fragrance has been announced as one that brings new sensuality to the collection and is a sophisticated and masculine mixture of marine aromas with patchouli. The composition celebrates the fusion of water and wood; Acqua di Gio's new chapter shares the expression of one man's connection with nature and the release of his inner strength and freedom.
undefined

Strangers Burning Ben for me personally is an extremely masculine scent considering Stranger Perfumerie's creations. At Buring Ben, I found leather, tobacco, incense and especially black coffee. Just saying that much I think is enough to see how strong and dusty this scent is. Already. The opening of Stranger Burning Ben is slightly smoky leather accompanied by slightly burnt roasted coffee and dark chocolate. It is not a difficult smell but can easily make beginners who are just starting to try perfume shake. head. If you want to try Stranger Perfumerie's coffee in a lighter and more pleasant way, I would recommend you try SM Café or perhaps Roasted Coffee Cigarette Whiskey Come and get your Suded Honey Baby. I'm not a fan of leather scents, but in Burning Ben we have a leather scent blended quite smoothly with coffee and dark chocolate that makes me really want to wear this scent on cool days. After about 30 minutes, I gradually saw my favorite tobacco note appear along with a slightly animalic feeling, not outstanding but making the scent even more profound and masculine. When I smell it closely, I notice a slight sweetness. Like coffee, it seems to be seasoned with a little milk. After that, Strangers Burning Ben didn't seem to change much anymore, remaining on the skin for another 6-7 hours and then disappearing. If you are afraid of leather notes like me, but still want to wear a scent with such a masculine scent, perhaps Burning Ben will be an extremely reasonable choice.

Tom Ford brand introduced 3 new perfume products named: Jasmine Rouge, Violet Blonde and Santal Blush in the new collection New makeup collection in September 2011. Created by renowned expert Yann Vasnier, Jasmine Rouge will bring a passionate, mysterious and luxurious spicy woody scent with notes of sandalwood and spices playing the main role. The top notes of Santal Blush are quite normal and Natural: crisp, dry and resinous with notes of incense and fennel. As time passes and the initial sharpness becomes quieter, the sweetness of cinnamon and rose begins to be revealed, followed by a note of sandalwood that moves slowly and slowly to fill in. filling the cold void with some warmth and softness. Finally, there will be a mixture of oud wood and leather with a smoky and warm dry scent, entwined with soft, delicate jasmine and ylang-ylang flowers and while the sensual musk is gradually ignited and then all all explode together in an intense and outstanding way.

The first thing worth mentioning about YSL Y EDP Intense is that this version has been cut leave out a rather important note in Y EDP, which is green apple. In the EDP version, the green apple note is probably the note that is expressed most clearly and roundly, the smell of a ripe green apple. Normally, fruity notes that resemble ripe fruit in perfume such as apple, pineapple, or plum will bring a sweet feeling. Besides, YSL has also removed the Tonka bean note, a note that often brings a warm, sweet feeling. So that's the reason why right from the moment it was sprayed, YSL Y EDP Intense felt much less sweet than the EDP version. Another thing that can be easily noticed is that the wood in Y EDP Intense is thicker and clearer than the EDP version. We have a bit of pine wood from the juniper berries accompanied by an earthy woody feeling of vetiver and patchouli, and as time goes on we see them grow more and more clearly. Combined with the first, they make Y EDP Intense feel much more mature and masculine if placed next to Y EDP. These are probably the two most obvious differences that anyone can feel if comparing Y EDP with the Intense version. There is also another point that is not too obvious, which is that in this version there is the presence of lavender, it gives Y EDP intense a clean, slightly soapy feeling, also making the scent somewhat mature. than. Correctly understanding the meaning of the Intense version, it will be a Y EDP version that is less sweet and woody, somewhat mature and masculine. No longer a young, dynamic Y EDP, but a bit quieter. I believe it will be suitable for almost everyone, used for all occasions from going out to work, going on dates, and can be used almost all year round, it is still very versatile. Those who like the scent of Y EDP but feel it is sweeter than your taste, will probably suit this version very well. Or for people with basic fragrant needs, who like neat and elegant scents like Bleu de Chanel and want a change of pace, it will probably be quite suitable.

Lily & Tangerine by Label is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. Lily & Tangerine was launched in 2020. The nose behind this fragrance is Angela Ciampagna. Top notes are Tangerine, Lily, Jasmine and Lemon; middle notes are Magnolia, Violet and Rose; base notes are Musk, Sandalwood and Amber.

As its name suggests, Original Vetiver strongly recreates a grassy scent Traditional vetiver. Before Original Vetiver, only a portion of the vetiver plant was used in a scent. House of Creed infuses all three parts of the plant: the roots, the lush green leaves, and the rich heart to freshen the blend. The result is a scent reminiscent of long summers, invigorating and vivacious, it leaves an air of seductive freshness around anyone lucky enough to wear it.

Versace Eros Flame was launched in 2018, described as a line of emotions filled with inner feelings and the conflicting and contradictory expressions of people's moods. Men with a strong, confident and successful appearance. Still retaining the charm and masculinity of its brother Eros, but Versace's innovative way of creating scent has created a personality-filled Eros Flame with scent tones of citrus, sandalwood, and vanilla. and black pepper, geranium and tonka bean, described as 'cold and hot, sweet and spicy, light and dark'. The concept is created based on an inspiring story of passionate love, with the protagonist being the scent of a strong, passionate, confident man who is in deep touch with his feelings. own emotions. Olivier Pescheux is the perfumer who created Versace Eros Flame, with the desire to create a new, more explosive, deeper bottle of Eros, and especially in the heart of Eros, there is always a fire of passion. The passion never stops, burning like Versace Eros Flame.

'Fresh. Distinctive. Stimulate. Tom Ford pushes the traditional boundaries of scent with Lavender Extreme. Lavender is reworked and refracted like never before to become something incredible new that is a stunning electric creation worn at maximum volume. Lavender is uplifted, translated from its storied origins in Provence and into a new subversion of its own. '- Tom Ford.

Besides Warni Warni and Bain de Midi, Arashi No Umi is certainly also an extremely easy-to-smell and likeable scent of Maison Matine . This perfume bottle has both the sweet and fresh fruity features of ripe fruits from green apples and peaches, as well as the gentle and feminine floral features of freesia and jasmine. The scent is balanced between the above two aspects, along with a base of musk and sandalwood, giving us an overall cool, pleasant and feminine scent. When I first started trying this scent, I wondered a few times if it looked like something, very familiar. And only later did I realize that it is quite similar to Chance Eau de Tendre, but smells a bit more youthful and uplifting, fresher than the scent from Chanel.
undefined

Just sprayed, the most obvious thing I see is patchouli, it really feels dry and dark and warm. , combined with the smell of incense and wood, has a slightly bozzy vibe of alcohol and spicy notes of spices. This opening is actually really good and smooth, however if you haven't used or smelled many perfumes with slightly hardcore notes, then I think Duro will make you feel a little drunk. The boozy feeling above passed very quickly, on my skin was the smell of wood - patchouli and leather, with a subtle scent of incense. Talking about patchouli, this is a quite common ingredient in perfumes, it usually evokes a slightly dark feeling, the smell is somewhat earthy, quite masculine. It takes a few hours for my skin to not be able to smell the incense scent. Moreover, it has a woody and musk base, still very masculine and somewhat dark. This smell reminds me of real menly grown men, people who know clearly who they are and what they need. When translated, Duro means tough, and I think this name really and concisely describes the scent of the perfume. It's really attractive, but it's not a scent that everyone can use, but only those who are masculine and experienced.

Montabaco can Presents a tribute to the tobacco notes of Ormonde Jayne. With the perfumer's ingenuity, Montabaco seems to have escaped the tobacco-honey motif that perhaps we are all too familiar with in many recent creations, but Motabaco focuses on bringing a scent note. Bright tobacco, by combining tobacco with tea, magnolia flowers, adding a little spice and ozonic notes, creates an extremely airy tobacco-themed scent, not thick or cloying. and unpleasantly sweet, a novel expression of the tobacco note, and extremely rare in perfumes. Montabaco does not hide the use of synthetic ingredients, when in addition to the rarely seen notes such as 'mountain air' listed in the scent composition, author Geza Schoen has added a large amount of Iso E Super to the scent, creating into an extremely dry and clear woody note, characteristic of this scent molecule, which seems to emphasize the lightness and levity of Montabaco. The synthetic scent notes used in Montabaco do not give us the usual feeling of discomfort or prickly nose, but on the contrary, the synthetic scent notes combine very well with natural scent notes, creating an overall scent. Extremely smooth and round. Montabaco, with its wonderful combination of synthetic scent notes created by humans, transformed into a novel scent, is a great tribute to human creativity and crafting ability. , as well as charting our human development journey towards a future where humans and nature harmonize to create wonderful things.

Creed Himalaya is the crystallization of a passionate father-son relationship when crafted by Olivier Creed himself and his beloved son - Erwin Creed. With a metal-like exterior design, the author has implicitly recreated the snow-capped hilltops sparkling under the golden sunlight. The top notes can instantly arouse vitality in anyone. , Grapefruit, Bergamot and Lemon release their succulent, sweet and youthful scents. The combination of Citrus reflects the brightest and brightest colors, lighting up a positive tone for the overall Creed Himalaya. Single but not faded, the next layer of incense with only Sandalwood is not makes Creed Himalaya less attractive, but on the contrary, enhances the unique beauty of this sturdy woody scent. Strong and straightforward, Sandalwood has carved a statue of a modern man, simple but no less fashionable. With Cedar in the background, the initially subtle woody scent is now gradually bolder, enveloping. My gaze reaches infinity. Distilling more delicate and elegant flavors, Musk and Ambergris - two precious gifts from nature - captivate our sense of smell with their irresistible charm, buoyancy, and sweetness.

Orto Parisi Brutus is a perfume bottle inspired by the historical figure Marcus Junius Brutus, a senator of the Roman Republic. He is considered the person who led the assassination that led to the death of Julius Caesar, an important event in world history and was depicted in the famous painting The Death of Julius Caesar. Personally, after trying Orto Parisi Brutus feels that this is a scent that portrays the image of a strong, decisive and courageous man. I'm not someone who is very knowledgeable about history, but I enjoy learning about it. For me, the words I just described the scent are quite suitable to talk about Brutus, so I see that Orto Parisi's scents are not only good but the naming is also extremely interesting, right? Going into details, Brutus is a scent revolving around patchouli. The opening is a citrus feeling accompanied by spices, a bit smoky, with a light feel, not thick or dark. Very quickly after that, just a few minutes, I felt the patchouli come on quite thick and clear. The patchouli in Orto Parisi Brutus is made quite realistically, has a moderate earthy touch, and for some reason on my skin it reminds me a bit of dark chocolate, and I immediately thought of another of Alessandro's creations, Pardon, however However, if compared, I like Brutus better. Later, the patchouli becomes clearer, creating a dark, thick and slightly sweet feeling, and gradually leather appears. After about 1 hour on the skin, at this point the scent completely dries down, it is a dark, thick, slightly smoky and leathery patchouli-like scent that creates a quite masculine, strong vibe like what I said before. head. And finally, Brutus's scent lasts for more than 10 hours on my skin. It feels like Orto Parisi does a pretty solid and even job with its scents.

Light Blue Forever Pour Homme opens with all Citrus from bergamote and grapefruit is very realistic, it feels succulent like you are cutting a grapefruit, tiny jets of water shoot out a sweet feeling mixed with a bit of bitterness, but fresh and very pleasant, if you smell it carefully. , there will be something slightly spicy and cool. This is honestly one of the most realistic bottles of grapefruit notes I've ever smelled. I like this slightly bitter and acrid citrus-style opening, because it feels real and not generic compared to many other perfume bottles. About 20 minutes later, Citrus calmed down, still there but not as obvious as at first. Here, the aquatic and slightly salty feeling of the sea begins to feel, possibly due to the Ozonic notes and a bit of ambroxan creating this vibe. Aquatic here is quite gentle, fresh and not fishy so it is quite safe and easy to use. At this point, when the scent calms down on the skin, you can clearly see some purple flowers, vetiver and patchouli on a gentle musk background. Vetiver and patchouli are two notes often used in perfume to create an earthy, slightly dark, masculine, and strong feeling. However, in this bottle, the vetiver and patchouli are quite clean, not too earthy, and quite bright. Combined with the citrus notes of grapefruit and musk for a clean, masculine vibe. Overall, this bottle when drydown still retains the citrus notes of grapefruit, which is very pleasant, easy to use and flatters the nose.

Product_name: Roasted Coffee Cigarette Whisky Come and get your Suede Honey Baby
Description: Many times I have been asked for advice on a coffee-themed scent that smells pleasant and relaxing. Honestly, I'm a person who really likes to drink black coffee, so the coffee flavors I like all have a very strong, bitter raw coffee flavor like Kerosene Follow or Little Song by Meo fusciuni. That's why it's quite difficult for me to recommend a coffee scent that's easy to smell and relaxing. And today, perhaps I have found a suitable scent to introduce to everyone - Strangers Roasted Coffee Cigarette Whiskey Come and get your Suede Honey Baby. Because the name is too long, perhaps within the scope of this article I would like to call it Strangers Roasted Coffee. Smelling the nozzle of Strangers Roasted Coffee for the first time, I was startled and thought of something extremely familiar, perhaps to all of us - Kopiko coffee candy. Having said that, perhaps you have somewhat imagined the smell of coffee with a moderate milky aspect, very pleasant and pleasing to the nose, right? As soon as I sprayed it on my hand, I felt like I was smelling a cup of milky coffee with moderately ground black coffee, roasted with chocolate and then mixed with a cup of coffee with lots of milk. Smell carefully, you will smile slightly when you see a slight boozy feeling somewhere, as if from a little whiskey and honey. The added honey makes the scent even sweeter and extremely warm. The drydown of Strangers Roasted Coffee will be a bit smoky of tobacco. At this time, the coffee calms down quite a lot, we feel more wood and patchouli, the smell gradually leans towards a rather masculine direction. Imagine you are thinking about what scent to use for your first date, it must be strange and unique, hard to match but also flattering to easily impress that person, then perhaps Strangers Roasted Coffee will be the one. The choice couldn't be better.

The scent of Strangers Oliver opens like a cool glass of Mojito, accompanied by citrus from all kinds of oranges, tangerine, grapefruit. Taking a deep breath, we feel a slightly salty feeling of sea salt lingering in the base of our nose, and a bit of cool spiciness coming from lemon leaves and sage. All the ingredients are blended together perfectly to create a citrus scent that smells extremely refreshing, pleasant, and slightly green. Imagine you spray Strangers Oliver on a hot summer day, I'm sure you will close your eyes and smile slightly, like a cool breeze blowing to dispel the sultry discomfort around you. Later on, the scent developed more and more in a masculine direction with ambergris accompanying wood and tobacco, exuding a toughness, a rich inner life, always confident in intuition and instinct but still know how to listen to your heart. Strangers Oliver is not a strong scent, but just a light, refreshing body scent, perhaps most suitable for calm, unobtrusive people rather than those who like themselves. always stand out from the crowd... If you still can't imagine the image I'm talking about, you can try searching online for the image of the character Oliver in the famous movie Call me by your name produced in 2017, I I won't go into more details about the movie, but to say the least, perhaps Oliver is actually the perfect name that Prin could have given to his creation. This scent spray really reminds me of image of the character of the same name in the movie. 'Parce-que c'etait lui, parce-que c'etait moi''Call me by your name and I'll call you by mine''And I would say I love you But saying it out loud is hardSo I won' t say it at all And I won't stay very long.'

Vétiver Overdrive by L'Orchestre Parfum is a Woody Floral Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vétiver Overdrive was launched in 2022. Vétiver Overdrive was created by Amelie Bourgeois and Anne-Sophie Behaghel.

Here is a Tom Ford perfume line belonging to the Citrus group. Sole di Positano was launched in 2017. Besides, Pink Mandarin and Bitter Orange are the two flavors you can easily feel when using this perfume.

Signorina is Italian, it means a young woman, full of life, innocent and loving. The bright notes of Red Currant soaked with Pink Pepper bring boldness to this girl's scent, gentle but full of arrogance. Signorina carries within herself a whole garden of flowers, with the elegance of Jasmine, the sweetness of Roses and the fragility and ladyship of Peony. Signorina EDP has a very cute and shy appearance, but when touched, the flavor of Panacotta mixed with musk, turning that femininity into an aggressive weapon that attracts all eyes, warm and full of body. charity.

In the Southern United States, there is an extremely popular and famous cocktail, called Mint Julep. With ingredients from Bourbon, mint, sugar syrup and ice, it is extremely easy to drink, and is served a lot at horse racing tracks in Kentucky. Inspired by this unique drink, Imaginary Authors launched Saint Julep, a scent that to me is both familiar and strange, and also extremely interesting. Saint Julep opens with a cool, genuine and pleasant mint feeling accompanied by the sweet feeling of sugar, sugar syrup to be exact, with a little sweetness of kumquat and the boozyness of whiskey. I find it familiar because it is very similar to a very famous perfume bottle, which is Baccarat Rouge 540 EDP version. It's strange, maybe it's thanks to the addition of cool-smelling mint and the boozy touch from the wine. I find it interesting, that's the way Josh Meyer recreates Mint Julep in this perfume bottle so well. When you make a cup of Mint Julep, first put mint leaves in the cup along with a few cups of sugar syrup, stir well and add alcohol. Next, add ice, stir well and add a few drops of bitter orange, and we have a Mint Julep cocktail. Do you see that this scent changes really a lot like how to make a cocktail? It sounds simple but I personally find it really interesting, and of course for mixing perfume With a scent like that, it's not simple.

Chanel has just launched a men's perfume line - Allure Homme Sport Eau Extreme and added it to the collection. Famous episode of Allure Homme. The first product of this line was launched in 1999 and not long after that, several other versions appeared such as: Allure Homme Eau Fraichissante Pour l`Ete, Allure Homme Edition Blanche, Allure Homme Sport and Allure Homme Sport Cologne Sport. Master Jacques Polge once again brought this product line to new heights with a more earthy, attractive scent. Allure Sport Extreme is aimed at sports enthusiasts, so the company chose professional surfer Danny Fully as its image representative. With his masculine and attractive beauty, he fully defines the message. that this product delivers in less than 20 seconds before the frame. 'You are a unique and unique man, that is your personality.'

That's why quite a few new bottles are released at that time. The beginning of 2020 brings a much gentler color and fragrance and the sweet and spicy tones are also softened. And so is this guy from YSL, L`Homme Le Parfum wearing an extremely fresh green shirt that was also just released in February this year with a traditional design and a new woody scent..? Top notes: Primafiore lemon essence, ozonic, cardamom? Middle notes: Basil, violet leaves, geranium? Last scent: Cedarwood, amber essential oil, vetiver. Modernity and elegance are what Yves Saint Laurent wants to encapsulate in this perfume bottle. The power of cedar wood is enveloped in the precious scent of amber and vetiver essence. More than a scent, L`Homme Le Parfum also reflects the taste of a man's skin under the perfect outfit.

'Sea monster', 'God of war clinging to the siege', 'Captain of the Ambroxan regiment', etc. are the things that if I wanted to share joy about Orto Parisi Megamare, I would comment like that. If I'm serious, I would have to say that this is one of the best aquatic scents ever produced. In Italian, 'mage' in Megamare means sea, and perhaps this is the name. Perfect for Orto Parisi Megamare as the name describes the spirit of this scent extremely accurately. If we simply describe Megamare as a smell full of sea scent with an extremely thick, slightly salty aquatic scent of sea water and seaweed, then we can clearly feel the ambroxan in abundance, then it is definitely impossible to describe Megamare. Full description of what Orto Parisi Megamare actually does. I have had the opportunity to experience this scent for more than 2 weeks in a row, and I really find this scent extremely deep, as deep as the way it describes the sea. The first time I sprayed Megamare, I felt like I was diving in the vast ocean. At an unbelievable depth, I found an anchor from a ship that had sunk several hundred years ago. forgotten, full of moss, algae and strange sea creatures clinging to it. And the more I smell it, the more attracted I feel to Megamare, I just want to inhale it forever. One of the men's perfume monuments, loved by many and hated by many, is Dior Sauvage EDT, with the main focus being pepper and Ambroxan. Many times when I smell Sauvage's Ambroxan, especially on hot summer days, I get a real headache. Also with Ambroxan, it is extremely thick, much thicker than Sauvage, but Orto Parisi Megamare is extremely flattering, pleasant and smooth. If you are someone who really loves the sea, and wants to find for yourself one and only scent of the sea, then I believe Megamare deserves to be the perfume you are looking for.

For his perfumes, Pierre Montale travels to the most beautiful places in the world. This also applies to his latest work Soleil d'Italie. This Eau de parfum evokes Italian charm and sophistication. The scent of sun-drenched citrus fruits combines with the fresh scent of vetiver, the sweetness of rose and the warmth of golden amber. A fresh summer creation that captures Joie de vivre, sensuality and the feeling of the Italian sun on your skin.

Common Porcelain Flower If you smell carefully, you will notice that it has many nuances that are easy to name: it has a bit of gardenia and jasmine, and is a bit fruity like pineapple, orange, plum, overripe banana, sometimes it shows up. The sweet feeling is a bit thick and sticky like the smell of candy. At Label Frangipani, we will see that perfumer Angela Ciampagna knows how to choose ingredients, putting orange blossom and lily of the valley as the focus, giving us a slightly citrusy floral look, while also being moist and slightly soapy. I feel like I'm smelling the jasmine flowers of the lily of the valley. Added to that clean, feminine white floral accord is the slightly sticky sweetness of honey, vanilla and ripe plums, blended smoothly without being too much, very moderately sweet, especially when Label Frangipani The interaction on the skin is moderately sweet, natural and pleasant, pleasing to the nose of those around.

Le Labo's Rose 31 is a floral perfume, Wood Musk for men and women was launched in 2006. The perfumer who created this fragrance is Daphne Bugey. The goal of Rose 31 is clear: to change the famous Grasse rose into a strong, assertive fragrance for men. With Rose 31, the Le Labo brand has revealed a very sensual blend of woody and spicy scents, and it's all centered around the wonderful perfume rose.

When you first spray it, you will feel a very green feeling coming from the fig leaf, the green will be a bit harsh, combined with citrus to create a fruity look like you are smelling it. The guava fruit is just ripe. If you are observant, you will see that Amber & Fig also has a creamy touch from almonds similar to Yesterday A Haze from Imaginary Authors. Overall, it can be seen that the green touch goes hand in hand with Creamy from beginning to end, making the scent not too greasy like Yesterday a Haze but quite moderate, smelling very pleasant. After drying completely, Amber & Fig will still have the slightly sticky sweetness of Amber, but it's just an auxiliary to add to the Accord's main scent of Fig and Almond. It's the feeling of the scent that is very green at first, but becomes sweeter later on, making us feel like the scent effect in front of us is gradually ripening, with a clear and interesting change.

Sì Passione Intense by Giorgio Armani is a perfume for women. This is a new fragrance. Sì Passione Intense was launched in 2020. The author behind this scent is Julie Masse. Top note is blackcurrant syrup; middle note is jasmine; Base notes are white musk, patchouli, vanilla and cedar.

Kumquat, after which this perfume is named, is a fruit small orange from East Asia with a sour, slightly bitter taste. Your refined, tart and fresh spirit will unmistakably blow through the top notes of KUMKAT GOOD, characterized by grapefruit and bergamot accents. A hint of spice also resonates as the top notes flow into the heart note, where, along with patchouli, delicious florals and amber create the melody. In arid forests, fine sandalwood and cedar warm the nose and soul, rounded out by white musk and vetiver.

Dior Eau Sauvage blooms on the skin with an extremely refreshing, cool, green feeling that stimulates the sense of smell with lemon, bitter orange, rosemary and basil, no need to be too observant or experienced with scents. Many of you can also see that the initial scent is green and herbal, giving off a vibe a bit like the scent of lemongrass, extremely clean and pleasant, not in the direction of modern scents but quite clearly the classic here. After only about 10 minutes, Dior Eau Sauvage will begin to smell softer, less green, and the scent will begin to bloom. The clearest and easiest to grasp is the bright, clear feeling coming from jasmine and a characteristic hint of powder from iris. When the scent calms down on the skin, we will now have a slightly woody base of vetiver mixed with a bit of citrus and flowers present from beginning to end. The most special and interesting point about the scent of Eau Sauvage to me is jasmine. The ingredient that creates the jasmine scent in Eau Sauvage is a chemical called Hedione. As for what Hedione is, please click on the link here to continue reading.

A fragrant creation with the theme of Damask rose. The official name of the Damask rose originates from the capital of Syria, the city of Damascus, and it is still believed that the city of Damascus is the birthplace of the legendary rose with thick petals and an extremely seductive fragrance. This. The scent is a combination of rose with an assortment of other fruity notes such as pear, lemon, blackcurrant and strawberry. Damask seems to take us for a walk in a garden filled with plants and an early morning, when the sunlight is just glimmering through the leaves still covered in night dew, extremely relaxing and peaceful. When the scent calms down, musk and amber appear with persistent rose from beginning to end, creating an extremely cute sweet and gentle vibe.

Saharian Wind by Mancera is a perfume for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Sahary Wind was launched in 2020. Top notes are leather, bergamot, pink pepper and spices; middle notes are tuberose, cypress and lavender; Base notes are patchouli, woody notes, tobacco, vanilla, amber and white musk.

White Musk Collection Jasmine Musk women's perfume is suitable for women over 25 years old. This is a Tom Ford perfume line that has a moderate longevity - 3 hours to 6 hours. and the scent radiating is long-distance - the scent radiates within a radius of 2 meters. White Musk Collection Jasmine Musk is suitable for use both day and night in spring. Calice Becker is the creator of this perfume. Besides, Jasmine and Musk are the two scents you can easily feel when using this perfume.

Indian Dream is a eau de parfum with top notes of fresh geranium, heliotrope and a lively and inspiring orange blossom. The heart opens with captivating and embracing Indian jasmine, captivating the heart with a Turkish rose and amber scent. Indian Dream achieves the typical Mancera durability with a wonderful combination of sandalwood, vetiver and rounded vanilla, which is like a very delicate icing on the cake on the fully developed fragrance. A very well-rounded, well-integrated fragrance of floral, woody and powdery with the above average quality usual for Mancera.

As the name suggests of it, black will be the color of the game, when it really starts, just for a moment you blink, roses and other scents are like jewels so shining in the dark night full of mystery. Black rose, dark and quiet, is enveloped in a coating of oud, amber and campory patchouli and finally, surrounding a still blackness will be a mixture of saffron and truffle, mixed with a A touch of vanilla and moss. Noir de Noir was born for the 'night owls' of the perfume world. The smell of black orchids is an expression of love for the exciting and romantic night life. In the enveloping darkness, a sexy and attractive scent gradually reveals itself, arousing the senses and keeping you immersed. That's Noir de Noir.

The One for men Intense launched in 2020 with a unique and seductive combination of amber and tobacco scent. While the amber is sweet and warm, the medicinal scent is attractively masculine. Combined with warm spicy ginger in the middle notes, this perfume truly stimulates the senses and attracts those around you.

Men's perfume Invictus Aqua (2018) is suitable for all ages. This is the Paco Rabanne perfume line that has good scent retention and close fragrance - radiates fragrance within one arm. Invictus Aqua (2018) is highly versatile. and can be used all year round. This is the Paco Rabanne perfume line belonging to the Woody Aquatic group.

In the price range of around 1 million Dong, it can be firmly affirmed that Armaf Ventana Pour Homme is the most worth buying Clone perfume bottle from Dior Sauvage. In fact, if you just spray it and expect it to be extremely similar to Sauvage, no, usually the user will have to wait about 10 minutes for the scent to begin to subside, only then will we feel that it resembles Sauvage. , and the later it becomes, the more similar it becomes. The easiest and most obvious difference in Ventana compared to the original is probably the removal of almost all the spicy notes from black pepper. It will be both the strength and the weakness of this perfume. There are some people who like the spiciness coming from that pepper, making the scent extremely strong and masculine, however there are also many people in the opposite direction, feeling afraid of the spiciness from that pepper, creating a Something feels a bit prickly and strong, especially in the summer. If you are type two, like the classic scent of Sauvage but don't like the spicy pepper and want a safer, less personal scent, then perhaps Armaf Ventana will be a quite reasonable choice. Or, if you simply like the smell of Sauvage but don't have enough financial resources, I believe this would be a reasonable alternative.

Sunscreen! That was the first thing that popped into my head the first time I tried Maison Matine's Bain de Midi. It sounds a bit strange, but actually, this will be quite easy to understand if you look at the ingredients list of this perfume bottle, Tiare flower, ylang ylang, vanilla and coconut. This perfume bottle has a creamy touch mixed with the light fruity touch of Tiare along with ylang ylang, the characteristic creamy taste of vanilla, and a bit of fatty coconut flesh. All combined to create a scent with a white flower - vanilla theme that is quite easy to like and love of Maison Matine. I believe that all of us have used sunscreen products, and if you like the feeling of wearing a light, faint and pleasant scent like when using sunscreen, then you should not. skip Bain de Midi.

This is a classic but very delicate Fougère scent with the smell of oakmoss. The opening notes are Bergamot, Verbena and Lavender. The middle notes are jasmine, white cedar and southern plum. The base note blends artificial moss with ambroxan, sandalwood, and tonka bean. Legend is a masculine scent, attractive to confident, mature men. Legend has an outstanding and sophisticated fragrance. The scent is simple but strong but not too strong. Legend will help you leave an impression wherever you go.

So famous for making Citrus scents, at Mefisto, Xerjoff did not hesitate Afraid to use his strengths, so skillful that every drop of orange blossom, lemon,... is extremely clear and delicate. In addition, at Mefisto we feel the extremely smooth blend of lavender with iris, creating a clean but no less creative, elegant, Mediterranean feel. The interesting thing here is the vibrancy when it comes to the skin, cheerful and bustling and changing clearly according to hot and cold weather. If you love Creed's Silver Mountain Water and want a scent with better longevity, Mefisto is a more reasonable choice.

Just sprayed When you release Vetiver Santal, you will clearly notice the rather mellow bitter lemon scent mixed with the fresh, green and slightly sour scent of bergamote, creating a very pleasant, delicate and clear opening like a walk in a place. The countryside is peaceful and quiet without any noise on a sunny afternoon. This opening of Vetiver Santal does not have the feeling of exploding in the direction of scents with the same citrus opening, perhaps because a bit of woody nuance also appears to keep the scent from being too overwhelming, something very French elegance. Without making us wait long, the scent gradually appears quite clearly woody from vetiver and sandalwood, it transforms quite delicately and naturally. Here we will see a dry shade that is quite suitable for the vetiver, not smoky or wet like many other vetiver-themed perfumes I have tried. Smells thick but quite green and elegant, mixed with a bit of an earthy feeling but does not give a dirty feeling but is clean, a vetiver shade that is very easy to like even for people new to perfume. Besides, we also have rich, creamy sandalwood, which when combined with vetiver gives us an extremely pleasant, clean, woody scent. Towards the end, we notice a warm, slightly sweet feeling from the resin and patchouli, just faintly and as a complementary background for our two main characters, making the scent somewhat soft but still very masculine. and solid. If you like the smell of wood that is thick, dry, solid, strong and thorny, with a fiery clinging scent like Santal 33, then you can skip this bottle of perfume right away. And if you are a person who follows the simple, polite, not flashy dress style and has no need to show off and likes sophistication, then perhaps Vetiver Santal will suit you very well.

The initial impression when I first sprayed Creed Absolu Aventus was that it was interesting and I even liked this opening more than Creed Aventus, the smell is rich, thick and has The feeling of olfactory stimulation is much more than the original. It feels like it will have a darker color, still has a fresh feeling with a bit of fruity sweetness, but we don't see the pineapple flavor as clearly as the regular version anymore. This scent thickness of Creed Absolu Aventus reminds me a bit of Aventus bottles from a long time ago, maybe 2014 or 2015 or so. At that time, the original Aventus was still very good quality, you sprayed it on your skin and it was shiny with essential oils. Sometimes even 15 or 20 minutes later, it's still there and hasn't completely dried on the skin. Creed Absolu Aventus gave me a similar feeling, it took about 10 minutes to dry on the skin. And when you spray this scent on your skin, you will feel something a bit sticky, sweet and spicy, I guess it's the spices from cinnamon and cardamom. If you pay close attention, you'll realize there's a little ginger added. But for me, this ginger note is not really obvious enough to be easily recognized. Similar to the original, it still pleases the nose right from the first try. After about 20 minutes, the smell begins to gradually change to drydown, the citrus and fruity notes now begin to fade quite clearly, and become quite bright and the warm spicy notes begin to take the spotlight. I clearly feel the spiciness of pink pepper mixed with cinnamon, on a slightly smoky woody base of vetiver and patchouli. The vetiver in the drydown part of this bottle is clean, the patchouli is not dirty but just a bit green and earthy, overall it will be a slightly smoky woody base with warm spicy spices from cinnamon and pepper, plus a little more ambroxan. It reminds me a little of Dior Sauvage Elixir, about 40%, kind of a little similar but not too much. Overall, it gives us a scent that is quite luxurious, masculine, and somewhat mature. The smell is definitely quite outstanding in the crowd. Regarding the ideal time to use Creed Absolu Aventus, it will be suitable for Men, use in autumn and winter. The scent of this perfume can be said to be quite versatile, can be used for all occasions, but is especially suitable for going out at night or going to parties. Regarding scent performance, for me, it doesn't really meet expectations. . Before using, I thought the Absolu version would last about 10 hours, but on the skin, it shines quite well in the first 4-5 hours and stays skincent for about 2 hours. Of course it didn't meet expectations, but it can still be considered okay.

This story of sexiness and seduction continues with a new chapter – smooth, powerful and delicate at the same time; Narciso Poudrée is warm and strong. The goal is to create a fragrant cloud that emphasizes a natural and mature femininity. Powdery musk dominates the heart of the perfume, which opens with a floral combination of Bulgarian rose and white jasmine. The woody scent of vetiver, black and white cedar finishes the composition.

When it comes to perfume, the mysterious Tom Ford certainly cannot be ignored. and enchantment. In the latest collection, this brand has introduced a new perfume line called Tom Ford Venetian Bergamot which is a great combination of country flavors and romance. This perfume bottle has both the gentle scent of magnolia flowers and the gentle, loving scent of ylang ylang and gardenia flowers. Besides, it is also sweet and fresh with the scent of cedar and sandalwood. This combination evokes images of a romantic afternoon in the city.

Inspired by the elegance and timelessness of a little black dress , the perfume exudes Parisian elegance and grace. It opens with playful and sparkling aromas of black cherry, bergamot, red berries and almonds. Bulgarian and Turkish roses dominate the heart, developing further with notes of licorice and smoked black tea. Aniseed, tonka bean, vanilla, iris and patchouli form the base.

Maltol & Cinnamon by Label is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. Maltol & Cinnamon was launched in 2020. The nose behind this fragrance is Angela Ciampagna. Top notes are Maltol, Caramel and Walnut; middle notes are Cinnamon, Red Currant and Blackberry; base notes are Benzoin, Vanilla, Sandalwood and Musk.

The Tom Ford brand launched a new men's scent called Gray Vetiver in September 2009. With the scent of vetiver playing the main role, Gray Vetiver will be embellished with scents that carry the scent of vetiver. Salty and warm woody scent..In Tom Ford Gray Vetiver, the main character is vetiver, crafted to bring freshness and appeal - both classic, luxurious, bold and masculine. The scent of vetiver will gradually appear from behind the wings to the main stage and continue to develop from the top scent to the base scent. And this grassy flavor is extracted using a revolutionary extraction method. The top scent is quite fresh with a mixture of orange blossom, grapefruit and sage, gradually enveloping a warm layer of woody notes and enlivening the middle notes. Full of energy is gradually radiating with a mixture of orris, cardamom and pimento peppers. A whiff of shiny golden amber wood leads the scent to a rich and attractive base note. Oakmoss brings a natural green and woody scent, it is this aroma that completes the harmony of the perfume, creating a cool feeling, but at the same time the scent seems to melt into natural body heat.

What is the most special thing about this perfume bottle? Black Afgano contains the scent of cannabis. So is it really like that? The opening is strong and thick, real quality. Yes, there is definitely a smell of marijuana in here, not too much or dominant, but it is clearly noticeable, and there is something that evokes a slightly green feeling. The cannabis here feels quite good, delicate, not too harsh or overwhelming, very moderate. The most obvious is the smell of incense, with a bit of spice, resin and wood. A while later, when the scent of Black Afgano calms down, the scent of cannabis also fades quite quickly, and if you smell it really closely, you can see it, but not as clearly as in the opening. A pretty interesting change of smell, at this point we can still clearly see the slightly sweet scent of tree resin that seems to be mixed with a bit of vanilla sweetness, the slightly warm scent of patchouli and agarwood with a hint of incense and musk. After completely softening on the skin, we are left with a bit of tree resin, tobacco scent and a slightly animalic scent of agarwood. If you like clean, pleasant and safe scents, then Black Afgano will not be the scent for you. It suits more romantic, individualistic guys. Even this perfume bottle can be used by any woman who has personality and likes to stand out. If you are really confident about yourself, know what you need, and want a scent that stands out from the crowd, is different and unique, then try Black Afgano.
