A Whiff of Waffle Cone is a perfume bottle made specifically by Imaginary Authors for the famous handmade ice cream shop Salt & Straw in Oregon, USA. In the vast world of scents, there is an extremely rich branch that is gourmand perfume - bottles inspired by food. And A Whiff of Waffle Cone is such a perfume. Imagine the feeling when you walk into an ice cream shop, where we smell the slightly greasy aroma of the ice cream cone, the unique sweet smell of vanilla and caramel that can never be mistaken. All wrapped up perfectly in A Whiff of Waffle Cone, a scent that smells 'delicious', salivates and easily makes us feel 'hungry'. To me, this is a perfume that lovers of sweet scents, especially gourmand, should really have in their collection.
Sailing Day was launched in 2017. Besides, Sea scent and Aldehyde scent are the two flavors you can easily feel when using this perfume.

Perfumes that use Vanilla as the main note will easily cause headaches and discomfort because the scent is quite sweet and harsh. However, Vanille Fatale is not in this case. While scent notes such as fragrant roasted Coffee beans, spicy Saffron and Myrrh easily leave a strong impression, the harshness of Vanilla has been greatly reduced and only leaves a gentle sweet scent!

Classified as a winter-attractive fragrance for both men and women, Oud Wood Intense is introduced as a bold and attractive scent. to uncontrollably reveal the strong and noble imprints of agarwood. This leading nuance is majestically echoed by the notes of cypress and becomes even more strangely attractive.

If in the realm of perfumes for For men from Giorgio Armani, we have White Gio which is a classic perfume for the summer, cool, pleasant, versatile, suitable for all ages, similar to the women's perfume it will be Acqua di Gioia and worth mentioning. The most used is the EDP version. In Acqua di Gioia, we have the fresh and refreshing scent of lemon, mint and jasmine on a base of gentle, pure white musk. In particular, in this perfume bottle, mint is very soothing and fresh, not pungent, it seems to be added to create a cool effect when first sprayed, making both the person spraying and the person smelling it feel comfortable and full. energy. It feels like the whole space is covered with a coolness like the sky after the rain. In the EDP version, Acqua di Gioia also has a pretty good scent longevity, about 6 hours on the skin. With such a cool, clean, elegant and pleasant scent, it can be said that 6 hours is a long time. The number is extremely good. Perhaps in terms of versatility as well as its scent performance for the summer, it is completely comparable to D&G's Light Blue Eau Intense version.

Calvin Klein launches a beige CK perfume bottle with the message 'always be yourself'. With the simplest possible design, dressed in black, CK beau wants you to be true to yourself, no matter who you are, what you do, what you are like, your nature is yours. is the most important thing. In CK, there are ingredients of Sandalwood and Cedarwood. Some people say they feel CK like the smell of a good old book, and want to open it and read it again and again. But CK Be's top note is Lavender combined with musk, bringing a feeling of closeness, warmth and sweetness. The scent of peaches mixed with the scent of green grass and orchids, makes CK more attractive and fresh. I personally consider CK Be to be truly a very Unisex scent, because of the natural friendliness and suggestiveness of CK Be for any gender.

Fleur musc was born from the desire to create a scent with a heart of musk surrounded by warm rich pink flowers creating a unique rose. – Narciso Rodriguez An iconic perfume collection that continues to surprise and captivate. The vibrant spirit of FLEUR MUSC FOR HER embodies the profound sensuality of every woman. Unique yet addictive: this freshness and fragrance recaptures the essence of duality at the core of Narciso Rodriguez for the new collection with a sly charm and a fiery passion.

Roja Parfum is one of the most luxurious perfume brands in the world. With many fragrant creations with gold inside, priced up to a thousand dollars or more, perfumer Roja Dove has confirmed that in his perfume, gold is not the most expensive ingredient.Roja Elysium Parfum Cologne is a perfume bottle that is said to be a 'pleasant' introduction to the expensive scent world of Roja Dove. The scent is fresh, lots of citrus and a few fruity notes at the opening, giving an extremely flattering and refreshing feeling when sprayed. After about 20 minutes, Roja Elysium Parfum Cologne now clearly shows vetiver, a bit of wood and the most expensive ingredient is Ambergris, giving Elysium an extremely luxurious vibe, exactly the way people talk about scents. by Roja Dove – 'smell it and feel rich'. In addition, let's talk a little more about Ambergris, at the present time, I don't see many perfume bottles, including Creed Aventus, that can give off a clear Ambergris vibe. At Roja Elysium, the drydown part is completely easy so you can notice 'something' that smells very strange, a bit dry, a bit sweet and a bit salty, with a certain nuance that reminds us of the sea, and even more so. The more I smell it, the more I want to smell it. However, the Ambergris in Elysium does not radiate intensely, but only people sitting near you can easily see it. So if you want a strong scent that lasts 7 to 8 hours on your skin, you should definitely skip this perfume. And if the image you aim for is a modern, youthful, elegant and sophisticated man, not noisy, then you really should not ignore Roja Elysium Parfum Cologne.

Unisex perfume Mandarino di Amalfi was launched in 2014. This is a Tom Ford perfume line belonging to the Citrus Aromatic group (fragrant citrus scent) aimed at people over 25 years old. Calice Becker is the creator of this perfume.

Fougère Platine unisex perfume is suitable for people over 25 years old. Fougère Platine is suitable for use both day and night in spring, autumn, and winter. This is the Tom Ford perfume line belonging to the Aromatic Fougere group (Fern fragrance). Fougère Platine was launched in 2018. Besides, Wood and Agarwood are the two scents you can easily feel when using this perfume.

Perhaps for people who do not have much experience with perfume, are not the type of people who are picky and like to play the game of finding differences, they will almost find Mefisto Gentiluomo extremely similar to the original Mefisto. However, if you experience it long enough, you will see a difference that is easy to point out in words. It's still a purple floral accord with citrus on a rich, slightly creamy sandalwood base, but Gentiluomo also has a very clear powdery violet streak, and the more you dry down, the more purple flowers you see, and Mefisto. fresh and more inclined to show off more citrus. We will see that Mefisto Gentiluomo gives a more elegant, more polished, more classic feeling compared to the original. If you pursue a dress style that is somewhat groomed and polite, formal, and somewhat classic, you will probably find that Mefisto Gentiluomo is more suitable than the original Mefisto version. If you don't care too much about details and your needs only revolve around deliciousness, then if you already have one of the two Mefisto versions, there is no need to own the other version. If you are a collector and extremely picky about scent, you should probably try both bottles to see which version suits you best. Basically, every bottle is good, the important thing is that when you experience it directly, you see which one suits you better.

Holidays by Mancera is a scent Woody Musk floral fragrance for women and men. Holiday was launched in 2016. Top notes are bergamot and coconut; middle notes are ylang-ylang, tiare flower and sea notes; Base notes are sandalwood, vanilla pod and white musk.

If you are a fan of sweet scents, looking for a strange sweetness not found in many Basic bottles invite you to join the team of By Kilian Rolling in love. Mysterious but no less seductive - Rolling in love was created for girls with a sexy and noble exterior but hidden mischief and sweetness inside. In Rolling in love, the fragrance comes from milk. Almond, Iris, white lily and musk will help your skin become soft, luxurious and especially seductive. Personally, I really like smells like cake, milk or vanilla, so many of my perfume bottles have that taste. If you are like me, Rolling in love will be a fragrance that will captivate you. Every fragrance created by By Kilian brings a different way of seduction, it seems he always implicitly says that as long as you know your partner. Who are you? Let us prepare the rest. After all, love has the scent of the person you love! And Rolling in Love will say the words of love completely for you.

In general, it can be said that Orto Parisi Seminalis is a scent made in the direction of Vanilla and Sandalwood, sweet, creamy, creamy. However, it does not remind us of the usual Gourmand-style food-scented perfumes, a big plus point for the specialness of Orto Parisi Seminalis. The scent opens with a smooth, creamy feeling. The unmistakable characteristics of sandalwood, the slightly greasy taste of milk and almonds. If you smell it carefully, you will see a slightly animalic feeling, however it gives a dirty feeling that is quite easy to smell. After a while of spraying, we will still see that the sandalwood has a smooth, creamy texture that is slightly milky and moderately sweet. However, if you smell it carefully, you will notice something slightly salty, like ambergris. The sandalwood in Orto Parisi Seminalis smells quite fresh and bright, with depth, especially it reminds us of the Sacred Wood perfume bottle from Kilian, with ingredients from Mysore sandalwood which is considered an expensive sandalwood. and most rare. On the skin, Orto Parisi Seminalis lasts about 11 hours and radiates strongly in the first 6 hours. Although it evokes the feeling of sweet, creamy ice cream, Seminalis is not much like a food scent, it carries with it a quite natural, alluring charm. Of course, with a scent profile like this, Seminalis will definitely be a Unisex perfume. Whether male or female, when smelling this scent, you will feel an attractive feeling that is hard to describe, extremely suitable for use. used for dating occasions.

If Jazz Club is a men's perfume that makes women want to use it a lot, then Black Orchid is the opposite version. Launched in 2006 for women, but only a short time later Black Orchid reluctantly became a unisex bottle because many men were fascinated by this ecstatically sweet scent. So what does Tomford Black Orchid have? Possessing the scent of noble Black Orchids along with Mexican Chocolate and Truffle Mushrooms create a warm sweetness. However, this sweetness is not at all effeminate but has strength in it, which is why it makes a strong impression on individual girls and even men. The only thing I want to note to everyone is that the Black Orchid scent will be a bit strong and not suitable for those who like basic sweetness. However, Black Orchid is qualified to appear not only at a party. but any important occasion. And so, during the busy days of the year, it is still a worthy choice for me every time I meet a partner or have moments when I need a luxurious fragrance.
undefined

In March 2019 2019 appears a new pink version Armani Sì Fiori. The new perfume invites you to express your true nature as yourself in the jungle of skyscrapers. Armani Si promotes confidence and belief in yourself. The compositions reinterpret the chypre theme of the original, playing around notes of neroli, Mediterranean white flowers. The scent of chypre-neroli hearts was created by perfumer Julie Masse.

The delicious essences of rose and jasmine are central The heart of this perfume, looks like a blend of pure essential oils of two flowers. The floral duo is framed by a hesitant high note with grassy accents and an elegant base made of cedar, moss and white musk. Orange blossom and delicate patchouli also appear in it

In September 2014, Yves Saint Laurent launched a perfume line called Black Opium, The company introduced with the message that this is a classic perfume bottle, evoking and portraying the mystery and dark corners that have never been mentioned about the Yves Saint Laurent brand. 4 leading perfumers including Nathalie Lorson, Marie Salamagne, Olivier Cresp and Honorine Blanc collaborated and created this scent, enough to express YSL's expectations for Black Opium as well as the wait. every day to try this scent directly from YSL's personality followers. The company's notes noted that Coffee is present in large quantities, along with Vanilla and Pear forming a sweet, warm, attractive scent group that is enough to create a subtle impression on those around. around. 'An unmistakable scent' is how the company describes Yves Saint Laurent Black Opium.

Valentino Donna women's perfume was launched on 2015. This is the Valentino perfume line belonging to the Oriental Floral group. Antoine Maisondieu and Sonia Constant are the creators of this perfume. Valentino Donna has a moderate scent longevity - 4 hours to 6 hours and a close fragrance - the scent spreads within an arm's length. Valentino Donna is suitable for use day and night in spring, autumn, and winter. Iris and Bulgarian Rose are the two scents you can easily feel when using this perfume.

Memoirs Of A Trespasser is a stimulating and exciting scent with a woody - smoky and vanilla theme. Initially the scent appears with a thick, clear woody scent. The smell of the oak barrels containing wine on the expedition ship, the smell of the wooden house on the edge of the forest in mysterious Madagascar, they appear vividly and realistically. The scent of wood blends with the scent of slightly burnt resin, as if smoldering, spreading throughout the space, bringing a warm feeling. As time goes on, the scent of Vanilla becomes more and more obvious, the sweet, not harsh taste of the finest Vanilla from Madagascar ( The land with the highest quality Vanilla in the world) seems to hug and comfort us after a long, hard day, resting in a cozy, familiar house with candlelight just enough to illuminate a corner of the house, on the table is a glass of wine. I just drank a few sips, lay back on the armchair and thought about what I had gone through. It both makes us feel peaceful and inspires us to continue a new journey in search of challenges. Perhaps peace is something we humans are always looking for, but then it is peace that makes us want to move, want to move on, and seek peace on long trips. I can say that, Memories of long, exciting and adventurous trips have been encapsulated by Imaginary Authors in Memoirs Of A Trespasser. If you are a lover of Vanilla notes, or simply passionate about traveling and understand the meaning of this perfume, it would be great if you wear this scent as a companion on your trips. go far, far away from the bustling city to find peace...

Vanilla by Label is a fragrance for women and men. Vanilla was launched in 2021. The nose behind this fragrance is Angela Ciampagna. Top notes are Tagetes, Saffron and Bitter Orange; middle notes are Caramel, Amber and Coconut; base notes are Vanilla and Musk.

In Love With You Freeze by Giorgio Armani is an oriental floral scent for women. This is a new fragrance. In Love With You Freeze was launched in 2020. Top notes are bergamot, cherry, pear and tangerine; middle notes are jasmine sambac, peony and lily of the valley; Base notes are patchouli, vetiver, white musk and woody notes.

Chanel Coco Noir is a new product of the Chanel perfume line launched in 2012 , brings you an exciting experience, an enjoyment set in the mysterious dark night compared to the previous Coco EDP perfume (1984). However, it does not necessarily represent something too mysterious and profound, but it is a delicate combination of fruits, flowers, resins and nature's classy ingredients to produce launched a line of classic perfumes that are surprisingly elegant but still contain an indescribable magical charm

On the company's website, the company has placed a short description: The fragrance is the result of a quest for the overwhelming addictive intensity of female sexual power, roughly translated as: 'The scent is the result of finding a truly seductive perfume for women '. And I personally feel that this scent really solves that problem. It's really nice, very feminine, very soft and luxurious, but also extremely easy to use. This is also the perfume bottle that will answer the question of women, which bottle has a floral scent that smells luxurious and pleasant but has good adhesion. Narcotic V focuses on white flowers, and the most obvious is the scent of tuberose. As soon as I sprayed it, I felt it smelled a bit like Lys 41 but felt more pleasant and cooler. In addition, it also has a vibe a bit like Diptyque's Doson. The scent of tuberose here is cool, something sweet, creamy and a little spicy. Very feminine, youthful and luxurious. About 15 minutes later, the sweetness and spice softened a lot, feeling like I was holding a large bouquet of white flowers with lilies and jasmine, slightly powdery. The feeling when it calms down, the smell becomes extremely balanced, gentle and flattering to the nose. It just plays on the skin, and although it feels light, it adheres extremely well.

Strangers Cigar Rum, what's the name and what does it smell like? creating the theme of tobacco and rum, one of Strangers Parfumerie's most loved and sought-after scents. Strangers Cigar Rum opens with the smell of rum quite clearly, adding a bit of fruit but in a dry state, slightly sweet and slightly sour, creating a booze feeling. At first, I smelled the tobacco carefully, but as time went on, the tobacco smell became more and more obvious. I felt like it was like an interesting scent journey with the notes of tobacco. The smell of tobacco leaves in Strangers Cigar Rum is dry, slightly spicy, aromatic, and extremely sweet. Wine combined with tobacco, adding a little amber smells sweet, warm, extremely caressing, interesting, and at the same time quite masculine. One interesting thing is that even after drydown, I still felt that a bit of dried fruit was still there, along with the wood as the background, but did not disappear completely. Stranger Cigar Rum is really a pretty good tobacco perfume, easy to use but has depth, it's not difficult to understand why it is so sought after.

If you are looking for a summer scent, but feel not too impressed with fresh scents with the main scent tone being orange, Tangerine or grapefruit, Moschino Toy 2 will help you answer that question. Moschino Toy 2 adorns any girl's summer, turning the hot and uncomfortable into fresh and comfortable, but still has enough sweetness to make you feel confident, attractive and outstanding. before every space and time. The wonderful blend of Green Apple and White Lychee, femininity with the presence of Peony, and the gentleness and creativity of combining Magnolia with musk , Moschino Toy 2 is ready to turn your summer into beautiful, unforgettable moments.

Panda actually has 2 versions. The 2014 version is a scent with strong notes of bamboo, green, moist earth, slightly animalic. Spraying it makes me feel like I'm standing in a bamboo forest like the movies I watched as a kid, it's really realistic. However, I personally think it's a bit weird to 'wear' this scent. The 2017 version, which removes the bamboo note and some small changes, is a regret for many scent devotees, but I personally think that thanks to that, it is actually easier to use, easier to use. Much more approachable. The newly sprayed Zoologist Panda gives me a green feeling, a bit of a floral scent, the smell of a ripe, sweet, crisp green apple. Taking a deep breath, I felt a creamy, slightly animalic, slightly animalic feeling lingering at the base of my nose, a bit of tree sap on a damp ground. This moist, earthy feeling with tree resin even reminds me a little of the scent of 'Zoo' – Bat. A pretty fun opener, maybe not as exciting as the Zoologist Panda 2014 but it's a lot more wearable. I think I can describe the feeling of the first half hour of this scent with the word fresh, it makes me feel quite comfortable thanks to the notes of green apple, tea and magnolia. Drydown, Zoologist Panda will be an accord with green apple as the main theme on a woody and musk background, quite flattering, not too popular but still easy to 'wear'. Zoologist Panda lingers strongly and persistently on my skin, easily fragrant from morning to night. If you're planning to start entering the world of 'Zologist Zoo', I think this is a scent you should try. , I think this will be a really interesting scent experience.

Product_name: La nuit de Lhomme Bleu Electrique
Description: From its launch until now, YSL La nuit de Lhomme has always been extremely highly rated, being one of the most classic men's dating perfumes ever produced. However, there is an inherent problem with this perfume that current users complain about a lot, which is that its fragrance only lasts about 4 hours. In fact, I always tell my customers that when going on a date, that's really all it takes. It's not like going to a bar or a pub to attract all the attention. Where does it shine? However, no matter what you say, for demanding users who want to always stand out, La nuit de Lhomme's grip still makes them feel unsatisfied. And YSL has listened extremely well to consumers when launching the Bleu Electrique version to solve that problem. Bleu Electrique has just kept the same scent as the original, adding a slight spiciness from the ginger in the opening, improving the smell a lot, and has a more powdery feel, very appealing and pleasing to the nose. , a type of scent that just needs to be sprayed on when going out, especially on a date, and will receive countless compliments. The smell is top notch, the fragrance lasts about 7.8 hours, it deserves a 10/10 without any doubts. Although for me, La nuit de Lhomme is still something of a legend, it must be admitted that Bleu Electrique probably does even better than what the original ever did.

The first feeling when smelling Dame New Musk's nozzle will be an extremely clean, pleasant feeling, like you are smelling a sheet The bed has just been washed. When sprayed, I can clearly feel the scent of plum, vanilla and musk, after a few minutes I feel a bit of jasmine and wood. This Musk in Dame New Musk is bright, clear, light and clean, probably one of the smoothest musk bottles I've ever smelled to date. The combination of musk with plum and vanilla, adding a little wood makes it a quite interesting scent, both sweet and a bit sour. This type of scent at Dame New Musk is not for those who want a fiery scent, but it will be a gentle, caressing scent on the skin, only those who are close to you will feel it. clearly, just like the more you explore yourself, the more interesting and attractive it becomes. And I firmly believe that scents like Dame New Musk will make others pay attention, wonder about you, wondering what that person is wearing that smells so good. However, it is extremely difficult to guess, because this is not a mass-market scent that you can buy anywhere...

Matcha Meditation opens With the smell of Matcha tea powder, it wakes up very fragrant, green, slightly astringent, with a bit of bright and fresh citrus, followed by the smell of white flowers, the most obvious being the smell of jasmine. The matcha here is not greasy or fatty like Tea Escape, but the smell of the tea is much more real, perhaps the most real of any tea scent I have ever smelled. Surely if you are a tea addict you will like the style. make this scent from Maison Margiela. This opening doesn't last long, after a while the tea scent gradually subsides, the flowers become clearer and more balanced. Slowly we will see that it has a light sweetness coming from white chocolate, combined with orange blossom and jasmine to create a really delicate, enchanting drydown. The aftertaste of tea is usually sweet, and I like this change that is somewhat similar to drinking tea. The only thing I feel a bit regretful about Matcha Meditation is that if only the tea scent would have been a little thicker, it would have been perfect. But this is probably more than enough for a tea-inspired scent, because if you play with tea-scented perfumes for a long time, you will often find that the tea scent tends to soften like that. Personally, I think That, Matcha Meditation is an extremely valuable upgraded version compared to Tea Escape. The scent of Matcha Meditation's tea is more realistic, not too sweet or greasy like Tea Escape. That's why I think this scent is more in the spirit of 'tea', and if you're not a person with too much of a sweet tooth, Matcha Meditaion is definitely a tea scent not to be missed.

Piano Santal is a scent with a rather interesting sandalwood theme that I think can easily help you win the hearts of those around you. The point that makes Piano Santal different from the usual sandalwood scents that we often encounter is probably the milky note. Just spraying the scent gives us the feeling of rich, creamy sandalwood with the milky touch of warm milk. Originally, sandalwood in perfume often has a characteristic slightly creamy feeling, when combined with the milk scent, it gives an extremely pleasant feeling, smelling very attractive and soft. The tangerine scent wraps around your skin like you're wearing an expensive cashmere scarf. Later, as Piano Santal softens on the skin, musk and bergamote gradually appear. The scent is both fresh and warm and gentle, all combined together like a clear, elegant song that makes the owner always stand out from the crowd...

Bouquet Encore by L'Orchestre Parfum is a Floral fragrance for women and men. Bouquet Encore was launched in 2020. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre-Constantin Guéros. Top note is Sichuan Pepper; middle notes are Tuberose and Jasmine; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla and Musk.

I know quite a few girls who always take care of their bedrooms, from decorating them to choosing scents. Especially after a few tiring days, they are even more picky about this issue. Perhaps Maison Martin Margiela also understands that so it sent them a gift by mixing Lazy Sunday Morning. I like Maison Martin Margiela for the way it names its inventions, and this is a perfect name that makes you immediately imagine the nuance of each relaxing scent drop. Some of my friends say that Lazy Sunday Morning makes people lazy because it looks too much like washed bedding, very airy and clear. I'm not a fan of musk or aldehydes, so at first When I tried Lazy Sunday Morning, I didn't like it very much. But the point that made me choose this perfume is because I often fall in love with the scent of roses, and the rose scent here is combined very well with my nose and tangerine. If you give 10 points to the rose petals at Lazy Sunday Morning, the drydown musk is no less than an 8. It's like some high-end powder but thicker and less powdery. Lazy Sunday Morning is easy to feel but also has strange part. The scent lasts quite well (about 5-6 hours). Take time to relax and feel light with 1 shot at first and increase according to your needs. Unfortunately, it becomes an indispensable scent for you to fall asleep, so don't blame me for making you fall in love with the smell of the bed and refuse to leave.

In Cio Cio san, we have the scent of ripe lychees combined with peony flowers on a citrus base of Japanese Yuzu lemon, bright, succulent, slightly effervescent like a glass of sweet champagne. All are placed on a clean, white musk background, helping the scent to maintain its softness like a silk scarf, which when worn on the body, is guaranteed to enhance sophistication and modesty while still very luxurious.

Fleurs de Gardenia women's perfume is suitable for people over 25 years old. This is the Creed perfume line that has a temporary scent lasting from 3 hours to 6 hours, and the fragrance is very close - faintly on the skin. Fleurs de Gardenia is suitable for use both day and night in the spring and summer. This is the Creed perfume line of the Floral Green group (Natural green floral scent). Olivier Creed, Olivier Creed Sixth Generation is the creator of this perfume. Besides, Gardenia and Peony are the two scents you can easily feel when using this perfume.

Within many For years in a row since its launch until now, Terre D'Hermes has always been named every time people mention classic office scents for men. In the EDT version, we have a combination of citrus, grapefruit, spices along with vetiver and wood. Having read this far, I think you can see that there is nothing special yet. But what makes Terre D'Hermes legendary is the way legendary perfumer Jean-Claude Ellena carefully and delicately chooses the nuances of each note and combines them together. The scent just interacts with the skin, you can clearly see the citrus appearing, the most obvious feeling is probably the slightly bitter, slightly green nuance of grapefruit peel along with the mild sour taste of lemon, not the fresh, bright and sweet citrus like Other basic scents pamper the nose. Citrus is blended with spices from pink pepper, spicy, warm, and flavorful. It was clear from the beginning that Terre D'Hermes affirmed that this was the scent of mature, strong, tough and decisive men. Waiting for a while, the main character, vetiver grass, appears, its slightly earthy, spicy nuance appears, and as time goes on, it takes more and more of the spotlight, making the scent more masculine in a solid, economical way. word. However, Hermes also knows how to please people, when next to vetiver, we also see a touch of light, creamy sandalwood along with the sweet, dark taste of benzoin, making the fragrance extremely pleasing to the nose. . To me, Terre D'Hermes is basically the smell of a grown man, whether in an elegant suit, or in dusty clothes traveling on a large motorcycle, it is also extremely suitable. strange.

24 Faubourg is a perfume bottle, from design to scent symbolizing pure light, designed by Maurice Roucel in 1995, 24 Faubourg seems to lead us to a journey where the sun is the final destination. This perfume bottle is a Cypriot floral scent that brings a gentle, luxurious and attractive feeling.

Miss Dior Rose N'Roses is a floral scent Sparkling, the richness of Grasse Rose is brightened by the zest of Bergamot and enhanced by White Musk. The vibrant essence of Geranium refines the composition, recreating the irresistible scent of a field timeless flowers. This bright fragrance grabs you and never lets go. The heart of Miss Dior Rose N'Roses swirls with the spicy explosion of Grasse Rose. Grown in the fields of southern France by the Exclusive partner of the house of Dior, it is harvested every year in May, by hand and according to tradition, to preserve all the properties of this precious, delicate flower.

At The Barber's by Maison Martin Margiela is a fragrant scent for men. At The Barber's was launched in 2014. The nose behind this scent is Louise Turner. Top notes are bitter orange, basil and black pepper; middle notes are lavender, geranium and rosemary; Base notes are tonka bean, leather, moss and white musk.

The name 'Jazz Club' immediately makes me think of the musical movie La La Land. But maybe the image of Sebastian playing the piano and Mia dancing with a few people below makes me feel too excited, not what when spraying Jazz Club makes me think of it. Everything feels much quieter and more luxurious. The image that appears in my mind is of a small pub with luxurious leather chairs, gentlemen wearing elegant suits sitting and enjoying a glass of rum with expensive cigars to the music of a panist. playing soft jazz, to be exact. The opening of Jazz Club is the sweet smell of Vanilla combined with an extremely smooth and flattering tobacco scent, with a slight hint of rum. Later, the sweetness of vanilla softens, making the scent even more luxurious and delicate. The scent on my skin was the most beautiful at that time, the tobacco wafting on the leather, the slightly sweet dry resin evoked a charm but no less luxurious and sophisticated. To evaluate Jazz Club, I would say that this is a very flattering tobacco scent, luxurious and easy to use, the scent notes are separate, not at all complicated but can easily make us 'drunk'. Usually cigarette scents are labeled for men, but I find that women use this scent really well too. Why is that, because I simply went on a date with a girl who used Jazz Club, and that girl left a very special impression on me, and was also the one who let me try Jazz Club for the first time...

Ocean Leather evokes the majestic and mysterious character of ocean creatures. The water suddenly comes to life and the steam brings a sparkling harmony of mandarin, violet and basil. The million drops of water reveal notes of the enemy while the boats bring a cedar accord mixed with notes of sage, nutmeg, vetiver and leather.

Un Jardin sur le Nil is a perfume launched in 2005, this is the second destination in Hermes's surprising travel diary. Its scent leads us to the gardens on the islands of the Nile at Assouan, a place of inspiration as well as the starting point for an olfactory journey along an interesting scent complex. This. This scent is the masterpiece created by Jean-Claude Ellena.

Love in Black is a women's perfume, introduced in 2008. The fragrance of the perfume is inspired by the late first lady, Jacqueline Kennedy, and the fragrance composition is composed of ingredients harvested from the places she visited and loved. Love in Black is classified as a floral scent and was created by Erwin Creed the 7th generation and Olivier Creed the 6th generation. With the main scent note being violets, the Love in Black perfume solution has a dark purple color instead because it is pure black as the name suggests (Black means black in English). Notes of fruit (blackcurrant), herbs and spices (cloves) harmonize with the scent of violets, and are softened by the scent of iris and rose. Top notes used Italian violets, night-blooming jasmine and cedarwood from Virginia. The middle notes add femininity with Florentine iris, cloves and musk, while the base notes a passionate scent of currants. black and Bulgarian rose.

Eau des Merveilles by Hermes is a magical, enchanting perfume, with a scent that brings novelty and surprise . The scent of Eau des Merveilles wraps around the body like a dreamy, sexy mist. The novel scent of amber blends wonderfully with the woody scent in the top notes. Even though there is no floral scent present, it still successfully creates a seductive feminine scent. With contrasting elements and flavors, they are also extremely intimate and delicate, creating a happy taste. Eau des Merveilles was launched in 2004 and created by Ralf Schwieger and Nathalie Feisthauer. The fragrance starts with a warm scent of orange and lemon essences and a touch of resin, it also has a slightly salty but almost neutral taste. easy to spot. The middle note is where the amber scent shines the most wonderfully, the scent really impresses during the time this layer of scent settles. The scent has a feeling of fine powder, light, comfortable, like a warm hug. In addition, the incense layer also has the gentle presence of fir tree resin, blending very harmoniously with the resin scent in the top note. The base note is a combination of vetiver, oak moss, and cedar, bringing a feeling of comfort and refreshment.

This perfume bottle was given by OrtoParisi launched in 2017, was inspired by the historic eruption of Mount Vesuvius in 79 AD, one of the largest eruptions in recorded world history. Not only that, the eruption of Vesuvius submerged the ancient city of Pompeii, turning the richest city of ancient Rome into a pile of ashes in just one night. As for the scent, personally, Orto Parisi Terroni is a lively and exciting scent journey, with the opening being a combination of vetiver and patchouli, giving an earthy, earthy and somewhat 'dirty' feeling. Enveloping vetiver and patchouli, there is a very clear feeling of smoke, spices and incense, as if Perfumer wants to take us back to the past and witness the historical event at Pompeii. Have you seen that many times there are perfume bottles that when we better understand the story behind it, we will feel much more excited and interesting when spraying. When the Orto Parisi Terroni settled on my skin, I began to notice a hint of sweetness but accompanied by a slight astringency coming from the blood orange. After that, the scent gradually transforms towards the end of the journey, at this time the incense smoke calms down quite a lot, we have the appearance of amber and sandalwood, smelling quite masculine, with its own quality. As for staying power, this perfume lasts on my skin for about 12 hours, extremely good, nothing to complain about. Personally, I find that Orto Parisi Terroni has a vibe quite similar to Black Afgano, however Terroni feels like a gentler, brighter version, with a little less personality and thorniness of Black Afgano. So if you've tried Black Afgano but still feel like it's edgier and more personal than you like, don't hesitate to try Orto Parisi Terroni, I think you'll like this unique scent. .

Right from the opening, Zoologist Chipmunk easily captured hearts with the sweet, greasy, nutty feeling coming from chestnuts and nutmegs. , cardamom. The sweetness here is not chemical but natural and extremely genuine, making us think of ourselves as if we were standing in front of a stall selling nuts at a country market. Later, the nutty feeling of the nuts gradually subsides, replaced by woody notes of cedar, oak, guaic, and pine. The wood in Zoologist Chipmunk has a moist, fresh feel, tinged with tree resin, combined with nuts, giving us a very pleasant and pleasant woody scent. This scent seems to paint before our eyes an autumn forest like Canada or Norway, where the forest is covered with a layer of yellow leaf carpet, on a sunny day, each leaf canopy gently shakes every time the wind blows. past, heart-wrenchingly beautiful. The main scent note is wood, but it is not thorny and has an extremely masculine style, but when accompanied with slightly fatty nutty notes, it gives us an easy-to-smell feeling, pleasing to the nose, soft, extremely suitable for those days. The chilly autumn needs something to make the soul comfortable and joyful.

Narciso Rodriguez for Her Eau de Parfum version launched in 2019. 2006 in pink bottle and black box, after the original EDT from 2004. The creators of the piece are Christine Nagel and Francis Kurkdjian. Top notes of rose and peach. Heart: amber and musk. Base: patchouli and sandalwood.

Spicebomb Extreme men's perfume is suitable for people from 25 years old. This is a Viktor&Rolf perfume line with high intensity. The scent lasts long - 8 hours to 10 hours and the scent radiates far - radiates scent within a radius of 2 meters. This is Viktor&Rolf perfume line belonging to the Oriental Spicy group. Spicebomb Extreme was launched in 2015. Besides, Tobacco and Vanilla are the two flavors you can easily feel when using this perfume.

Issey Miyake is one of the greatest and most prominent fashion designers Asia has ever produced, and is also a pioneer Japanese Designer in bringing the East 'touch' to the Western world, Miyake's creations have laid the foundation for the fashion industry for decades, becoming works of art revered and sought after by collectors and fashion lovers alike. pick up. For me, in the perfume segment, too, Issey Miyake has L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme, one of the monuments of men's perfume, very popular in Europe but for some reason not in Vietnam. did not receive much attention. Here we have a main citrus scent coming from Japanese yuzu lemons, both sweet and a bit bitter, very unique, very different from other popular bottles but still very easy to use, and has a pleasant feeling. aquatic is light, not thick, not prominent, not fishy, giving the smeller a cool and pleasant feeling, especially on hot days, on a wooden background of extremely masculine vetiver. To me, L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme gives users a minimalist feeling, something extremely multi-layered, interesting, something classic but still modern and not out of fashion.

For many people, coffee is an indispensable drink every morning to start a new day. However, for me, I prefer a cup of tea, it makes me feel light, pleasant and comfortable. Maison Matine Warni Warni to me is such a cup of tea, a scent that can easily help us 'up our mood' to be ready to start a new day full of vitality. Starting with the scent of tea, the tea has a light green flavor, is both slightly bitter and sweet. Narcissus flowers promote a cool, pleasant scent of tea. The tea gradually calms down, at this time the orange blossoms begin to appear clearly. Warni Warni right now is really clear, full of freedom and energy. I have the feeling that this is Maison Matine's scent that best demonstrates the company's motto:'We target a generation with «no rules», & that is looking for freedom, We propose to wear & co-create perfume, symbol of social interaction! '

Salt & Cyclamen by Label is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. Salt & Cyclamen was launched in 2020. The nose behind this fragrance is Angela Ciampagna. Top note is Sea water; middle notes are Cyclamen, Ylang-Ylang and Honey; base notes are Musk, Patchouli and Vanilla.

At the Esxence perfume exhibition in Milan in 2015, Xerjoff first First presents the 1861 collection of 3 perfumes dedicated to the 150th anniversary of Italian unification and inspired by the wealth, beauty and heritage that this country possesses. Renaissance, meaning Renaissance, or Renaissance is 1 of 3 perfume bottles in that collection. I am impressed with Renaissance right from the name, because if you learn about history, you will know that after the 'Black Death' pandemic that took away more than a third of Europe's population was the Renaissance, one of extremely important periods in world history. That alone is enough to convince me to spend a lot of money to own this bottle of Xerjoff perfume. Renaissance's opening scent is a green lemon scent that smells quite pleasant and fresh. Just a few minutes after spraying, we feel the lemon gradually soften, the presence of orange and tangerine begins to appear slightly sweet, with a slight coolness of mint. It will make you feel extremely relaxed and comfortable, especially on hot summer days. Sometimes when I'm overwhelmed with work or stressed, I often spray Renaissance to feel more at ease, and this tip always works. Later, the smell softens in a rather smooth direction, there will still be a slightly sweet feeling of citrus, slightly powdery, returning to a base with a citrus scent with a woody background with a bit of amber. And if you read my previous article, I praised Xerjoff for making the citrus scent not only very real, but also stick around extremely well. Renaissance is no exception, a citrus-dominant scent that lingers on my skin for 7 hours, more than enough for a working day, and in terms of smell, it is more than flattering to the nose and polite for going to work. I rarely have many words to say. High praise for any perfume house, because usually I only like 2 or 3 bottles of each perfume house. But Xerjoff really makes me love it, especially the way Xerjoff makes citrus with Nio and Renaissance...

Narciso Rouge Eau de Toilette by Narciso Rodriguez is a Woody Musk floral scent for women. This is a new fragrance. Narciso Rouge Eau de Toilette was launched in 2019. Narciso Rouge Eau de Toilette was created by Sonia Constant and Nadege le Garlantezec. Top notes are rose and lily of the valley; middle note is musk; Base notes are tonka bean, vetiver, cedar and white cedar extract.

Zoologist Dragonfly is one of the house's most popular creations flavor Indie Zoologist. For me personally, Dragonfly is the smell of the countryside on an afternoon, when a shower suddenly comes and then suddenly goes, the sun begins to set and the sunlight fades. In Dragonfly, there is a very special artificial note, called 'Rain notes', but for me personally, the aquatic feeling that this note brings is similar to the feeling of stepping out into a garden after the rain. More than that, it's cool, pleasant and extremely real. Some incense makers have tried to recreate the smell of rain, with creations like Replica When the rain stops or Le Labo Baie 19, but for me, only En Passant by Frederic Malle and Zoologist Dragonfly give a real feeling. most realistic, not to mention made more realistic by the watery feeling from the lotus flower. Later, Zoologist Dragonfly created the image of the field that I described at the beginning of the article when it smelled of rice, the smell of ripe golden rice mixed with lotus flowers, with a little floral scent of mimosa, violet and jasmine, a bronze painting. The countryside appears ravishingly beautiful.

Valentino Uomo Intense men's perfume is suitable for people over 25 years old. This is a perfume line with a long-lasting scent. 8 o'clock. and the scent radiating is long-distance - the scent radiates within a radius of 2 meters. Valentino Uomo Intense is suitable for use both day and night in the fall and winter. This is the Valentino perfume line belonging to the Leather group. Valentino Uomo Intense was launched in 2016. Besides, Iris and Vanilla are the two scents you can easily feel when using this perfume

No longer unfamiliar with the image of majestic naval ships, sailing smoothly to dominate the sea, the Creed family has a love, or rather a preference. A special gift exclusively for Viking Creed. Considered a gift for souls who like to wander and have a passion for endless exploration, Viking Creed soon affirmed its position in the market with its bold style and original source. its immeasurable energy. Floating on the waves and smelling of the salty sea, Viking Creed right at the top of the scent gives us a very friendly and resilient look with the freshness of the Citrus house, added Masculine thorns from slightly spicy Pink Pepper. Spending his whole life searching for fleeting horizons, the Viking Creed man is strong but also unexpectedly romantic with Rose in the middle notes. Sending a bit of kindness, the floral scent and cool mint further highlight the cherished spicy scent of Pink Pepper.

Green Irish Tweed Creed began entering the 'fragrance world' in 1985, witnessing the frenzied rotation of the trend wheel between the two centuries but still retaining its charm, that appeal exists coherently, clear and complete. Right at the top of the scent, the language of luxury and class has been sent into the scent of Iris, the beauty and scent spread splendidly and gracefully, combined with The pure scent of Horsetail. Coming to the middle note, the scent from the leaves of the Violet flower will take you to a green garden, feeling your bare feet gliding on the young grass, leaving behind traces of drops of morning dew, filled with joy overflowing on the corners of the mouth with a feeling of peace and happiness. Aiming for a 'happy' ending, exuding a truly outstanding and elegant style of men, Green Irish Tweed Creed has brought the 'treasure of the sea' into the base note, the scent of Ambergris has truly made the eyes 'drunk' to stagger by the passionate, warm, 'beautiful scent. ' to the point of surprise.

As someone who loves scents with a focus on roses, I really love Rose Trombone - a scent that makes I can feel comfortable and elegant at the same time and can 'wear' any occasion. Like an old song, but the melody never makes us bored, the opening of Rose Trombone is quite familiar with a fresh, slightly powdery and fruity pink scent. The scent gradually separates and begins to become sweeter, but the sweetness here is quite strange and easily attracts our attention because it is both rich and thick of Vanilla, and carries the fresh, vibrant feeling of fruit. Ripe pear. However, when this sweetness blends with the rose theme, it becomes a clear, feminine, extremely pure and pleasant fragrance. Rose Trombone is strong, lively, durable on the skin like a thin coat hugging the owner's body, not noisy but easily attracting the attention of those around...

Oclipta flower is an elegant, small, white or slightly yellowish-looking flower. This flower is often grown in ornamental gardens, garden decorations, and temples. For me, the osmanthus flower is a flower associated with childhood. As a child, I often saw my grandfather using this flower to make tea. The osmanthus flower smells lightly, has a sweet fruity scent that is both peach-like and apricot-like, and smells extremely pleasant. The tea marinated with osmanthus flowers is so fragrant, I still remember the taste of that day clearly. Many times, smelling osmanthus flowers gives us a very peaceful feeling. Dame Osmanthus is a women's perfume with the theme of osmanthus flowers, made quite realistically, but when you first spray it, you will find it much sweeter. When the scent softens, it will not change much, the sweetness gradually fades, returning to a gentle floral scent that is extremely feminine and clings well to the skin. Dame Osmanthus will suit girls who like gentleness and youthfulness, not girls who are too individualistic. If I were to choose a character that I think is extremely suitable for Dame Osmanthus, perhaps it would be Dao Anh - the muse of the late musician Trinh Cong Son.
undefined

Flamenco Neroli is an extremely cool creation from L'Orchestre that you can choose during summer days. The opening of Flamenco Neroli reminds me of two summer scents that I have used and really like, Le Labo's Bergamote 22 and Les Liquides Imaginaires Phantasma. Flamenco Neroli opens with a combination of bergamote and orange blossom. If you're observant, you'll see a slight bitterness as if you're standing in a ripe orange garden, pinching an orange with your finger. Tiny water jets make us feel extremely relaxed and refreshed. Not only that, if you are an addict of tea scents like me, you will definitely see a gentle, clear smell of tea scented with white flowers suddenly appearing. Orange blossom, jasmine, orange scent and tea scent blend together like a gentle symphony, like a breeze dispelling the heat on hot summer days. Towards the end of the Flamenco Neroli symphony, orange blossom is still the main character, but this time wood gradually appears. Cedar wood makes it gentle and clear with a slight spiciness of ginger, but it is absolutely unisex, not male or female. Flamenco Neroli is a clean, elegant yet equally attractive scent, easily captivating you. get attention from people around. If you are a fan of Neroli Portofino, Bergamote 22 or Mugler Cologne, Neroli Flamenco is definitely a scent you should try.

Jean Paul Gaultier launches his new perfume Ultra Male in the summer of 2015. This perfume is a reinterpretation or enhanced version of Le Male from in 1995. Ultra Male, is known to be masculine, intense, seductive and sophisticated at the same time. Ultra Male is nothing more than a scent that fascinates the opposite person, and I emphasize the word opposite because perhaps no matter the gender, this guy can pull it all off. Male, female or a third gender, everyone has to turn their heads and stare when Ultra Male passes by, and with just 1 or 2 sprays, it is enough to knock down everything around you. already.

In 2021, 'animal' perfume house Zoologist launches Seahorse. For me personally, Seahorse is a pretty important milestone for Zoologist, because Zoologist Seahorse is probably one of the most mainstream scents - a scent that aims to please as many people as possible - most of the perfume house. coming from Canada. In fact, I have always respected Victor Wong, because in my eyes, Zoologist is still a perfume maker that can please the majority of perfume users. I say that because Zoologist has scents that are really 'artful', very artistic, and of course not easy to smell or use. Besides, they also have many scents that can please even those who are new to stepping outside the safe boundaries of designer perfumes, and typically Zoologist Seahorse can be mentioned. Zoologist Seahorse is a scent with a floral theme. and aquatic, everything revolves around the Ambergris or Ambergris note. A marine scent that is neither fishy nor cloying, but is clear, smooth, blue and sparkling in an extremely delicate and unique way. Spraying Seahorse, I clearly feel the ambergris mixed with seaweed, the seaweed is very fresh and pleasant, I see before my eyes a pristine beach, clear water, waves that follow one after another lapping on the extremely sandy shore. peaceful. It's like the way Haruki Murakami once described his days in Hawaii in his book 'What I Talk About When I Talk About Running', a type of weather that you can find extremely pleasant even in the cold months. The heat is at its peak. The scent softens, the aquatic aspect gradually softens, we see a clear floral scent with vetiver, clean, unisex with a little creamy ambrette that is very pleasant, can please anyone. Until now, I have never had anything to complain about the staying power of the scents from Zoologist, and the same goes for Seahorse, the scent easily stays on the skin from morning until late at night, but is not at all hot or overwhelming. very moderate, one more point that makes me love Zoologist Seahorse so much...

Unlike the previous 3 versions of Scandal, from 2017 to 2019 Scandal kept the notes mainstream honey. By 2020, the So Scandal version has a more luxurious and sharp design with lines surrounding the bottle, the bottle is dark and fresh and the honey scent has disappeared. If you listen to the overall smell, So Scandal is still present. Sweet but lighter touch. Appearing right in the first layer of scent is the smoothness of milk and raspberry, they blend together to make your skin inviting and attractive. Without letting the owner of that fragrance have to wait long, we welcome the appearance of the three most famous white flower tones in the fragrant world, which are white lily, orange blossom and jasmine. Reading this, white flower fans are probably the most excited. I understand what you're thinking, and I would like to confirm that girls can use So Scandal in more environments and weather than the 3 old versions. . Good news, right? What we see here is not simply seductive according to the slogan of 'team scandal', there is elegance and elegance present behind each floral layer of the scent that I think will be a best seller in Vietnam in the next few years. .

MCM Eau de Parfum is a Unisex perfume but will be female-oriented with the main floral tone. Open with raspberries and wild apricots; Later on, the scent gradually changes to a floral scent with peonies, jasmine and purple flowers. This combination creates a scent that goes in the direction of roses, which is quite soft and pleasant. Finally, at the base of the scent will be sandalwood that smells slightly creamy and smooth, with a little sweetness of vanilla. Overall, it's a scent that's quite easy to use, not to mention the design of this perfume bottle is extremely beautiful, easily becoming an accessory for the user. It can be said that MCM Eau de Parfum is one of the perfume bottles worth owning in 2021.

Musky Garden is a fragrant expression of luxurious. Inspired by the secret of femininity, this new design is made like a precious jewel. A black bottle embossed with a golden flower – epitomizing the blend of simplicity and tradition of haute joillerie.

Born in 1995 Under the hands of the brand's owner - Olivier Creed - Silver Mountain Water embodies the joy of skiing, the special love for each long waterfall in the Swiss Alps. The white bottle with a silver cap resembles a snow-capped mountain with a sparkling silver stream. So close and friendly, Silver Mountain Water is no less luxurious and sophisticated from the outside bottle design to the final scent inside. With a purposeful blend, Musk, Sandalwood and Lemon Leaves only enrich the inviting, cool and enchanting flavor, immersing us in a magical floating space, absolutely not wanting to leave. xa.

Cafe Rose was launched in 2012 but until now, this perfume version has not cooled down for water lovers. flower. This is a unique combination of rose and coffee scents, making Cafe Rose look noble, solemn, and mysterious. In 2012, the Tom Ford brand created and launched a line of perfumes. Used for men and women over 25 years old, it's called Cafe Rose. This is a perfume belonging to the Cyprus floral scent group and has an EDP (Eau De Parfum) concentration by expert Antoine Liu, Cafe Rose will promise to awaken your emotions.

La Petite Robe Noire Intense version is announced to be a sweeter composition than previous versions. The fragrance comes in a dark blue bottle of the distinctive La Petite Robe Noir design, with a drawing of a little black dress in the style of Marilyn Monroe. Notes of cotton candy mixed with fresh bergamot and the fruity character of blueberries at the top of the composition. Bulgarian rose is still present in the heart of the perfume, placed on a base of patchouli, white musk, sandalwood and vanilla.

Black tea Along with black tea, in fact they are quite similar, and you probably don't need to pay too much attention to the details. Just know that they are the tea line that has made the island nation of Sri Lanka one of the extremely famous places when it comes to tea in the world. Optico, the Italian niche perfume house, chose Sri Lanka as the name for its black tea-themed creation. To me, Optico Sri Lanka is an extremely peaceful, sophisticated tea creation. Just sprayed, all around you will be the scent of black tea, a rich tea mixed with the scent of ripe fruit, with a slight smoke. Besides, we will also feel a little spicy taste coming from ginger. But what surprised me the most is that even so, Optico Sri Lanka still appears cool and pure, easily making both the person spraying and the person smelling it extremely comfortable. Tea in perfume is not a very common note, black tea is even rarer, which is probably what makes Optico Sri Lanka different from other tea scents, but still retains the necessary 'zen' has a tea scent. A creation I wouldn't hesitate to give compliments to!

A fragrance covered in dark chocolate, a stolen kiss that leaves a spicy aftertaste of chili, black pepper and ginger on the lips. The balance of Boccanera is striking, confusing, between fragrance and flavor, between love and fear.

Just spray L'Occitane Eau de Bavx and you will feel it You can clearly see the presence of cardamom and pink pepper. If you are a fan of YSL La nuit de Lhomme, you will definitely notice that the cardamom is quite clear and thick. It gives us a slightly sweet, slightly sticky feeling and has a slight spicy touch. This opening style with pepper and spices is not unusual in perfumes, it reminds us of Spice Bomb EDT version, however Eau de Bavx feels brighter, softer. After just a few minutes, the scent The scent develops on the skin extremely quickly, at this point the scent of incense and cypress will be quite obvious. The cypress here does a pretty good job of making us think of the vibe of pine wood as if it had just been cut down. Incense and cypress balance each other, neither ingredient dominates and slowly brings us to the main character of Eau de Bavx, Vanilla. Vanilla is made quite simply, not at all fussy, not too sweet but has a slightly dry, warm feeling that comes with tonka beans. If you are familiar with tobacco perfume bottles, you will see that the combo of vanilla, tonka bean and incense in Eau de bavx creates a slightly sweet tobacco effect, which is why many people associate this perfume bottle with the statue. Tobacco Vanille station comes from Tomford. However, if Tobacco Vanille is a love-hate scent, meaning that when you smell the scent you will only love or hate it because Tobacco Vanille is quite sweet and clingy, then Eau de Bavx is a gentle, pleasant scent that is hard to find. which can make anyone feel hateful. Spraying Eau de Bavx will bring a feeling of cleanliness, maturity, elegance, not noisy but a warm, caring type of person. Overall, Eau de Bavx is a bottle of Vanilla perfume is quite interesting that you should try, not only that it blends very smoothly, has an aromatic tobacco effect that is also quite nice and luxurious, and its price is also quite accessible to everyone. .

Xerjoff Lira is a fragrance that blends fruity and floral notes with precise candy notes. Right from the first spray, you will immediately feel the fresh, exciting lemon scent, the intense red orange scent mixed with a bit of metal and the pure lavender scent like cool, clear water caressing your skin. Next is the jasmine scent dotted with sweet licorice, vanilla and creamy caramel giving you an extremely feminine, cute but not simple feeling.

The sublime heart of musk is enhanced with a bouquet of white flowers while cashmeran lends warmth. An extremely addictive scent, for her PURE MUSC eau de parfum teases the senses and the palate. body wrap
